atk-s0513a2:246_7: karissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Brāhmaṇā purohitaputtassa hatthimaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:246_8: kātuṃ adatvā “hatthimaṅgalaṃ katvā mayaṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a2:246_9: Atha “catutthe divase hatthimaṅgalaṃ bhavissatī”ti bodhisattassa mātā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a2:246_10: sutvā “hatthimaṅgalakaraṇaṃ nāma yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā amhākaṃ vaṃso, vaṃso
atk-s0513a2:246_11: ca no osakkissati, dhanā ca parihāyissāmā”ti anusocamānā parodi.
atk-s0513a2:247_0: Bodhisatto “kasmā, amma, rodasī”ti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “nanu, amma, ahaṃ maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:247_1: karissāmī”ti āha. “Tāta, tvaṃ neva tayo vede jānāsi, na hatthisuttaṃ, kathaṃ maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:247_2: karissasī”ti. “Amma, kadā pana hatthimaṅgalaṃ karissatī”ti? “Ito catutthe divase,
atk-s0513a2:247_3: tātā”ti. “Amma, tayo pana vede paguṇe katvā hatthisuttaṃ jānanakaācariyo kahaṃ vasatī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:247_4: “Tāta, evarūpo disāpāmokkho ācariyo ito vīsayojanasatamatthake gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:247_5: vasatī”ti. “Amma, amhākaṃ vaṃsaṃ na nāsessāmi, ahaṃ sve ekadivaseneva takkasilaṃ
atk-s0513a2:247_6: gantvā ekaratteneva tayo vede ca hatthisuttañca uggaṇhitvā punadivase āgantvā catutthe
atk-s0513a2:247_7: divase hatthimaṅgalaṃ karissāmi, mā rodī”ti mātaraṃ samassāsetvā punadivase bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:247_8: pātova bhuñjitvā ekakova nikkhamitvā ekadivaseneva takkasilaṃ gantvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a2:248_0: Atha naṃ ācariyo “kuto āgatosi, tātā”ti pucchi. “Bārāṇasito, ācariyā”ti. “Kenatthenā”ti?
atk-s0513a2:248_1: “Tumhākaṃ santike tayo vede ca hatthisuttañca uggaṇhanatthāyā”ti. “Sādhu, tāta, uggaṇhā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:248_2: Bodhisatto “ācariya, mayhaṃ kammaṃ accāyika”nti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “ahaṃ ekadivaseneva
atk-s0513a2:248_3: vīsayojanasataṃ āgato, ajjevekarattiṃ mayhameva okāsaṃ karotha, ito tatiyadivase
atk-s0513a2:248_4: hatthimaṅgalaṃ bhavissati, ahaṃ ekeneva uddesamaggena sabbaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a2:248_5: ācariyaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā ācariyassa bhuttakāle sayaṃ bhuñjitvā ācariyassa pāde dhovitvā
atk-s0513a2:248_6: sahassatthavikaṃ purato ṭhapetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno pariyattiṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a2:248_7: aruṇe uggacchante tayo vede ca hatthisuttañca niṭṭhapetvā “aññopi atthi, ācariyā”ti
atk-s0513a2:248_8: pucchitvā “natthi tāta, sabbaṃ niṭṭhita”nti vutte “ācariya, imasmiṃ ganthe ettakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:248_9: padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ, ettakaṃ sajjhāyasammohaṭṭhānaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya tumhe antevāsike
atk-s0513a2:248_10: evaṃ vāceyyāthā”ti ācariyassa sippaṃ sodhetvā pātova bhuñjitvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a2:248_11: ekadivaseneva bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā mātaraṃ vanditvā “uggahitaṃ te, tāta, sippa”nti
atk-s0513a2:249_0: Punadivase hatthimaṅgalachaṇo paṭiyādiyittha. Satamatte hatthisoṇḍālaṅkāre ca suvaṇṇaddhaje
atk-s0513a2:249_1: hemajālasañchanne katvā ṭhapesuṃ, rājaṅgaṇaṃ alaṅkariṃsu. Brāhmaṇā “mayaṃ hatthimaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:249_2: karissāma, mayaṃ karissāmā”ti maṇḍitapasādhitā aṭṭhaṃsu. Susīmopi rājā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0513a2:249_3: upakaraṇabhaṇḍaṃ gāhāpetvā maṅgalaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisattopi kumāraparihārena
atk-s0513a2:249_4: alaṅkato attano parisāya purakkhataparivārito rañño santikaṃ gantvā “saccaṃ kira,
atk-s0513a2:249_5: mahārāja, tumhe amhākaṃ vaṃsañca attano vaṃsañca nāsetvā ‘aññehi brāhmaṇehi hatthimaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:249_6: kāretvā hatthālaṅkārañca upakaraṇāni ca tesaṃ dassāmā’ti avacutthā”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:252: Te te dadāmīti susīma brūsi, anussaraṃ pettipitāmahāna”nti.
atk-s0513a2:253_0: Tattha te te dadāmīti susīma brūsīti te ete tava santake “kāḷā migā setadantā”ti
atk-s0513a2:253_1: evaṃ gate parosataṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite hatthī aññesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dadāmīti saccaṃ
atk-s0513a2:253_2: kira, bho susīma, evaṃ brūsīti attho. Anussaraṃ pettipitāmahānanti amhākañca attano
atk-s0513a2:253_3: ca vaṃse pitupitāmahānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ sarantoyeva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – mahārāja, yāva sattamakulaparivaṭṭā
atk-s0513a2:253_4: tumhākaṃ pettipitāmahānaṃ amhākaṃ pettipitāmahā ca hatthimaṅgalaṃ karonti, so tvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:253_5: evaṃ anussarantopi amhākañca attano ca vaṃsaṃ nāsetvā saccaṃ kira evaṃ brūsīti.
atk-s0513a2:254: Susīmo rājā bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:257: Te te dadāmīti vadāmi māṇava, anussaraṃ pettipitāmahāna”nti.
atk-s0513a2:258_0: Tattha te te dadāmīti te ete hatthī aññesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dadāmīti saccameva māṇava
atk-s0513a2:258_1: vadāmi, neva hatthī brāhmaṇānaṃ dadāmīti attho. Anussaranti pettipitāmahānaṃ kiriyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:258_2: anussarāmiyeva, no nānussarāmi, amhākaṃ pettipitāmahānaṃ hatthimaṅgalaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:258_3: pettipitāmahā karontīti pana anussarantopi evaṃ vadāmiyevāti adhippāyenevamāha.
atk-s0513a2:259_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto etadavoca – “mahārāja, amhākañca attano ca vaṃsaṃ anussarantoyeva
atk-s0513a2:259_1: kasmā maṃ ṭhapetvā aññehi hatthimaṅgalaṃ kārāpethā”ti. “Tvaṃ kira, tāta, tayo vede
atk-s0513a2:259_2: hatthisuttañca na jānāsī”ti mayhaṃ ārocesuṃ, tenāhaṃ aññehi brāhmaṇehi kārāpemīti.
atk-s0513a2:259_3: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ettakesu brāhmaṇesu ekabrāhmaṇopi tīsu vedesu vā hatthisuttesu
atk-s0513a2:259_4: vā ekadesampi yadi mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samatto atthi, uṭṭhahatu, tayopi vede hatthisuttañca
atk-s0513a2:259_5: saddhiṃ hatthimaṅgalakaraṇena maṃ ṭhapetvā añño sakalajambudīpepi jānanto nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0513a2:259_6: sīhanādaṃ nadi. Ekabrāhmaṇopi tassa paṭisattu hutvā uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:259_7: attano kulavaṃsaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:260_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:260_1: keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino, keci arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:260_2: “Tadā mātā mahāmāyā ahosi, pitā suddhodanamahārājā, susīmo rājā ānando, disāpāmokkho
atk-s0513a2:260_3: ācariyo sāriputto, māṇavo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:264_0: Yaṃ nu gijjho yojanasatanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mātuposakabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a2:264_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sāmajātake āvibhavissati. Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ
atk-s0513a2:264_2: kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, gihī posesī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kiṃ pana te hontī”ti
atk-s0513a2:264_3: pucchitvā “mātāpitaro me, bhante”ti vutte “sādhu sādhū”ti tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā
atk-s0513a2:264_4: “mā, bhikkhave, imaṃ bhikkhuṃ ujjhāyittha, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi guṇavasena aññātakānampi
atk-s0513a2:264_5: upakāraṃ akaṃsu, imassa pana mātāpitūnaṃ upakārakaraṇaṃ bhāroyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:265_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto gijjhakūṭapabbate gijjhayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:265_1: nibbattitvā mātāpitaro poseti. Athekasmiṃ kāle mahatī vātavuṭṭhi ahosi. Gijjhā vātavuṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a2:265_2: sahituṃ asakkontā sītabhayena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā pākārasamīpe ca parikhāsamīpe ca sītena
atk-s0513a2:265_3: kampamānā nisīdiṃsu. Tadā bārāṇasiseṭṭhi nagarā nikkhamitvā nhāyituṃ gacchanto te
atk-s0513a2:265_4: gijjhe kilamante disvā ekasmiṃ anovassakaṭṭhāne sannipātetvā aggiṃ kārāpetvā gosusānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:265_5: pesetvā gomaṃsaṃ āharāpetvā tesaṃ dāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Gijjhā vūpasantāya vātavuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0513a2:265_6: kallasarīrā hutvā pabbatameva agamaṃsu. Te tattheva sannipatitvā evaṃ mantayiṃsu
atk-s0513a2:265_7: – “bārāṇasiseṭṭhinā amhākaṃ upakāro kato, katūpakārassa ca nāma paccupakāraṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0513a2:265_8: vaṭṭati, tasmā ito paṭṭhāya tumhesu yo yaṃ vatthaṃ vā ābharaṇaṃ vā labhati, tena
atk-s0513a2:266_0: Tato paṭṭhāya gijjhā manussānaṃ vatthābharaṇāni ātape sukkhāpentānaṃ pamādaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0513a2:266_1: senā viya maṃsapesiṃ sahasā gahetvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa gehe ākāsaṅgaṇe pātenti. So
atk-s0513a2:266_2: gijjhānaṃ āharaṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā sabbāni tāni visuṃyeva ṭhapesi. “Gijjhā nagaraṃ vilumpantī”ti
atk-s0513a2:266_3: rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā “ekaṃ gijjhampi tāva gaṇhatha, sabbaṃ āharāpessāmī”ti tattha
atk-s0513a2:266_4: tattha pāse ceva jālāni ca oḍḍāpesi. Mātuposakagijjho pāse bajjhi, taṃ gahetvā “rañño
atk-s0513a2:266_5: dassessāmā”ti nenti. Bārāṇasiseṭṭhi rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto te manusse gijjhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:266_6: gacchante disvā “mā imaṃ gijjhaṃ bādhayiṃsū”ti saddhiññeva agamāsi. Gijjhaṃ rañño
atk-s0513a2:266_7: dassesuṃ. Atha naṃ rājā pucchi – “tumhe nagaraṃ vilumpitvā vatthādīni gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:266_9: “Amhākaṃ tena jīvitaṃ dvinnaṃ, upakārassa nāma paccupakāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā
atk-s0513a2:266_10: adamhā”ti. Atha naṃ rājā “gijjhā kira yojanasatamatthake ṭhatvā kuṇapaṃ passanti,
atk-s0513a2:266_11: kasmā tvaṃ attano oḍḍitaṃ pāsaṃ na passasī”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:269: Kasmā jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:270_0: Tattha yanti nipātamattaṃ, nūti nāmatthe nipāto. Gijjho nāma yojanasataṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a2:270_1: ṭhitāni kuṇapāni avekkhati, passatīti attho. Āsajjāpīti āsādetvāpi, sampāpuṇitvāpīti
atk-s0513a2:270_2: attho. “Tvaṃ attano atthāya oḍḍitaṃ jālañca pāsañca patvāpi kasmā na bujjhasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a2:271: Gijjho tassa vacanaṃ sutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:274: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:276_0: Gijjhassa vacanaṃ sutvā rājā seṭṭhiṃ pucchi – “saccaṃ kira, mahāseṭṭhi, gijjhehi
atk-s0513a2:276_1: tumhākaṃ gehe vatthādīni ābhatānī”ti. “Saccaṃ, devā”ti. “Kahaṃ tānī”ti? “Deva, mayā
atk-s0513a2:276_2: tāni sabbāni visuṃ ṭhapitāni, yaṃ yesaṃ santakaṃ, taṃ tesaṃ dassāmi, imaṃ gijjhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:276_3: vissajjethā”ti gijjhaṃ vissajjāpetvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ sabbesaṃ santakāni dāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:277_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:277_1: mātuposakabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. “Tadā rājā ānando ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a2:281_0: Saddhiṃ katvā amittenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto seṇibhaṇḍanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:281_1: Vatthu heṭṭhā uragajātake kathitasadisameva. Idhāpi satthā “na, bhikkhave, ime dve
atk-s0513a2:281_2: mahāmattā idāneva mayā samaggā katā, pubbepāhaṃ ime samagge akāsiṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:282_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:282_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggahetvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:282_2: pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalāhāro
atk-s0513a2:282_3: himavantapadese vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ vammike nakulo, tasseva
atk-s0513a2:282_4: santike ekasmiṃ rukkhabile sappo ca vāsaṃ kappesi. Te ubhopi ahinakulā niccakālaṃ
atk-s0513a2:282_5: kalahaṃ karonti. Bodhisatto tesaṃ kalahe ādīnavañca mettābhāvanāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0513a2:282_6: “kalahaṃ nāma akatvā samaggavāsaṃ vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovaditvā ubhopi te samagge akāsi.
atk-s0513a2:282_7: Atha sappassa bahinikkhantakāle nakulo caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ vammikassa biladvāre sīsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:282_8: nīharitvā mukhaṃ vivaritvā nipanno assasanto passasanto niddaṃ upagañchi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:282_9: taṃ tathā niddāyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho te nissāya bhayaṃ uppanna”nti pucchanto
atk-s0513a2:285: Vivariya dāṭhaṃ sesi, kuto te bhayamāgata”nti.
atk-s0513a2:286: Tattha sandhiṃ katvāti mittabhāvaṃ karitvā. Aṇḍajenāti aṇḍakose nibbattena nāgena. Jalābujāti nakulaṃ ālapati. So hi jalābumhi jātattā “jalābujo”ti vuccati. Vivariyāti vivaritvā.
atk-s0513a2:287: Evaṃ bodhisattena vutto nakulo “ayya, paccāmitto nāma na avajānitabbo āsaṅkitabboyevā”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:291_0: Tattha abhayā bhayamuppannanti na ito te bhayamuppannanti abhayo, ko so? Mitto. Yañhi
atk-s0513a2:291_1: mittasmimpi vissāse sati tato bhayaṃ uppajjati, taṃ mūlānipi kantati, mittassa sabbarandhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:292_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “mā bhāyi, yathā sappo tayi na dubbhati, evamahaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:292_1: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ āsaṅkaṃ mā karī”ti ovaditvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā
atk-s0513a2:293: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sappo ca nakulo ca ime dve mahāmattā ahesuṃ, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:297_0: Upasāḷakanāmānīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ upasāḷakaṃ nāma susānasuddhikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:297_1: brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira aḍḍho ahosi mahaddhano, diṭṭhigatikattā pana dhuravihāre
atk-s0513a2:297_2: vasantānampi buddhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ nāma na akāsi. Putto panassa paṇḍito ahosi ñāṇasampanno.
atk-s0513a2:297_3: So mahallakakāle puttaṃ āha – “mā kho maṃ, tāta, aññassa vasalassa jhāpitasusāne
atk-s0513a2:297_4: jhāpehi, ekasmiṃ pana anucchiṭṭhasusāneyeva maṃ jhāpeyyāsī”ti. “Tāta, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:297_5: jhāpetabbayuttakaṃ ṭhānaṃ na jānāmi, sādhu vata maṃ ādāya gantvā ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne maṃ
atk-s0513a2:297_6: jhāpeyyāsī’ti tumheva ācikkhathā”ti. Brāhmaṇo “sādhu, tātā”ti taṃ ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a2:297_7: gijjhakūṭamatthakaṃ abhiruhitvā “tāta, idaṃ aññassa vasalassa ajhāpitaṭṭhānaṃ, ettha
atk-s0513a2:297_8: maṃ jhāpeyyāsī”ti vatvā puttena saddhiṃ pabbatā otarituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a2:298_0: Satthā pana taṃ divasaṃ paccūsakāle bodhaneyyabandhave olokento tesaṃ pitāputtānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:298_1: sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ addasa. Tasmā maggaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaluddako viya pabbatapādaṃ
atk-s0513a2:298_2: gantvā tesaṃ pabbatamatthakā otarantānaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdi, te otarantā satthāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:298_3: addasaṃsu. Satthā paṭisanthāraṃ karonto “kahaṃ gamissatha brāhmaṇā”ti pucchi. Māṇavo
atk-s0513a2:298_4: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā “tena hi ehi, tava pitarā ācikkhitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0513a2:298_5: ubho pitāputte gahetvā pabbatamatthakaṃ āruyha “kataraṃ ṭhāna”nti pucchi. Māṇavo
atk-s0513a2:298_6: “imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ ācikkhi, bhante”ti āha. Satthā “na kho, māṇava,
atk-s0513a2:298_7: tava pitā idāneva susānasuddhiko, pubbepi susānasuddhikova, na cesa idāneva ‘imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:298_8: ṭhāne maṃ jhāpeyyāsī’ti tava ācikkhati, pubbepi imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne attano jhāpitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:298_9: ācikkhī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:299_0: Atīte imasmiññeva rājagahe ayameva upasāḷako brāhmaṇo ayamevassa putto ahosi. Tadā
atk-s0513a2:299_1: bodhisatto magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā paripuṇṇasippo isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:299_2: abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantapadese ciraṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a2:299_3: loṇambilasevanatthāya gijjhakūṭe paṇṇasālāyaṃ vihāsi. Tadā so brāhmaṇo imināva niyāmena
atk-s0513a2:299_4: puttaṃ vatvā puttena “tumheyeva me tathārūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ ācikkhathā”ti vutte “idameva
atk-s0513a2:299_5: ṭhāna”nti ācikkhitvā puttena saddhiṃ otaranto bodhisattaṃ disvā tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0513a2:299_6: Bodhisatto imināva niyāmena pucchitvā māṇavassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ehi, tava pitarā ācikkhitaṭṭhānassa
atk-s0513a2:299_7: ucchiṭṭhabhāvaṃ vā anucchiṭṭhabhāvaṃ vā jānissāmā”ti tehi saddhiṃ pabbatamatthakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:299_8: āruyha “idaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ anucchiṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti māṇavena vutte “māṇava,
atk-s0513a2:299_9: imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne jhāpitakānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi, taveva pitā imasmiṃyeva rājagahe brāhmaṇakuleyeva
atk-s0513a2:299_10: nibbattitvā upasāḷakoyeva nāma hutvā imasmiṃyeva pabbatantare cuddasa jātisahassāni
atk-s0513a2:299_11: jhāpito. Pathaviyañhi ajhāpitaṭṭhānaṃ vā asusānaṭṭhānaṃ vā sīsānaṃ anivesitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:299_12: vā laddhuṃ na sakkā”ti pubbenivāsañāṇena paricchinditvā imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0513a2:302: Asmiṃ padese daḍḍhāni, natthi loke anāmataṃ.
atk-s0513a2:304: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0513a2:305: Etaṃ ariyā sevanti, etaṃ loke anāmata”nti.
atk-s0513a2:306_0: Tattha anāmatanti mataṭṭhānaṃ. Tañhi upacāravasena “amata”nti vuccati, taṃ paṭisedhento
atk-s0513a2:306_1: “anāmata”nti āha. “Anamata”ntipi pāṭho, lokasmiñhi anamataṭṭhānaṃ asusānaṃ nāma natthīti
atk-s0513a2:306_2: attho. Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yasmiṃ puggale catusaccavatthukaṃ pubbabhāgasaccañāṇañca
atk-s0513a2:306_3: lokuttaradhammo ca atthi. Ahiṃsāti paresaṃ avihesā aviheṭhanā. Saṃyamoti sīlasaṃyamo.
atk-s0513a2:306_4: Damoti indriyadamanaṃ. Idañca guṇajātaṃ yamhi puggale atthi, etaṃ ariyā sevantīti,
atk-s0513a2:306_5: ariyā buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca etaṃ ṭhānaṃ sevanti, evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:306_6: upasaṅkamanti bhajantīti attho. Etaṃ loke anāmatanti etaṃ guṇajātaṃ loke amatabhāvasādhanato anāmataṃ nāma.
atk-s0513a2:307: Evaṃ bodhisatto pitāputtānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:308_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a2:308_1: saccapariyosāne ubho pitāputtā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. “Tadā pitāputtāva etarahi
atk-s0513a2:308_2: pitāputtā ahesuṃ, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:312_0: Abhutvā bhikkhasi bhikkhūti idaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya tapodārāme viharanto
atk-s0513a2:312_1: samiddhitheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Ekadivasañhi āyasmā samiddhi sabbarattiṃ padhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:312_2: padahitvā aruṇuggamanavelāya nhatvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ attabhāvaṃ sukkhāpayamāno antaravāsakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:312_3: nivāsetvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ hatthena gahetvā aṭṭhāsi suparikammakatā viya suvaṇṇapaṭimā.
atk-s0513a2:312_4: Attabhāvasamiddhiyāyeva hissa “samiddhī”ti nāmaṃ ahosi. Athassa sarīrasobhaggaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a2:312_5: ekā devadhītā paṭibaddhacittā theraṃ evamāha – “tvaṃ khosi, bhikkhu, daharo yuvā
atk-s0513a2:312_6: susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko, evarūpassa
atk-s0513a2:312_7: tava kāme aparibhuñjitvā ko attho pabbajjāya, kāme tāva paribhuñjassu, pacchā pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:312_8: samaṇadhammaṃ karissasī”ti. Atha naṃ thero āha – “devadhīte, ‘asukasmiṃ nāma vaye
atk-s0513a2:312_9: ṭhito marissāmī’ti mama maraṇakālaṃ na jānāmi, esa me kālo paṭicchanno, tasmā taruṇakāleyeva
atk-s0513a2:312_10: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī”ti. Sā therassa santikā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:312_11: alabhitvā tattheva antaradhāyi. Thero satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a2:312_12: Satthā “na kho, samiddhi, tvaññeva etarahi devadhītāya palobhito, pubbepi devadhītaro
atk-s0513a2:312_13: pabbajite palobhiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:313_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kāsigāmake brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:313_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā
atk-s0513a2:313_2: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavantapadese ekaṃ jātassaraṃ nissāya vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a2:313_3: So sabbarattiṃ padhānaṃ padahitvā aruṇuggamanavelāya nhatvā ekaṃ vakkalaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0513a2:313_4: ekaṃ hatthena gahetvā sarīraṃ vodakaṃ karonto aṭṭhāsi. Athassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:313_5: attabhāvaṃ oloketvā paṭibaddhacittā ekā devadhītā bodhisattaṃ palobhayamānā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:315: “Abhutvā bhikkhasi bhikkhu, na hi bhutvāna bhikkhasi;
atk-s0513a2:316: Bhutvāna bhikkhu bhikkhassu, mā taṃ kālo upaccagā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:317_0: Tattha abhutvā bhikkhasi bhikkhūti bhikkhu tvaṃ daharakāle kilesakāmavasena vatthukāme
atk-s0513a2:317_1: abhutvāva bhikkhāya carasi. Na hi bhutvāna bhikkhasīti nanu nāma pañca kāmaguṇe bhutvā
atk-s0513a2:317_2: bhikkhāya caritabbaṃ, kāme abhutvāva bhikkhācariyaṃ upagatosi. Bhutvāna bhikkhu bhikkhassūti
atk-s0513a2:317_3: bhikkhu daharakāle tāva kāme bhuñjitvā pacchā mahallakakāle bhikkhassu. Mā taṃ kālo
atk-s0513a2:317_4: upaccagāti ayaṃ kāme bhuñjanakālo daharakālo, taṃ mā atikkamatūti.
atk-s0513a2:318: Bodhisatto devatāya vacanaṃ sutvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:320: “Kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmi, channo kālo na dissati;
atk-s0513a2:321: Tasmā abhutvā bhikkhāmi, mā maṃ kālo upaccagā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:322_0: Tattha kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmīti voti nipātamattaṃ. Ahaṃ pana “paṭhamavaye vā mayā
atk-s0513a2:322_1: maritabbaṃ majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā”ti evaṃ attano maraṇakālaṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0513a2:325_0: Channo kālo na dissatīti yasmā “asukasmiṃ nāma vayakāle hemantādiutukāle vā mayā
atk-s0513a2:325_1: maritabba”nti mayhampesa channo hutvā kālo na dissati, suppaṭicchanno hutvā ṭhito
atk-s0513a2:325_2: na paññāyati. Tasmā abhutvā bhikkhāmīti tena kāraṇena pañca kāmaguṇe abhutvā bhikkhāmi.
atk-s0513a2:325_3: Mā maṃ kālo upaccagāti maṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇakālo mā atikkamatūti attho. Iminā kāraṇena
atk-s0513a2:325_4: daharova samāno pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karomīti. Devadhītā bodhisattassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:326: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā devadhītā ayaṃ devadhītā ahosi, ahameva tena samayena tāpaso ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:330_0: Seno balasā patamānoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attajjhāsayaṃ sakuṇovādasuttaṃ
atk-s0513a2:330_1: ārabbha kathesi. Ekadivasañhi satthā bhikkhū āmantetvā “gocare, bhikkhave, caratha
atk-s0513a2:330_2: sake pettike visaye”ti imaṃ saṃyuttamahāvagge suttantaṃ kathento “tumhe tāva tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0513a2:330_3: pubbe tiracchānagatāpi sakaṃ pettikavisayaṃ pahāya agocare carantā paccāmittānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:330_4: hatthapathaṃ gantvāpi attano paññāsampattiyā upāyakosallena paccāmittānaṃ hatthā
atk-s0513a2:331_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto lāpasakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:331_1: naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇe leḍḍuṭṭhāne vāsaṃ kappesi. So ekadivasaṃ “sakavisaye gocaragahaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:331_2: pahāya paravisaye gocaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti aṭavipariyantaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ tattha
atk-s0513a2:331_3: gocaraṃ gaṇhantaṃ disvā sakuṇagghi sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi. So sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno
atk-s0513a2:331_4: evaṃ paridevasi – “mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṃ appapuññā, ye mayaṃ agocare carimha
atk-s0513a2:331_5: paravisaye, sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye, na myāyaṃ sakuṇagghi
atk-s0513a2:331_6: alaṃ abhavissa yadidaṃ yuddhāyā”ti. “Ko pana, te lāpa, gocaro sako pettiko visayo”ti?
atk-s0513a2:331_7: “Yadidaṃ naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṃ leḍḍuṭṭhāna”nti. Atha naṃ sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā
atk-s0513a2:331_8: amuñci – “gaccha kho, tvaṃ lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī”ti. So tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a2:331_9: mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā “ehi kho dāni sakuṇagghī”ti senaṃ avhayanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:331_10: Sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpasakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā.
atk-s0513a2:331_11: Yadā pana taṃ lāpo “bahuāgatā kho myāyaṃ sakuṇagghī”ti aññāsi, atha parivattitvā
atk-s0513a2:331_12: tasseva leḍḍussa antaraṃ paccāpādi. Sakuṇagghi vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī tattheva
atk-s0513a2:331_13: uraṃ paccatāḷesi. Evaṃ sā bhinnena hadayena nikkhantehi akkhīhi jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a2:332_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ dassetvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatāpi agocare carantā sapattahatthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:332_1: gacchanti, gocare pana sake pettike visaye carantā sapatte niggaṇhanti, tasmā tumhepi
atk-s0513a2:332_2: mā agocare caratha paravisaye. Agocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ paravisaye lacchati māro
atk-s0513a2:332_3: otāraṃ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ. Ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
atk-s0513a2:332_4: Yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā. Katame pañca? Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā…pe… ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno
atk-s0513a2:332_5: agocaro paravisayo”ti vatvā abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:336_0: Tattha balasā patamānoti “lāpaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti balena thāmena patamāno. Gocaraṭhāyinanti
atk-s0513a2:336_1: sakavisayā nikkhamitvā gocaratthāya aṭavipariyante ṭhitaṃ. Ajjhappattoti sampatto.
atk-s0513a2:336_2: Maraṇaṃ tenupāgamīti tena kāraṇena maraṇaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a2:337: Tasmiṃ pana maraṇaṃ patte lāpo nikkhamitvā “diṭṭhā vata me paccāmittassa piṭṭhī”ti tassa hadaye ṭhatvā udānaṃ udānento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:341: Tattha nayenāti upāyena. Atthamattanoti attano arogabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ.
atk-s0513a2:342_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:342_1: bahū bhikkhū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. “Tadā seno devadatto ahosi, lāpo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:346_0: Yo ve mettena cittenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mettasuttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:346_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā bhikkhū āmantesi – “mettāya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya
atk-s0513a2:346_2: bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya
atk-s0513a2:346_3: ekādasānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā. Katame ekādasa? Sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, na
atk-s0513a2:346_4: pāpakaṃ supinaṃ passati, manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, devatā rakkhanti,
atk-s0513a2:346_5: nāssa aggi vā visaṃ vā satthaṃ vā kamati, tuvaṭaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati, mukhavaṇṇo
atk-s0513a2:346_6: vippasīdati, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, uttari appaṭivijjhanto brahmalokūpago hoti.
atk-s0513a2:346_7: Mettāya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyā āsevitāya…pe… susamāraddhāya ime ekādasānisaṃsā
atk-s0513a2:346_8: pāṭikaṅkhā”ti. Ime ekādasānisaṃse gahetvā ṭhitaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ vaṇṇetvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:346_9: bhikkhunā nāma sabbasattesu odissakānodissakavasena mettā bhāvetabbā, hitopi hitena
atk-s0513a2:346_10: pharitabbo, ahitopi hitena pharitabbo, majjhattopi hitena pharitabbo. Evaṃ sabbasattesu
atk-s0513a2:346_11: odissakānodissakavasena mettā bhāvetabbā, karuṇā muditā upekkhā bhāvetabbā, catūsu
atk-s0513a2:346_12: brahmavihāresu kammaṃ kātabbameva. Evaṃ karonto hi maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā alabhantopi
atk-s0513a2:346_13: brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi satta vassāni mettaṃ bhāvetvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe
atk-s0513a2:347_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ kappe bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:347_1: pabbajitvā catunnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ lābhī arako nāma satthā hutvā himavantapadese
atk-s0513a2:347_2: vāsaṃ kappesi, tassa mahā parivāro ahosi. So isigaṇaṃ ovadanto “pabbajitena nāma
atk-s0513a2:347_3: mettā bhāvetabbā, karuṇā muditā upekkhā bhāvetabbā. Mettacittañhi nāmetaṃ appanāppattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:347_4: brahmalokaparāyaṇataṃ sādhetī”ti mettāya ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a2:350: Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, appamāṇena sabbaso.
atk-s0513a2:353: Yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ, na taṃ tatrāvasissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:354_0: Tattha yo ve mettena cittena, sabbalokānukampatīti khattiyādīsu vā samaṇabrāhmaṇesu
atk-s0513a2:354_1: vā yo koci appamāṇena mettena cittena sakalaṃ sattalokaṃ anukampati. Uddhanti pathavito
atk-s0513a2:354_2: yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabrahmalokā. Adhoti pathaviyā heṭṭhā ussade mahāniraye.
atk-s0513a2:354_3: Tiriyanti manussaloke, yattakāni cakkavāḷāni ca tesu sabbesu ettake ṭhāne nibbattā
atk-s0513a2:354_4: sabbe sattā averā hontu, abyāpajjhā anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti evaṃ bhāvitena
atk-s0513a2:354_5: mettena cittenāti attho. Appamāṇenāti appamāṇasattānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇattā appamāṇena.
atk-s0513a2:354_6: Sabbasoti sabbākārena, uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti evaṃ sabbasugatiduggativasenāti attho.
atk-s0513a2:355_0: Appamāṇaṃ hitaṃ cittanti appamāṇaṃ katvā bhāvitaṃ sabbasattesu hitacittaṃ. Paripuṇṇanti
atk-s0513a2:355_1: avikalaṃ. Subhāvitanti suvaḍḍhitaṃ, appanācittassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yaṃ pamāṇakataṃ kammanti
atk-s0513a2:355_2: yaṃ “appamāṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇa”nti evaṃ ārammaṇattikavasena ca vasībhāvappattivasena
atk-s0513a2:355_3: ca avaḍḍhitvā kataṃ parittaṃ kāmāvacarakammaṃ. Na taṃ tatrāvasissatīti taṃ parittaṃ
atk-s0513a2:355_4: kammaṃ yaṃ taṃ “appamāṇaṃ hitaṃ citta”nti saṅkhagataṃ rūpāvacarakammaṃ, tatra na
atk-s0513a2:355_5: avasissati. Yathā nāma mahoghena ajjhotthaṭaṃ parittodakaṃ oghassa abbhantare tena
atk-s0513a2:355_6: asaṃhīramānaṃ nāvasissati na tiṭṭhati, atha kho mahoghova taṃ ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a2:355_7: evameva taṃ parittakammaṃ tassa mahaggatakammassa abbhantare tena mahaggatakammena
atk-s0513a2:355_8: acchinditvā aggahitavipākokāsaṃ hutvā na avasissati na tiṭṭhati, na sakkoti attano
atk-s0513a2:355_9: vipākaṃ dātuṃ, atha kho mahaggatakammameva taṃ ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati vipākaṃ detīti.
atk-s0513a2:356: Evaṃ bodhisatto antevāsikānaṃ mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbattitvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe na imaṃ lokaṃ puna agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:357: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā isigaṇo buddhaparisā ahosi, arako pana satthā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:361: Nāyaṃ pure uṇṇamatīti idaṃ kakaṇṭakajātakaṃ mahāumaṅgajātake āvibhavissati.
atk-s0513a2:371_0: Kalyāṇadhammoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ badhirasassuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:371_1: Sāvatthiyañhi eko kuṭumbiko saddho pasanno tisaraṇagato pañcasīlena samannāgato.
atk-s0513a2:371_2: So ekadivasaṃ bahūni sappiādīni bhesajjāni ceva pupphagandhavatthādīni ca gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:371_3: “jetavane satthu santike dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti agamāsi. Tassa tattha gatakāle sassu
atk-s0513a2:371_4: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ gahetvā dhītaraṃ daṭṭhukāmā taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi, sā ca thokaṃ badhiradhātukā
atk-s0513a2:371_5: hoti. Sā dhītarā saddhiṃ bhuttabhojanā bhattasammadaṃ vinodayamānā dhītaraṃ pucchi
atk-s0513a2:371_6: – “kiṃ, amma, bhattā te sammodamāno avivadamāno piyasaṃvāsaṃ vasatī”ti. “Kiṃ, amma,
atk-s0513a2:371_7: kathetha yādiso tumhākaṃ jāmātā sīlena ceva ācārasampadāya ca, tādiso pabbajitopi
atk-s0513a2:371_8: dullabho”ti. Upāsikā dhītu vacanaṃ sādhukaṃ asallakkhetvā “pabbajito”ti padameva
atk-s0513a2:371_9: gahetvā “amma, kasmā te bhattā pabbajito”ti mahāsaddaṃ akāsi. Taṃ sutvā sakalagehavāsino
atk-s0513a2:371_10: “amhākaṃ kira kuṭumbiko pabbajito”ti viraviṃsu. Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā dvārena sañcarantā
atk-s0513a2:371_11: “kiṃ nāma kireta”nti pucchiṃsu. “Imasmiṃ kira gehe kuṭumbiko pabbajito”ti. Sopi kho
atk-s0513a2:371_12: kuṭumbiko dasabalassa dhammaṃ sutvā vihārā nikkhamma nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a2:372_0: Atha naṃ antarāmaggeyeva eko puriso disvā “samma, tvaṃ kira pabbajitoti tava gehe
atk-s0513a2:372_1: puttadāraparijano paridevatī”ti āha. Athassa etadahosi – “ayaṃ apabbajitameva kira
atk-s0513a2:372_2: maṃ ‘pabbajito’ti vadati, uppanno kho pana me kalyāṇasaddo na antaradhāpetabbo, ajjeva
atk-s0513a2:372_3: mayā pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tatova nivattitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a2:372_4: upāsaka, idāneva buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ katvā gantvā idāneva paccāgatosī”ti vutte tamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:372_5: ārocetvā “bhante, kalyāṇasaddo nāma uppanno na antaradhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā pabbajitukāmo
atk-s0513a2:372_6: hutvā āgatomhī”ti āha. So pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā sammā paṭipanno nacirasseva
atk-s0513a2:372_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Idaṃ kira kāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:372_8: bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, asuko nāma kuṭumbiko ‘uppanno kalyāṇasaddo
atk-s0513a2:372_9: na antaradhāpetabbo’ti pabbajitvā idāni arahattaṃ patto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0513a2:372_10: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:372_11: porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi ‘uppanno kalyāṇasaddo virādhetuṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti pabbajiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:373_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a2:373_1: pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. So ekadivasaṃ nivesanā nikkhamitvā rājupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:373_2: agamāsi. Athassa sassu “dhītaraṃ passissāmī”ti taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi, sā thokaṃ badhiradhātukāti
atk-s0513a2:373_3: sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva. Taṃ pana rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano gharaṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:373_4: disvā eko puriso “tumhe kira pabbajitāti tumhākaṃ gehe mahāparidevo pavattatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:373_5: āha. Bodhisatto “uppanno kalyāṇasaddo nāma na antaradhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tatova nivattitvā
atk-s0513a2:373_6: rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, mahāseṭṭhi, idāneva gantvā puna āgatosī”ti vutte “deva,
atk-s0513a2:373_7: gehajano kira maṃ apabbajitameva ‘pabbajito’ti vatvā paridevati, uppanno kho pana
atk-s0513a2:373_8: kalyāṇasaddo na antaradhāpetabbo, pabbajissāmahaṃ, pabbajjaṃ me anujānāhī”ti etamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:376: Tasmā na hiyyetha naro sapañño, hiriyāpi santo ghuramādiyanti.
atk-s0513a2:378: “Sāyaṃ samaññā idha majja pattā, kalyāṇadhammoti janinda loke;
atk-s0513a2:379: Tāhaṃ samekkhaṃ idha pabbajissaṃ, na hi matthi chando idha kāmabhoge”ti.
atk-s0513a2:380_0: Tattha kalyāṇadhammoti sundaradhammo. Samaññaṃ anupāpuṇātīti yadā sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo
atk-s0513a2:380_1: pabbajitoti idaṃ paññattivohāraṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā na hiyyethāti tato sāmaññato na
atk-s0513a2:380_2: parihāyetha. Hiriyāpi santo dhuramādiyantīti, mahārāja, sappurisā nāma ajjhattasamuṭṭhitāya
atk-s0513a2:380_3: hiriyā bahiddhasamuṭṭhitena ottappenapi etaṃ pabbajitadhuraṃ gaṇhanti. Idha majja
atk-s0513a2:380_4: pattāti idha mayā ajja pattā. Tāhaṃ samekkhanti taṃ ahaṃ guṇavasena laddhasamaññaṃ
atk-s0513a2:380_5: samekkhanto passanto. Na hi matthi chandoti na hi me atthi chando. Idha kāmabhogeti
atk-s0513a2:381: Bodhisatto evaṃ vatvā rājānaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā himavantapadesaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:382: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:386_0: Ko nu saddena mahatāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:386_1: Tasmiñhi kāle bahū bahussutā bhikkhū manosilātale nadamānā taruṇasīhā viya ākāsagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a2:386_2: otārentā viya saṅghamajjhe sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇanti. Kokāliko tesu sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇantesu
atk-s0513a2:386_3: attano tucchabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva “ahampi sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ antaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:386_4: pavisitvā “amhākaṃ sarabhāṇaṃ na pāpenti. Sace amhākampi pāpeyyuṃ, mayampi bhaṇeyyāmā”ti
atk-s0513a2:386_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa nāmaṃ aggahetvāva tattha tattha kathento āhiṇḍati. Tassa sā kathā
atk-s0513a2:386_6: bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭā jātā. Bhikkhū “vīmaṃsissāma tāva na”nti saññāya evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a2:386_7: “āvuso kokālika, ajja saṅghassa sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti. So attano balaṃ ajānitvāva
atk-s0513a2:386_8: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “ajja sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti attano sappāyaṃ yāguṃ pivi,
atk-s0513a2:387_0: Sūriye atthaṅgate dhammassavanakāle ghosite bhikkhusaṅgho sannipati. So kaṇṭakuraṇḍakavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:387_1: kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a2:387_2: there vanditvā alaṅkataratanamaṇḍape paññattavaradhammāsanaṃ abhiruhitvā citrabījaniṃ
atk-s0513a2:387_3: gahetvā “sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti nisīdi, tāvadevassa sarīrā sedā mucciṃsu, sārajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:387_4: okkami, pubbagāthāya paṭhamaṃ padaṃ udāharitvā anantaraṃ na passi. So kampamāno āsanā
atk-s0513a2:387_5: oruyha lajjito saṅghamajjhato apakkamma attano pariveṇaṃ agamāsi. Añño bahussuto
atk-s0513a2:387_6: bhikkhu sarabhāṇaṃ bhaṇi. Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhū tassa tucchabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:387_7: dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, paṭhamaṃ kokālikassa tucchabhāvo
atk-s0513a2:387_8: dujjāno, idāni panesa sayaṃ naditvā pākaṭo jāto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a2:387_9: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:387_10: kokāliko idāneva naditvā pākaṭo jāto, pubbepi naditvā pākaṭo ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:388_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavantapadese sīhayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:388_1: nibbattitvā bahūnaṃ sīhānaṃ rājā ahosi. So anekasīhaparivāro rajataguhāyaṃ vāsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:388_2: kappesi. Tassa avidūre ekissāya guhāya eko siṅgālopi vasati. Athekadivasaṃ deve vassitvā
atk-s0513a2:388_3: vigate sabbe sīhā sīharājasseva guhadvāre sannipatitvā sīhanādaṃ nadantā sīhakīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a2:388_4: kīḷiṃsu. Tesaṃ evaṃ naditvā kīḷanakāle sopi siṅgālo nadati. Sīhā tassa saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a2:388_5: “ayaṃ siṅgālo amhehi saddhiṃ nadatī”ti lajjitā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ tuṇhībhūtakāle
atk-s0513a2:388_6: bodhisattassa putto sīhapotako “tāta, ime sīhā naditvā sīhakīḷaṃ kīḷantā etassa saddaṃ
atk-s0513a2:388_7: sutvā lajjāya tuṇhī jātā, ko nāmesa attano saddena attānaṃ jānāpetī”ti pitaraṃ pucchanto
atk-s0513a2:391: Taṃ sīhā nappaṭinadanti, ko nāmeso migādhibhū”ti.
atk-s0513a2:392: Tattha abhinādeti daddaranti daddaraṃ rajatapabbataṃ ekanādaṃ karoti. Migādhibhūti pitaraṃ ālapati. Ayañhettha attho – migādhibhū migajeṭṭhaka sīharāja pucchāmi taṃ “ko nāmeso”ti.
atk-s0513a2:393: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā pitā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:397: Tattha samaccareti santi upasaggamattaṃ, accantīti attho, tuṇhī hutvā nisīdantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Potthakesu pana “samacchare”ti likhanti.
atk-s0513a2:398_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, kokāliko idāneva attano nādena attānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti, pubbepi
atk-s0513a2:398_1: akāsiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā siṅgālo
atk-s0513a2:398_2: kokāliko ahosi, sīhapotako rāhulo, sīharājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:402_0: Tātamāṇavako esoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:402_1: Vatthu pakiṇṇakanipāte uddālakajātake āvibhavissati. Tadā pana satthā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:402_2: nāyaṃ bhikkhu idāneva kuhako, pubbepi makkaṭo hutvā aggissa kāraṇā kohaññaṃ akāsiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:403_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kāsigāmake brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:403_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapesi. Athassa
atk-s0513a2:403_2: brāhmaṇī ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyitvā puttassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a2:403_3: Bodhisatto tassā petakiccaṃ katvā “kiṃ me dāni gharāvāsena, puttaṃ gahetvā pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:403_4: assumukhaṃ ñātimittavaggaṃ pahāya puttaṃ ādāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:403_5: pabbajitvā tattha vanamūlaphalāhāro vāsaṃ kappesi. So ekadivasaṃ vassānakāle deve
atk-s0513a2:403_6: vassante sāradārūni aggiṃ jāletvā visibbanto phalakatthare nipajji, puttopissa tāpasakumārako
atk-s0513a2:404_0: Atheko vanamakkaṭo sītena pīḷiyamāno tassa paṇṇasālāya taṃ aggiṃ disvā “sacāhaṃ ettha
atk-s0513a2:404_1: pavisissāmi, ‘makkaṭo makkaṭo’ti maṃ pothetvā nīharissanti, aggiṃ visibbetuṃ na labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:404_2: atthi dāni me upāyo, tāpasavesaṃ gahetvā kohaññaṃ katvā pavisissāmī”ti cintetvā ekassa
atk-s0513a2:404_3: matatāpasassa vakkalāni nivāsetvā pacchiñca aṅkusayaṭṭhiñca gahetvā paṇṇasāladvāre
atk-s0513a2:404_4: ekaṃ tālarukkhaṃ nissāya saṃkuṭito aṭṭhāsi. Tāpasakumārako taṃ disvā makkaṭabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:404_5: ajānanto “eko mahallakatāpaso sītena pīḷito aggiṃ visibbetuṃ āgato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:404_6: pitu tāpasassa kathetvā “etaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavesetvā visibbāpessāmī”ti cintetvā pitaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:408_0: Tattha māṇavakoti sattādhivacanaṃ. Tena “tāta, eso eko māṇavako satto eko tāpaso”ti
atk-s0513a2:408_1: dīpeti. Tālamūlaṃ apassitoti tālakkhandhaṃ nissāya ṭhito. Agārakañcidaṃ atthīti idañca
atk-s0513a2:408_2: amhākaṃ pabbajitāgāraṃ atthi, paṇṇasālaṃ sandhāya vadati. Handāti vavassaggatthe
atk-s0513a2:408_3: nipāto. Demassagārakanti etassa ekamante vasanatthāya agārakaṃ dema.
atk-s0513a2:409_0: Bodhisatto puttassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāya paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā olokento tassa makkaṭabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:409_1: ñatvā “tāta, manussānaṃ nāma na evarūpaṃ mukhaṃ hoti, makkaṭo esa, nayidha pakkositabbo”ti
atk-s0513a2:411: “Mā kho tvaṃ tāta pakkosi, dūseyya no agārakaṃ;
atk-s0513a2:413_0: Tattha dūseyya no agārakanti ayañhi idha paviṭṭho samāno imaṃ kicchena kataṃ paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a2:413_1: agginā vā jhāpento uccārādīni vā karonto dūseyya. Netādisanti “etādisaṃ brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a2:413_2: susīlino mukhaṃ na hoti, makkaṭo eso”ti vatvā bodhisatto ekaṃ ummukaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ
atk-s0513a2:413_3: ettha tiṭṭhasī”ti khipitvā taṃ palāpesi. Makkaṭo vakkalāni chaḍḍetvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a2:413_4: vanasaṇḍaṃ pāvisi. Bodhisatto cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:414: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā makkaṭo ayaṃ kuhakabhikkhu ahosi, tāpasakumāro rāhulo, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:418_0: Adamha te vāri pahūtarūpanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:418_1: Ekadivasañhi dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū devadattassa akataññumittadubbhibhāvaṃ kathentā
atk-s0513a2:418_2: nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva akataññū mittadubbhī,
atk-s0513a2:418_3: pubbepi evarūpo ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:419_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kāsigāmake brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:419_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ pana samaye kāsiraṭṭhe vattanimahāmagge
atk-s0513a2:419_2: eko gambhīro udapāno hoti anotaraṇīyo tiracchānānaṃ, maggappaṭipannā puññatthikā
atk-s0513a2:419_3: manussā dīgharajjukena vārakena udakaṃ ussiñcitvā ekissā doṇiyā pūretvā tiracchānānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:419_4: pānīyaṃ denti. Tassa sāmantato mahantaṃ araññaṃ, tattha bahū makkaṭā vasanti. Atha
atk-s0513a2:419_5: tasmiṃ magge dve tīṇi divasāni manussasañcāro pacchijji, tiracchānā pānīyaṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:419_6: Eko makkaṭo pipāsāturo hutvā pānīyaṃ pariyesanto udapānassa santike vicarati. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:419_7: kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā tattha gacchanto pānīyaṃ uttāretvā
atk-s0513a2:419_8: pivitvā hatthapāde dhovitvā ṭhito taṃ makkaṭaṃ addasa. Athassa pipāsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a2:419_9: pānīyaṃ ussiñcitvā doṇiyaṃ ākiritvā adāsi, datvā ca pana “vissamissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:419_10: rukkhamūle nipajji. Makkaṭo pānīyaṃ pivitvā avidūre nisīditvā mukhamakkaṭikaṃ karonto
atk-s0513a2:419_11: bodhisattaṃ bhiṃsāpesi. Bodhisatto tassa taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā “are duṭṭhamakkaṭa, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a2:419_12: tava pipāsitassa kilantassa bahuṃ pānīyaṃ adāsiṃ, idāni tvaṃ mayhaṃ mukhamakkaṭikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:419_13: karosi, aho pāpajanassa nāma kato upakāro niratthako”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:422: So dāni pitvāna kiriṅkarosi, asaṅgamo pāpajanena seyyo”ti.
atk-s0513a2:423_0: Tattha so dāni pitvāna kiriṅkarosīti so idāni tvaṃ mayā dinnapānīyaṃ pivitvā mukhamakkaṭikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:423_1: karonto “kiri kirī”ti saddaṃ karosi. Asaṅgamo pāpajanena seyyoti pāpajanena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a2:424: Taṃ sutvā so mittadubbhī makkaṭo “tvaṃ ‘ettakenavetaṃ niṭṭhita’nti saññaṃ karosi, idāni te sīse vaccaṃ pātetvā gamissāmī”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:426: “Ko te suto vā diṭṭho vā, sīlavā nāma makkaṭo;
atk-s0513a2:427: Idāni kho taṃ ohacchaṃ, esā asmāka dhammatā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:428_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – bho brāhmaṇa, “makkaṭo kataguṇajānanako ācārasampanno sīlavā
atk-s0513a2:428_1: nāma atthī”ti kahaṃ tayā suto vā diṭṭho vā, idāni kho ahaṃ taṃ ohacchaṃ vaccaṃ te
atk-s0513a2:428_2: sīse katvā pakkamissāmi, asmākañhi makkaṭānaṃ nāma esā dhammatā ayaṃ jātisabhāvo,
atk-s0513a2:429_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto uṭṭhāya gantuṃ ārabhi. Makkaṭo taṅkhaṇaññeva uppatitvā sākhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:429_1: nisīditvā olambakaṃ otaranto viya tassa sīse vaccaṃ pātetvā viravanto vanasaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a2:430_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto, pubbepi mayā kataguṇaṃ na jānāsiyevā”ti
atk-s0513a2:430_1: vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā makkaṭo devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:434: Sabbesu kira bhūtesūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu heṭṭhā kathitasadisameva.
atk-s0513a2:435_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:435_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca
atk-s0513a2:435_2: samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā mahāparivāro gaṇasatthā hutvā himavante vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a2:435_3: So tattha ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya pabbatā oruyha paccante ekaṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0513a2:435_4: nissāya paṇṇasālāyaṃ vāsaṃ upagañchi. Atheko lolamakkaṭo isigaṇe bhikkhācāraṃ gate
atk-s0513a2:435_5: assamapadaṃ āgantvā paṇṇasālā uttiṇṇā karoti, pānīyaghaṭesu udakaṃ chaḍḍeti, kuṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:435_6: bhindati, aggisālāyaṃ vaccaṃ karoti. Tāpasā vassaṃ vasitvā “idāni himavanto pupphaphalasamiddho
atk-s0513a2:435_7: ramaṇīyo, tattheva gamissāmā”ti paccantagāmavāsike āpucchiṃsu. Manussā “sve, bhante,
atk-s0513a2:435_8: mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ gahetvā assamapadaṃ āgamissāma, taṃ paribhuñjitvāva gamissathā”ti
atk-s0513a2:435_9: vatvā dutiyadivase pahūtaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ gahetvā tattha agamaṃsu. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a2:435_10: so makkaṭo cintesi – “kohaññaṃ katvā manusse ārādhetvā mayhampi khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:435_11: āharāpessāmī”ti. So tāpasacaraṇaṃ caranto viya sīlavā viya ca hutvā tāpasānaṃ avidūre
atk-s0513a2:435_12: sūriyaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi. Manussā taṃ disvā “sīlavantānaṃ santike vasantā sīlavantā
atk-s0513a2:439_0: Tattha santi sīlasamāhitāti sīlena samannāgatā saṃvijjanti, sīlavantā ca samāhitā
atk-s0513a2:439_1: ca ekaggacittā saṃvijjantītipi attho. Jammanti lāmakaṃ. Ādiccamupatiṭṭhatīti sūriyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:440: Evaṃ te manusse tassa guṇaṃ kathente disvā bodhisatto “tumhe imassa lolamakkaṭassa sīlācāraṃ ajānitvā avatthusmiṃyeva pasannā”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:443: Aggihuttañca uhannaṃ, dve ca bhinnā kamaṇḍalū”ti.
atk-s0513a2:444: Tattha anaññāyāti ajānitvā. Uhannanti iminā pāpamakkaṭena ūhadaṃ. Kamaṇḍalūti kuṇḍikā. “Dve ca kuṇḍikā tena bhinnā”ti evamassa aguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:445_0: Manussā makkaṭassa kuhakabhāvaṃ ñatvā leḍḍuñca yaṭṭhiñca gahetvā pothetvā palāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:445_1: isigaṇassa bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. Isayopi himavantameva gantvā aparihīnajjhānā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:446: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā makkaṭo ayaṃ kuhako bhikkhu ahosi, isigaṇo buddhaparisā, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:450_0: Bālo vatāyaṃ dumasākhagocaroti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarājānaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:450_1: kathesi. Ekasmiñhi samaye vassakāle kosalarañño paccanto kupi. Tattha ṭhitā yodhā
atk-s0513a2:450_2: dve tīṇi yuddhāni katvā paccatthike abhibhavituṃ asakkontā rañño sāsanaṃ pesesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:450_3: Rājā akāle vassāneyeva nikkhamitvā jetavanasamīpe khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā cintesi
atk-s0513a2:450_4: – “ahaṃ akāle nikkhanto, kandarapadarādayo udakapūrā, duggamo maggo, satthāraṃ upasaṅkamissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:450_5: so maṃ ‘kahaṃ gacchasi, mahārājā’ti pucchissati, athāhaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocessāmi, na
atk-s0513a2:450_6: kho pana maṃ satthā samparāyikenevatthena anuggaṇhāti, diṭṭhadhammikenāpi anuggaṇhātiyeva,
atk-s0513a2:450_7: tasmiṃ sace me gamanena avuḍḍhi bhavissati, ‘akālo, mahārājā’ti vakkhati. Sace pana
atk-s0513a2:450_8: vuḍḍi bhavissati, tuṇhī bhavissatī”ti. So jetavanaṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a2:450_9: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divā divassā”ti
atk-s0513a2:450_10: pucchi. “Bhante, ahaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametuṃ nikkhanto ‘tumhe vanditvā gamissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a2:450_11: āgatomhī”ti. Satthā “pubbepi, mahārāja, rājāno senāya abbhuggacchamānāya paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:450_12: kathaṃ sutvā akāle abbhuggamanaṃ nāma na gamiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:451_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammānusāsako
atk-s0513a2:451_1: sabbatthakaamacco ahosi. Atha rañño paccante kupite paccantayodhā paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:451_2: Rājā vassakāle nikkhamitvā uyyāne khandhāvāraṃ bandhi, bodhisatto rañño santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:451_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe assānaṃ kaḷāye sedetvā āharitvā doṇiyaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Uyyāne makkaṭesu
atk-s0513a2:451_4: eko makkaṭo rukkhā otaritvā tato kaḷāye gahetvā mukhaṃ pūretvā hatthehipi gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:451_5: uppatitvā rukkhe nisīditvā khādituṃ ārabhi, athassa khādamānassa hatthako eko kaḷāyo
atk-s0513a2:451_6: bhūmiyaṃ pati. So mukhena ca hatthehi ca gahite sabbe kaḷāye chaḍḍetvā rukkhā oruyha
atk-s0513a2:451_7: tameva kaḷāyaṃ olokento taṃ kaḷāyaṃ adisvāva puna rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā aḍḍe sahassaparājito
atk-s0513a2:451_8: viya socamāno dummukho rukkhasākhāyaṃ nisīdi. Rājā makkaṭassa kiriyaṃ disvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:451_9: āmantetvā “passatha, kiṃ nāmetaṃ makkaṭena kata”nti pucchi. Bodhisatto “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a2:451_10: bahuṃ anavaloketvā appaṃ oloketvā dubbuddhino bālā evarūpaṃ karontiyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a2:453: “Bālo vatāyaṃ dumasākhagocaro, paññā janinda nayimassa vijjati;
atk-s0513a2:454: Kaḷāyamuṭṭhiṃ avakiriya kevalaṃ, ekaṃ kaḷāyaṃ patitaṃ gavesatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:455_0: Tattha dumasākhagocaroti makkaṭo. So hi dumasākhāsu gocaraṃ gaṇhāti, sāva assa gocaro
atk-s0513a2:455_1: sañcaraṇabhūmibhūtā, tasmā “dumasākhagocaro”ti vuccati. Janindāti rājānaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0513a2:455_2: Rājā hi paramissarabhāvena janassa indoti janindo. Kaḷāyamuṭṭhinti caṇakamuṭṭhiṃ.
atk-s0513a2:456: Evaṃ vatvā puna bodhisatto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ āmantetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:460_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – mahārāja, evameva mayañca ye caññe lobhābhibhūtā janā sabbepi
atk-s0513a2:460_1: appena bahuṃ jiyyāma. Mayañhi etarahi akāle vassānasamaye maggaṃ gacchantā appakassa
atk-s0513a2:460_2: atthassa kāraṇā bahukā atthā parihāyāma. Kaḷāyeneva vānaroti yathā ayaṃ vānaro ekaṃ
atk-s0513a2:460_3: kaḷāyaṃ pariyesamāno tenekena kaḷāyena sabbakaḷāyehi parihīno, evaṃ mayampi akālena
atk-s0513a2:460_4: kandarapadarādīsu pūresu gacchamānā appamattakaṃ atthaṃ pariyesamānā bahūhi hatthivāhanaassavāhanādīhi
atk-s0513a2:460_5: ceva balakāyena ca parihāyissāma. Tasmā akāle gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti rañño ovādaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a2:461_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā tato nivattitvā bārāṇasimeva pāvisi. Corāpi “rājā kira coramaddanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:461_1: karissāmīti nagarā nikkhanto”ti sutvā paccantato palāyiṃsu. Paccuppannepi corā “kosalarājā
atk-s0513a2:461_2: kira nikkhanto”ti sutvā palāyiṃsu. Rājā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vanditvā
atk-s0513a2:462: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:466_0: Dhanuhatthakalāpehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:466_1: Satthā hi mahābodhijātake viya umaṅgajātake viya ca attano paññāya vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:466_2: sutvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva tathāgato paññavā, pubbepi paññavā upāyakusaloyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:467_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vānarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:467_1: asītisahassavānaragaṇaparivāro himavantapadese vāsaṃ kappesi. Tassāsanne eko paccantagāmako
atk-s0513a2:467_2: kadāci vasati, kadāci ubbasati. Tassa pana gāmassa majjhe sākhāviṭapasampanno madhuraphalo
atk-s0513a2:467_3: eko tindukarukkho atthi, vānaragaṇo ubbasitakāle āgantvā tassa phalāni khādati. Athāparasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:467_4: phalavāre so gāmo puna āvāso ahosi daḷhaparikkhitto dvārayutto, sopi rukkho phalabhāranamitasākho
atk-s0513a2:467_5: aṭṭhāsi. Vānaragaṇo cintesi – “mayaṃ pubbe asukagāme tindukaphalāni khādāma, phalito
atk-s0513a2:467_6: nu kho so etarahi rukkho, udāhu no, āvasito so gāmo, udāhu no”ti. Evañca pana cintetvā
atk-s0513a2:467_7: “gaccha imaṃ pavattiṃ jānāhī”ti ekaṃ vānaraṃ pesesi. So gantvā rukkhassa ca phalitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:467_8: gāmassa ca gāḷhavāsabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā vānarānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a2:468_0: Vānarā tassa phalitabhāvaṃ sutvā “madhurāni tindukaphalāni khādissāmā”ti ussāhajātā
atk-s0513a2:468_1: vānarindassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Vānarindo “gāmo āvāso anāvāso”ti pucchi. “Āvāso,
atk-s0513a2:468_2: devā”ti. “Tena hi na gantabbaṃ. Manussā hi bahumāyā hontī”ti. “Deva, manussānaṃ paṭisallānavelāya
atk-s0513a2:468_3: aḍḍharattasamaye khādissāmā”ti bahū gantvā vānarindaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā himavantā
atk-s0513a2:468_4: otaritvā tassa gāmassa avidūre manussānaṃ paṭisallānakālaṃ āgamayamānā mahāpāsāṇapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a2:468_5: sayitvā majjhimayāme manussesu niddaṃ okkamantesu rukkhaṃ āruyha phalāni khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:468_6: Atheko puriso sarīrakiccena gehā nikkhamitvā gāmamajjhagato vānare disvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:468_7: ācikkhi. Bahū manussā dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvā nānāvudhahatthā leḍḍudaṇḍādīni ādāya
atk-s0513a2:468_8: “pabhātāya rattiyā vānare gaṇhissāmā”ti rukkhaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Asītisahassavānarā
atk-s0513a2:468_9: manusse disvā maraṇabhayatajjitā “natthi no aññaṃ paṭissaraṇaṃ aññatra vānarindenā”ti
atk-s0513a2:472_0: Tattha dhanuhatthakalāpehīti dhanukalāpahatthehi, dhanūni ceva sarakalāpe ca gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:472_1: ṭhitehīti attho. Nettiṃsavaradhāribhīti nettiṃsā vuccanti khaggā, uttamakhaggadhārīhīti
atk-s0513a2:472_2: attho. Parikiṇṇamhāti parivāritamha. Kathanti kena nu kho upāyena amhākaṃ mokkho bhavissatīti.
atk-s0513a2:473_0: Tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā vānarindo “mā bhāyittha, manussā nāma bahukiccā, ajjapi majjhimayāmo
atk-s0513a2:473_1: vattati, api nāma tesaṃ ‘amhe māressāmā’ti parivāritānaṃ imassa kiccassa antarāyakaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:473_2: aññaṃ kiccaṃ uppajjeyyā”ti vānare samassāsetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:477_0: Tattha nanti nipātamattaṃ, appeva bahukiccānaṃ manussānaṃ añño koci attho uppajjeyyāti
atk-s0513a2:477_1: ayamevettha attho. Atthi rukkhassa acchinnanti imassa rukkhassa phalānaṃ ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanavasena
atk-s0513a2:477_2: acchinnaṃ bahu ṭhānaṃ atthi. Khajjathaññeva tindukanti tindukaphalaṃ khajjathaññeva.
atk-s0513a2:477_3: Tumhe hi yāvatakena vo attho atthi, tattakaṃ khādatha, amhākaṃ paharaṇakālaṃ jānissāmāti.
atk-s0513a2:478_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto kapigaṇaṃ samassāsesi. Ettakañhi assāsaṃ alabhamānā sabbepi te phalitena
atk-s0513a2:478_1: hadayena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ. Mahāsatto pana evaṃ vānaragaṇaṃ assāsetvā “sabbe
atk-s0513a2:478_2: vānare samānethā”ti āha. Samānentā tassa bhāgineyyaṃ senakaṃ nāma vānaraṃ adisvā
atk-s0513a2:478_3: “senako nāgato”ti ārocesuṃ. “Sace senako nāgato, tumhe mā bhāyittha, idāni vo so
atk-s0513a2:478_4: sotthiṃ karissatī”ti. Senakopi kho vānaragaṇassa gamanakāle niddāyitvā pacchā pabuddho
atk-s0513a2:478_5: kañci adisvā padānupadiko hutvā āgacchanto manusse disvā “vānaragaṇassa bhayaṃ uppanna”nti
atk-s0513a2:478_6: ñatvā ekasmiṃ pariyante gehe aggiṃ jāletvā suttaṃ kantantiyā mahallakitthiyā santikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:478_7: gantvā khettaṃ gacchanto gāmadārako viya ekaṃ ummukaṃ gahetvā uparivāte ṭhatvā gāmaṃ
atk-s0513a2:478_8: padīpesi. Manussā makkaṭe chaḍḍetvā aggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ agamaṃsu. Vānarā palāyantā senakassatthāya
atk-s0513a2:479: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bhāgineyyo senako mahānāmo sakko ahosi, vānaragaṇo buddhaparisā, vānarindo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:483_0: Janittaṃ me bhavittaṃ meti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ahivātakarogamuttaṃ
atk-s0513a2:483_1: ārabbha kathesi. Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ kule ahivātakarogo uppajji. Mātāpitaro
atk-s0513a2:483_2: puttaṃ āhaṃsu – “tāta, mā imasmiṃ gehe vasa, bhittiṃ bhinditvā palāyitvā yattha katthaci
atk-s0513a2:483_3: gantvā jīvitaṃ rakkha, pacchā āgantvā imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mahānidhānaṃ atthi, taṃ
atk-s0513a2:483_4: uddharitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā sukhena jīveyyāsī”ti. Putto tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a2:483_5: bhittiṃ bhinditvā palāyitvā attano roge vūpasante āgantvā mahānidhānaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0513a2:483_6: kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā gharāvāsaṃ vasi. So ekadivasaṃ sappitelādīni ceva vatthacchādanādīni
atk-s0513a2:483_7: ca gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:483_8: katvā “tumhākaṃ gehe ahivātakarogo uppannoti assumha, kinti katvā muttosī”ti pucchi,
atk-s0513a2:483_9: so taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Satthā “pubbepi kho, upāsaka, bhaye uppanne attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:483_10: ālayaṃ katvā aññattha agatā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, anālayaṃ pana katvā aññattha
atk-s0513a2:483_11: gatā jīvitaṃ labhiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:484_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsigāmake kumbhakārakule
atk-s0513a2:484_1: nibbattitvā kumbhakārakammaṃ katvā puttadāraṃ posesi. Tadā pana bārāṇasiyaṃ mahānadiyā
atk-s0513a2:484_2: saddhiṃ ekābaddho mahājātassaro ahosi. So bahuudakakāle nadiyā saddhiṃ ekodako hoti,
atk-s0513a2:484_3: udake mandībhūte visuṃ hoti. Macchakacchapā pana “imasmiṃ saṃvacchare suvuṭṭhikā
atk-s0513a2:484_4: bhavissati, imasmiṃ saṃvacchare dubbuṭṭhikā”ti jānanti. Atha tasmiṃ sare nibbattamacchakacchapā
atk-s0513a2:484_5: “imasmiṃ saṃvacchare dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā udakassa ekābaddhakāleyeva tamhā
atk-s0513a2:484_6: sarā nikkhamitvā nadiṃ agamiṃsu. Eko pana kacchapo “idaṃ me jātaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:484_7: mātāpitūhi vasitaṭṭhānaṃ, na sakkomi imaṃ jahitu”nti nadiṃ na agamāsi. Atha nidāghasamaye
atk-s0513a2:484_8: tattha udakaṃ chijji, so kacchapo bodhisattassa mattikagahaṇaṭṭhāne bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā
atk-s0513a2:484_9: pāvisi. Bodhisatto “mattikaṃ gahessāmī”ti tattha gantvā mahākuddālena bhūmiṃ khaṇanto
atk-s0513a2:484_10: kacchapassa piṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā mattikapiṇḍaṃ viya kuddāleneva naṃ uddharitvā thale
atk-s0513a2:484_11: pātesi. So vedanāppatto hutvā “vasanaṭṭhāne ālayaṃ jahituṃ asakkonto evaṃ vināsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:484_12: pāpuṇi”nti vatvā paridevamāno imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:486: “Janittaṃ me bhavittaṃ me, iti paṅke avassayiṃ;
atk-s0513a2:487: Taṃ maṃ paṅko ajjhabhavi, yathā dubbalakaṃ tathā;
atk-s0513a2:488: Taṃ taṃ vadāmi bhaggava, suṇohi vacanaṃ mama.
atk-s0513a2:492: Yamhi jīve tamhi gacche, na niketahato siyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:493_0: Tattha janittaṃ me bhavittaṃ meti idaṃ mama jātaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ mama vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:493_1: Iti paṅke avassayinti iminā kāraṇenāhaṃ imasmiṃ kaddame avassayiṃ nipajjiṃ, vāsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:493_2: kappesinti attho. Ajjhabhavīti adhiabhavi vināsaṃ pāpesi. Bhaggavāti kumbhakāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:493_3: ālapati. Kumbhakārānañhi nāmagottapaññatti esā, yadidaṃ bhaggavāti. Sukhanti kāyikacetasikassādaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:493_4: Taṃ janittaṃ bhavittañcāti taṃ jātaṭṭhānañca vaḍḍhitaṭṭhānañca. “Jānittaṃ bhāvitta”nti
atk-s0513a2:493_5: dīghavasenapi pāṭho, soyevattho. Pajānatoti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ jānantassa.
atk-s0513a2:493_6: Na niketahato siyāti nikete ālayaṃ katvā aññattha agantvā niketena hato, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a2:494_0: Evaṃ so bodhisattena saddhiṃ kathento kālamakāsi. Bodhisatto taṃ gahetvā sakalagāmavāsino
atk-s0513a2:494_1: sannipātāpetvā te manusse ovadanto evamāha – “passatha imaṃ kacchapaṃ, ayaṃ aññesaṃ
atk-s0513a2:494_2: macchakacchapānaṃ mahānadiṃ gamanakāle attano vasanaṭṭhāne ālayaṃ chindituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a2:494_3: tehi saddhiṃ agantvā mama mattikagahaṇaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nipajji. Athassāhaṃ mattikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:494_4: gaṇhanto mahākuddālena piṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā mattikapiṇḍaṃ viya naṃ thale pātesiṃ, ayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:494_5: attanā katakammaṃ saritvā dvīhi gāthāhi paridevitvā kālamakāsi. Evamesa attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:494_6: ālayaṃ katvā maraṇaṃ patto, tumhepi mā iminā kacchapena sadisā ahuvattha, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:494_7: ‘mayhaṃ rūpaṃ mayhaṃ saddo mayhaṃ gandho mayhaṃ raso mayhaṃ phoṭṭhabbo mayhaṃ putto
atk-s0513a2:494_8: mayhaṃ dhītā mayhaṃ dāsadāsiparicchedo mayhaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇa’nti taṇhāvasena upabhogavasena
atk-s0513a2:494_9: mā gaṇhittha, ekakovesa satto tīsu bhavesu parivattatī”ti. Evaṃ buddhalīlāya mahājanassa
atk-s0513a2:494_10: ovādamadāsi, so ovādo sakalajambudīpaṃ pattharitvā saṭṭhimattāni vassasahassāni aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:494_11: Mahājano bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggapuraṃ
atk-s0513a2:494_12: pūresi, bodhisattopi tatheva puññāni katvā saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a2:495_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:495_1: so kulaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. “Tadā kacchapo ānando ahosi, kumbhakāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:499_0: Tañca appanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekavīsatividhaṃ anesanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:499_1: Ekasmiñhi kāle bahū bhikkhū vejjakammena dūtakammena pahiṇakammena jaṅghapesanikena
atk-s0513a2:499_2: piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍenāti evarūpāya ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappesuṃ. Sā sāketajātake
atk-s0513a2:499_3: āvibhavissati. Satthā tesaṃ tathā jīvikakappanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “etarahi kho bahū bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:499_4: anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappenti, te pana evaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā yakkhattabhāvā petattabhāvā
atk-s0513a2:499_5: na muccissanti, dhuragoṇā hutvāva nibbattissanti, niraye paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0513a2:499_6: etesaṃ hitatthāya sukhatthāya attajjhāsayaṃ sakapaṭibhānaṃ ekaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetuṃ
atk-s0513a2:499_7: vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā “na, bhikkhave, ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya
atk-s0513a2:499_8: paccayā uppādetabbā. Anesanāya hi uppanno piṇḍapāto ādittalohaguḷasadiso halāhalavisūpamo.
atk-s0513a2:499_9: Anesanā hi nāmesā buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi garahitabbā paṭikuṭṭhā. Anesanāya uppannaṃ
atk-s0513a2:499_10: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa hi hāso vā somanassaṃ vā natthi. Evaṃ uppanno hi piṇḍapāto
atk-s0513a2:499_11: mama sāsane caṇḍālassa ucchiṭṭhabhojanasadiso, tassa paribhogo satadhammamāṇavassa
atk-s0513a2:499_12: caṇḍālucchiṭṭhabhattaparibhogo viya hotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:500_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:500_1: vayappatto kenacideva karaṇīyena pātheyyataṇḍule ca bhattapuṭañca gahetvā maggaṃ
atk-s0513a2:500_2: paṭipajji. Tasmiñhi kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ eko māṇavo atthi satadhammo nāma udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0513a2:500_3: nibbatto. Sopi kenacideva karaṇīyena taṇḍule ca bhattapuṭañca agahetvāva maggaṃ paṭipajji,
atk-s0513a2:500_4: te ubhopi mahāmagge samāgacchiṃsu. Māṇavo bodhisattaṃ “kiṃjātikosī”ti pucchi. So
atk-s0513a2:500_5: “ahaṃ caṇḍālo”ti vatvā “tvaṃ kiṃjātikosī”ti māṇavaṃ pucchi. “Udiccabrāhmaṇo aha”nti.
atk-s0513a2:500_6: “Sādhu gacchāmā”ti te ubhopi maggaṃ agamaṃsu. Bodhisatto pātarāsavelāya udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:500_7: nisīditvā hatthe dhovitvā bhattapuṭaṃ mocetvā “māṇava, bhattaṃ bhuñjāhī”ti āha. “Natthi,
atk-s0513a2:500_8: are caṇḍāla, mama bhattena attho”ti. Bodhisatto “sādhū”ti puṭakabhattaṃ ucchiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:500_9: akatvāva attano yāpanamattaṃ aññasmiṃ paṇṇe pakkhipitvā puṭakabhattaṃ bandhitvā ekamante
atk-s0513a2:500_10: ṭhapetvā bhuñjitvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā dhotahatthapādo taṇḍule ca sesabhattañca ādāya
atk-s0513a2:501_0: Te sakaladivasaṃ gantvā sāyaṃ ubhopi ekasmiṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne nhatvā paccuttariṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:501_1: Bodhisatto phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīditvā bhattapuṭaṃ mocetvā māṇavaṃ anāpucchitvā bhuñjituṃ
atk-s0513a2:501_2: ārabhi. Māṇavo sakaladivasaṃ maggagamanena kilanto chātajjhatto “sace me bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:501_3: dassati, bhuñjissāmī”ti olokento aṭṭhāsi. Itaro kiñci avatvā bhuñjateva. Māṇavo cintesi
atk-s0513a2:501_4: – “ayaṃ caṇḍālo mayhaṃ avatvāva sabbaṃ bhuñjati nippīḷetvāpi taṃ gahetvā upari ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:501_5: chaḍḍetvā sesaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So tathā katvā ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ bhuñji. Athassa
atk-s0513a2:501_6: bhuttamattasseva “mayā attano jātigottakulapadesānaṃ ananucchavikaṃ kataṃ, caṇḍālassa
atk-s0513a2:501_7: nāma me ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ bhutta”nti balavavippaṭisāro uppajji, tāvadevassa salohitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:501_8: bhattaṃ mukhato uggacchi. So “appamattakassa vata me kāraṇā ananucchavikaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:503: “Tañca appañca ucchiṭṭhaṃ, tañca kicchena no adā;
atk-s0513a2:504: Sohaṃ brāhmaṇajātiko, yaṃ bhuttaṃ tampi uggata”nti.
atk-s0513a2:505_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yaṃ mayā bhuttaṃ, taṃ appañca ucchiṭṭhañca, tañca so caṇḍālo
atk-s0513a2:505_1: na attano ruciyā maṃ adāsi, atha kho nippīḷiyamāno kicchena kasirena adāsi, sohaṃ
atk-s0513a2:505_2: parisuddhabrāhmaṇajātiko, teneva me yaṃ bhuttaṃ, tampi saddhiṃ lohitena uggatanti.
atk-s0513a2:506: Evaṃ māṇavo paridevitvā “kiṃ dāni me evarūpaṃ ananucchavikaṃ kammaṃ katvā jīvitenā”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā kassaci attānaṃ adassetvāva anāthamaraṇaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a2:507_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ dassetvā “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, satadhammamāṇavassa taṃ caṇḍālucchiṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:507_1: bhuñjitvā attano ayuttabhojanassa bhuttattā neva hāso, na somanassaṃ uppajji, evameva
atk-s0513a2:507_2: yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento tathāladdhapaccayaṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0513a2:507_3: tassa buddhapaṭikuṭṭhagarahitajīvitabhāvato neva hāso, na somanassaṃ uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:511_0: Tattha dhammanti ājīvapārisuddhisīladhammaṃ. Niraṃkatvāti nīharitvā chaḍḍetvā. Adhammenāti
atk-s0513a2:511_1: ekavīsatiyā anesanasaṅkhātena micchājīvena. Satadhammoti tassa nāmaṃ, “santadhammo”tipi
atk-s0513a2:511_2: pāṭho. Na nandatīti yathā satadhammo māṇavo “caṇḍālucchiṭṭhakaṃ me laddha”nti tena
atk-s0513a2:511_3: lābhena na nandati, evaṃ imasmimpi sāsane pabbajito kulaputto anesanāya laddhalābhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:511_4: paribhuñjanto na nandati na tussati, “buddhagarahitajīvikāya jīvāmī”ti domanassappatto
atk-s0513a2:511_5: hoti. Tasmā anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappentassa satadhammamāṇavasseva araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a2:512_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desetvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:512_1: bahū bhikkhū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. “Tadā māṇavo ānando ahosi, ahameva caṇḍālaputto ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:516_0: Duddadaṃ dadamānānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto gaṇadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:516_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira dve sahāyakā kuṭumbiyaputtā chandakaṃ saṃharitvā sabbaparikkhāradānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:516_2: sajjetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0513a2:516_3: sattame divase sabbaparikkhāre adaṃsu. Tesu gaṇajeṭṭhako satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:516_4: nisīditvā “bhante, imasmiṃ dāne bahudāyakāpi atthi appadāyakāpi, tesaṃ sabbesampi
atk-s0513a2:516_5: ‘idaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”’ti dānaṃ niyyādesi. Satthā “tumhehi kho upāsakā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a2:516_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā evaṃ niyyādentehi mahākammaṃ kataṃ, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi
atk-s0513a2:516_7: dānaṃ datvā evameva niyyādiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:517_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:517_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:517_2: gaṇasatthā hutvā himavantapadese ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:517_3: caramāno bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase dvāragāme saparivāro bhikkhāya
atk-s0513a2:517_4: cari. Manussā bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. Punadivase bārāṇasiyaṃ cari, manussā sampiyāyamānā
atk-s0513a2:517_5: bhikkhaṃ datvā gaṇabandhanena chandakaṃ saṃharitvā dānaṃ sajjetvā isigaṇassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:517_6: pavattayiṃsu. Dānapariyosāne gaṇajeṭṭhako evameva vatvā imināva niyāmena dānaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0513a2:517_7: Bodhisatto “āvuso, cittappasāde sati appakaṃ nāma dānaṃ natthī”ti vatvā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:522: “Tasmā satañca asataṃ, nānā hoti ito gati;
atk-s0513a2:524_0: Tattha duddadanti dānaṃ nāma lobhadosavasikehi apaṇḍitehi dātuṃ na sakkā, tasmā “duddada”nti
atk-s0513a2:524_1: vuccati. Taṃ dadamānānaṃ. Dukkaraṃ kamma kubbatanti tadeva dānakammaṃ sabbehi kātuṃ
atk-s0513a2:524_2: na sakkāti dukkaraṃ. Taṃ kurumānānaṃ. Asantoti apaṇḍitā bālā. Nānukubbantīti taṃ
atk-s0513a2:524_3: kammaṃ nānukaronti. Sataṃ dhammoti paṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. Dānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:524_4: Durannayoti phalasambandhavasena dujjāno, evarūpassa dānassa evarūpo phalavipāko
atk-s0513a2:524_5: hotīti duranubodho. Apica durannayoti duradhigamo, apaṇḍitehi dānaṃ datvā dānaphalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:524_6: nāma laddhuṃ na sakkātipi attho. Nānā hoti ito gatīti ito cavitvā paralokaṃ gacchantānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:524_7: paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ nānā hoti. Asanto nirayaṃ yantīti apaṇḍitā dussīlā dānaṃ adatvā
atk-s0513a2:524_8: sīlaṃ arakkhitvā nirayaṃ gacchanti. Santo saggaparāyaṇāti paṇḍitā pana dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a2:524_9: sīlaṃ rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ karitvā tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā saggaparāyaṇā honti,
atk-s0513a2:525: Evaṃ bodhisatto anumodanaṃ katvā cattāro vassike māse tattheva vasitvā vassātikkame himavantaṃ gantvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:526: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā isigaṇo buddhaparisā ahosi, gaṇasatthā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:532: Kacchapaṃ satadhammañca, duddadanti ca te dasa.
atk-s0513a2:536_0: Dhanuggaho asadisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:536_1: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhagavato mahānikkhamapāramiṃ vaṇṇentā
atk-s0513a2:536_2: nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a2:536_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato idāneva mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:536_4: nikkhanto, pubbepi setacchattaṃ pahāya nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:537_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a2:537_1: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, tassa sotthinā jātassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “asadisakumāro”ti nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a2:537_2: akaṃsu. Athassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle añño puññavā satto deviyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a2:537_3: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, tassa sotthinā jātassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “brahmadattakumāro”ti
atk-s0513a2:537_4: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tesu bodhisatto soḷasavassakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa
atk-s0513a2:537_5: santike tayo vede aṭṭhārasa ca sippāni uggaṇhitvā tesu issāsasippe asadiso hutvā
atk-s0513a2:537_6: bārāṇasiṃ paccāgami. Rājā kālaṃ karonto “asadisakumārassa rajjaṃ datvā brahmadattassa
atk-s0513a2:537_7: oparajjaṃ dethā”ti vatvā kālamakāsi. Tasmiṃ kālakate bodhisatto attano rajje dīyamāne
atk-s0513a2:537_8: “na mayhaṃ rajjenattho”ti paṭikkhipi, brahmadattaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:537_9: “mayhaṃ rajjena attho natthī”ti kiñcipi na icchi, kaniṭṭhe rajjaṃ kārente pakatiyā
atk-s0513a2:537_10: vasanākāreneva vasi. Rājapādamūlikā “asadisakumāro rajjaṃ patthetī”ti vatvā rañño
atk-s0513a2:537_11: santike bodhisattaṃ paribhindiṃsu. Sopi tesaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā paribhinnacitto “bhātaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_0: Atheko bodhisattassa atthacarako taṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi. Bodhisatto kaniṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0513a2:538_1: kujjhitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā aññaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā “eko dhanuggaho āgantvā rājadvāre
atk-s0513a2:538_2: ṭhito”ti rañño ārocāpesi. Rājā “kittakaṃ bhogaṃ icchasī”ti pucchi. “Ekasaṃvaccharena
atk-s0513a2:538_3: satasahassa”nti. “Sādhu āgacchatū”ti. Atha naṃ āgantvā samīpe ṭhitaṃ pucchi – “tvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_4: dhanaggahosī”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Sādhu maṃ upaṭṭhahassū”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_5: upaṭṭhahi. Tassa paribbayaṃ dīyamānaṃ disvā “atibahuṃ labhatī”ti porāṇakadhanuggahā
atk-s0513a2:538_6: ujjhāyiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭasamīpe sāṇipākāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_7: parikkhipāpetvā ambarukkhamūle mahāsayane nipanno uddhaṃ olokento rukkhagge ekaṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_8: ambapiṇḍiṃ disvā “imaṃ na sakkā abhiruhitvā gaṇhitu”nti dhanuggahe pakkosāpetvā “imaṃ
atk-s0513a2:538_9: ambapiṇḍiṃ sarena chinditvā pātetuṃ sakkhissathā”ti āha. Na taṃ, deva, amhākaṃ garu,
atk-s0513a2:538_10: devena pana no bahuvāre kammaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ, adhunāgato dhanuggaho amhehi bahutaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_0: Rājā bodhisattaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi, tāta, etaṃ pātetu”nti pucchi. “Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a2:539_1: ekaṃ okāsaṃ labhamāno sakkhissāmī”ti. “Katarokāsa”nti? “Tumhākaṃ sayanassa antokāsa”nti.
atk-s0513a2:539_2: Rājā sayanaṃ harāpetvā okāsaṃ kāresi. Bodhisattassa hatthe dhanu natthi, nivāsanantare
atk-s0513a2:539_3: dhanuṃ sannayhitvā vicarati, tasmā “sāṇiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Rājā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a2:539_4: sāṇiṃ āharāpetvā parikkhipāpesi. Bodhisatto antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā uparinivatthaṃ setavatthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_5: haritvā ekaṃ rattapaṭaṃ nivāsetvā kacchaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ rattapaṭaṃ udare bandhitvā
atk-s0513a2:539_6: pasibbakato sandhiyuttaṃ khaggaṃ nīharitvā vāmapasse sannayhitvā suvaṇṇakañcukaṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_7: paṭimuñcitvā cāpanāḷiṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ sannayhitvā sandhiyuttameṇḍakamahādhanuṃ ādāya pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_8: jiyaṃ āropetvā uṇhīsaṃ sīse paṭimuñcitvā tikhiṇakhurappaṃ nakhehi parivattayamāno
atk-s0513a2:539_9: sāṇiṃ dvidhā katvā pathaviṃ phāletvā alaṅkatanāgakumāro viya nikkhamitvā sarakhipanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_10: gantvā khurappaṃ sannayhitvā rājānaṃ āha – “kiṃ, mahārāja, etaṃ ambapiṇḍiṃ uddhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:539_11: ārohanakaṇḍena pātemi, udāhu adho orohanakaṇḍenā”ti. “Tāta, bahū mayā ārohanakaṇḍena
atk-s0513a2:539_12: pātentā diṭṭhapubbā, orohanakaṇḍena pana pātentā mayā na diṭṭhapubbā, orohanakaṇḍena
atk-s0513a2:539_13: pātehī”ti. “Mahārāja, idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ dūraṃ ārohissati, yāva cātumahārājikabhavanaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:539_14: tāva gantvā sayaṃ orohissati, yāvassa orohanaṃ, tāva tumhehi adhivāsetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:540_0: Atha naṃ puna āha – “mahārāja, idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pana ārohamānaṃ ambapiṇḍivaṇṭaṃ yāvamajjhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_1: kantamānaṃ ārohissati, orohamānaṃ kesaggamattampi ito vā etto vā agantvā ujuññeva
atk-s0513a2:540_2: patitvā ambapiṇḍiṃ gahetvā otarissati, passa, mahārājā”ti vegaṃ janetvā kaṇḍaṃ khipi.
atk-s0513a2:540_3: Taṃ kaṇḍaṃ ambapiṇḍivaṇṭaṃ yāvamajjhaṃ kantamānaṃ abhiruhi. Bodhisatto “idāni taṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_4: kaṇḍaṃ yāva cātumahārājikabhavanaṃ gataṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā paṭhamaṃ khittakaṇḍato
atk-s0513a2:540_5: adhikataraṃ vegaṃ janetvā aññaṃ kaṇḍaṃ khipi, taṃ gantvā purimakaṇḍapuṅkhe paharitvā
atk-s0513a2:540_6: nivattitvā sayaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ abhiruhi. Tattha naṃ devatā aggahesuṃ, nivattanakaṇḍassa
atk-s0513a2:540_7: vātachinnasaddo asanisaddo viya ahosi. Mahājanena “kiṃ eso saddo”ti vutte bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:540_8: “nivattanakaṇḍassa saddo”ti vatvā attano attano sarīre kaṇḍassa patanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a2:540_9: bhītatasitaṃ mahājanaṃ “mā bhāyitthā”ti samassāsetvā “kaṇḍassa bhūmiyaṃ patituṃ na
atk-s0513a2:540_10: dassāmī”ti āha. Kaṇḍaṃ otaramānaṃ kesaggamattampi ito vā etto vā agantvā ujuññeva
atk-s0513a2:540_11: patitvā ambapiṇḍiṃ chindi. Bodhisatto ambapiṇḍiyā ca kaṇḍassa ca bhūmiyaṃ patituṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_12: adatvā ākāseyeva sampaṭicchanto ekena hatthena ambapiṇḍiṃ, ekena hatthena kaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_13: aggahesi. Mahājano taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā “na no evarūpaṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti mahāpurisaṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_14: pasaṃsati unnadati apphoṭeti aṅguliyo vidhūnati, celukkhepasahassāni pavatteti. Rājaparisāya
atk-s0513a2:540_15: tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhāya bodhisattassa dinnadhanaṃ koṭimattaṃ ahosi. Rājāpissa dhanavassaṃ
atk-s0513a2:540_16: vassento viya bahuṃ dhanaṃ mahantañca yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a2:541_0: Evaṃ bodhisatte tena raññā sakkate garukate tattha vasante “asadisakumāro kira bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_1: natthī”ti satta rājāno āgantvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ parivāretvā “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_2: vā”ti rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ. Rājā maraṇabhayabhīto “kuhiṃ me bhātā vasatī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:541_3: “ekaṃ sāmantarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahatī”ti sutvā “mama bhātike anāgacchante mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_4: natthi, gacchatha tassa mama vacanena pāde vanditvā khamāpetvā gaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti
atk-s0513a2:541_5: dūte pāhesi. Te gantvā bodhisattassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Bodhisatto taṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_6: āpucchitvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā rājānaṃ “mā bhāyī”ti samassāsetvā kaṇḍe akkharāni
atk-s0513a2:541_7: chinditvā “ahaṃ asadisakumāro āgato, aññaṃ ekakaṇḍaṃ khipanto sabbesaṃ vo jīvitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_8: harissāmi, jīvitena atthikā palāyantū”ti aṭṭālake ṭhatvā sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ bhuñjantānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:541_9: kañcanapātimakuleyeva kaṇḍaṃ pātesi. Te akkharāni disvā maraṇabhayabhītā sabbeva
atk-s0513a2:541_10: palāyiṃsu. Evaṃ mahāsatto khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ anuppādetvā satta
atk-s0513a2:541_11: rājāno palāpetvā kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ apaloketvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:541_12: abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā jīvitapariyosāne brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:542: Satthā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, asadisakumāro satta rājāno palāpetvā vijitasaṅgāmo isipabbajjaṃ pabbajito”ti abhisambuddho hutvā imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:547: “Sabbāmitte raṇaṃ katvā, na ca kañci viheṭhayi;
atk-s0513a2:549_0: Tattha asadisoti na kevalaṃ nāmeneva, balavīriyapaññāhipi asadisova. Mahabbaloti
atk-s0513a2:549_1: kāyabalenapi paññābalenapi mahabbalo. Dūrepātīti yāva cātumahārājikabhavanā tāvatiṃsabhavanā
atk-s0513a2:549_2: ca kaṇḍaṃ pesetuṃ samatthatāya dūrepātī. Akkhaṇavedhīti avirādhitavedhī. Atha vā
atk-s0513a2:549_3: akkhaṇā vuccati vijju, yāva ekā vijju niccharati, tāva tenobhāsena sattaṭṭha vāre
atk-s0513a2:549_4: kaṇḍāni gahetvā vijjhatīti akkhaṇavedhī. Mahākāyappadālanoti mahante kāye padāleti.
atk-s0513a2:549_5: Cammakāyo, dārukāyo, lohakāyo, ayokāyo, vālikakāyo, udakakāyo, phalakakāyoti ime
atk-s0513a2:549_6: satta mahākāyā nāma. Tattha añño cammakāyapadālano mahiṃsacammaṃ vinivijjhati, so
atk-s0513a2:549_7: pana satampi mahiṃsacammānaṃ vinivijjhatiyeva. Añño aṭṭhaṅgulabahalaṃ udumbarapadaraṃ,
atk-s0513a2:549_8: caturaṅgulabahalaṃ asanapadaraṃ vinivijjhati, so pana phalakasatampi ekato baddhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:549_9: vinivijjhati, tathā dvaṅgulabahalaṃ tambalohapaṭṭaṃ, aṅgulabahalaṃ ayapaṭṭaṃ. Vālikasakaṭassa
atk-s0513a2:549_10: badarasakaṭassa palālasakaṭassa vā pacchābhāgena kaṇḍaṃ pavesetvā purebhāgena atipāteti,
atk-s0513a2:549_11: pakatiyā udake catuusabhaṭṭhānaṃ kaṇḍaṃ peseti, thale aṭṭhausabhanti evaṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0513a2:549_12: sattannaṃ mahākāyānaṃ padālanato mahākāyappadālano. Sabbāmitteti sabbe amitte. Raṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:549_13: katvāti yuddhaṃ katvā palāpesīti attho. Na ca kañci viheṭhayīti ekampi na viheṭhesi.
atk-s0513a2:549_14: Aviheṭhayantoyeva pana tehi saddhiṃ kaṇḍapesaneneva raṇaṃ katvā. Saṃyamaṃ ajjhupāgamīti
atk-s0513a2:550: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kaniṭṭhabhātā ānando ahosi, asadisakumāro pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:554_0: Saṅgāmāvacaro sūroti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:554_1: Satthari hi paṭhamagamanena kapilapuraṃ gantvā kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ nandarājakumāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:554_2: pabbājetvā kapilapurā nikkhamma anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā viharante āyasmā nando
atk-s0513a2:554_3: bhagavato pattaṃ ādāya tathāgatena saddhiṃ gehā nikkhamanakāle “nandakumāro kira
atk-s0513a2:554_4: satthārā saddhiṃ gacchatī”ti sutvā aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vātapānantarena oloketvā
atk-s0513a2:554_5: “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti idaṃ janapadakalyāṇiyā vuttavacanaṃ anussaranto
atk-s0513a2:554_6: ukkaṇṭhito anabhirato uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto ahosi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0513a2:554_7: taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ nandaṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāpeyya”nti cintetvā tassa vasanapariveṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:554_8: gantvā paññattāsane nisinno “kacci, nanda, imasmiṃ sāsane abhiramasī”ti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a2:554_10: nandā”ti? “Na gatapubbo, bhante”ti. “Tena hi gacchāmā”ti. “Natthi me, bhante, iddhi,
atk-s0513a2:554_11: katāhaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Satthā “ahaṃ taṃ, nanda, mama iddhibalena nessāmī”ti theraṃ
atk-s0513a2:554_12: hatthe gahetvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandanto antarāmagge ekasmiṃ jhāmakhette jhāmakhāṇuke nisinnaṃ
atk-s0513a2:554_14: ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dassesi – “passasi, nanda, etaṃ makkaṭi”nti. “Āma, bhante”ti.
atk-s0513a2:555_0: Atha naṃ gahetvā saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ manosilātalaṃ, anotattadahādayo satta mahāsare,
atk-s0513a2:555_2: himavantapabbatañca dassetvā “tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ te, nanda, diṭṭhapubba”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:555_3: “na, diṭṭhapubbaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “ehi, nanda, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ te dassayissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:555_4: tattha netvā paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisīdi. Sakko devarājā dvīsu devalokesu devasaṅghena
atk-s0513a2:555_5: saddhiṃ āgantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Aḍḍhatiyakoṭisaṅkhā tassa paricārikā pañcasatā
atk-s0513a2:555_6: kakuṭapādā devaccharāyopi āgantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:555_7: nandaṃ tā pañcasatā accharā kilesavasena punappunaṃ olokāpesi. “Passasi, nanda, imā
atk-s0513a2:555_8: kakuṭapādiniyo accharāyo”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ nu kho etā sobhanti, udāhu janapadakalyāṇī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:555_9: “Seyyathāpi, bhante, janapadakalyāṇiṃ upanidhāya sā paluṭṭhamakkaṭī, evameva imā
atk-s0513a2:555_10: upanidhāya janapadakalyāṇī”ti. “Idāni kiṃ karissasi nandā”ti? “Kiṃ kammaṃ katvā,
atk-s0513a2:555_11: bhante, imā accharā labhantī”ti? “Samaṇadhammaṃ katvā”ti. “Sace me, bhante, imāsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:555_12: paṭilābhatthāya bhagavā pāṭibhogo hoti, ahaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti. “Karohi,
