atk-s0513a2:1502: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bārāṇasiseṭṭhi rojo mallo ahosi, vacchanakhaparibbājako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1506_0: Bhaddako vatayaṃ pakkhīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:1506_1: kathesi. Tañhi satthā ānetvā dassitaṃ disvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa kuhakoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1507_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavantapadese ekasmiṃ sare
atk-s0513a2:1507_1: maccho hutvā mahāparivāro vasi. Atheko bako “macche khādissāmī”ti sarassa āsannaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:1507_2: sīsaṃ pātetvā pakkhe pasāretvā mandamando macche olokento aṭṭhāsi tesaṃ pamādaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0513a2:1507_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto macchagaṇaparivuto gocaraṃ gaṇhanto taṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi. Macchagaṇo
atk-s0513a2:1511: Tattha mandamandova jhāyatīti abalabalo viya hutvā kiñci ajānanto viya ekakova jhāyatīti.
atk-s0513a2:1512: Atha naṃ bodhisatto oloketvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1515: Amhe dijo na pāleti, tena pakkhī na phandatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1516_0: Tattha anaññāyāti ajānitvā. Amhe dijo na pāletīti esa dijo amhe na rakkhati na gopāyati,
atk-s0513a2:1516_1: “kataraṃ nu kho etesu kabaḷaṃ karissāmī”ti upadhāreti. Tena pakkhī na phandatīti
atk-s0513a2:1516_2: tenāyaṃ sakuṇo na phandati na calatīti. Evaṃ vutte macchagaṇo udakaṃ khobhetvā bakaṃ palāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:1517: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bako kuhako bhikkhu ahosi, maccharājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1521_0: Ko nu kho bhagavā hetūti idaṃ satthā sāketaṃ upanissāya viharanto sāketaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1521_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu panettha atītampi paccuppannampi heṭṭhā ekakanipāte kathitameva.
atk-s0513a2:1521_2: Tathāgatassa pana vihāraṃ gatakāle bhikkhū “sineho nāmesa, bhante, kathaṃ patiṭṭhātī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1523: “Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, ekacce idha puggale;
atk-s0513a2:1525_0: Tassattho – ko nu kho hetu, yena idhekacce puggale diṭṭhamatteyeva hadayaṃ ativiya
atk-s0513a2:1525_1: nibbāti, suvāsitassa sītassa udakassa ghaṭasahassena parisittaṃ viya sītalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a2:1525_2: ekacce na nibbāti. Ekacce diṭṭhamatteyeva cittaṃ pasīdati, mudu hoti, pemavasena
atk-s0513a2:1526: Atha nesaṃ satthā pemakāraṇaṃ dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1529: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1530_0: Tassattho – bhikkhave, pemaṃ nāmetaṃ dvīhi kāraṇehi jāyati, purimabhave mātā vā pitā
atk-s0513a2:1530_1: vā putto vā dhītā vā bhātā vā bhaginī vā pati vā bhariyā vā sahāyo vā mitto vā hutvā
atk-s0513a2:1530_2: yo yena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vutthapubbo, tassa iminā pubbeva sannivāsena bhavantarepi
atk-s0513a2:1530_3: anubandhanto so sineho na vijahati. Imasmiṃ attabhāve katena paccuppannahitena vā
atk-s0513a2:1530_4: evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi pemaṃ nāma jāyati. Yathā kiṃ? Uppalaṃva
atk-s0513a2:1530_5: yathodaketi. Vā-kārassa rassattaṃ kataṃ. Samuccayatthe cesa vutto, tasmā uppalañca
atk-s0513a2:1530_6: sesaṃ jalajapupphañca yathā udake jāyamānaṃ dve kāraṇāni nissāya jāyati udakañceva
atk-s0513a2:1530_7: kalalañca, tathā etehi dvīhi kāraṇehi pemaṃ jāyatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0513a2:1531: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca ime dve janā ahesuṃ, putto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1535_0: Iṅgha ekapadaṃ, tātāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1535_1: Sāvatthivāsī kiresa kuṭumbiko, athassa ekadivasaṃ aṅke nisinno putto atthassa dvāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1535_2: nāma pañhaṃ pucchi. So “buddhavisayo esa pañho, na taṃ añño kathetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1535_3: puttaṃ gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante, ayaṃ me dārako ūrumhi
atk-s0513a2:1535_4: nisinno atthassa dvāraṃ nāma pañhaṃ pucchi, ahaṃ taṃ ajānanto idhāgato, kathetha,
atk-s0513a2:1535_5: bhante, imaṃ pañha”nti. Satthā “na kho, upāsaka, ayaṃ dārako idāneva atthagavesako,
atk-s0513a2:1535_6: pubbepi atthagavesakova hutvā imaṃ pañhaṃ paṇḍite pucchi, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpissa kathesuṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1535_7: bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1536_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a2:1536_1: pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhi. Athassa putto daharo kumāro ūrumhi nisīditvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a2:1536_2: mayhaṃ ekapadaṃ anekatthanissitaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1540_0: Tattha iṅghāti yācanatthe codanatthe vā nipāto. Ekapadanti ekaṃ kāraṇapadaṃ, ekaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1540_1: kāraṇūpasañhitaṃ vā byañjanapadaṃ. Anekatthapadassitanti anekāni atthapadāni kāraṇapadāni
atk-s0513a2:1540_2: nissitaṃ. Kiñci saṅgāhikaṃ brūsīti kiñci ekapadaṃ bahūnaṃ padānaṃ saṅgāhikaṃ brūhi,
atk-s0513a2:1540_3: ayameva vā pāṭho. Yenatthe sādhayemaseti yena ekena padena anekatthanissitena mayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1540_4: attano vuḍḍhiṃ sādheyyāma, taṃ me kathehīti pucchi.
atk-s0513a2:1545: Alaṃ mitte sukhāpetuṃ, amittānaṃ dukhāya cā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1546_0: Tattha dakkheyyekapadanti dakkheyyaṃ ekapadaṃ. Dakkheyyaṃ nāma lābhuppādakassa chekassa
atk-s0513a2:1546_1: kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ. Anekatthapadassitanti evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1546_2: anekehi atthapadehi nissitaṃ. Katarehīti? Sīlādīhi. Teneva “tañca sīlena saññutta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0513a2:1546_3: Tassattho – tañca panetaṃ vīriyaṃ ācārasīlasampayuttaṃ adhivāsanakhantiyā upetaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1546_4: mitte sukhāpetuṃ amittānañca dukkhāya alaṃ samatthaṃ. Ko hi nāma lābhuppādakañāṇasampayuttakusalavīriyasamannāgato
atk-s0513a2:1546_5: ācārakhantisampanno mitte sukhāpetuṃ, amitte vā dukkhāpetuṃ na sakkotīti.
atk-s0513a2:1547: Evaṃ bodhisatto puttassa pañhaṃ kathesi. Sopi pitu kathitanayeneva attano atthaṃ sādhetvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a2:1548_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:1548_1: pitāputtā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā. “Tadā putto ayameva putto ahosi, bārāṇasiseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a2:1552_0: Āsīvisampi maṃ santanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajātasattuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1552_1: Kosalarājassa hi pitā mahākosalo bimbisārarañño dhītaraṃ dadamāno dhītu nhānamūlaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1552_2: kāsigāmakaṃ nāma adāsi. Sā ajātasattunā pitughātakakamme kate rañño sinehena nacirasseva
atk-s0513a2:1552_3: kālamakāsi. Ajātasattu mātari kālakatāyapi taṃ gāmaṃ bhuñjateva. Kosalarājā “pitughātakassa
atk-s0513a2:1552_4: corassa mama kulasantakaṃ gāmaṃ na dassāmī”ti tena saddhiṃ yujjhati. Kadāci mātulassa
atk-s0513a2:1552_5: jayo hoti, kadāci bhāgineyyassa. Yadā pana ajātasattu jināti, tadā somanassappatto
atk-s0513a2:1552_6: rathe dhajaṃ ussāpetvā mahantena yasena nagaraṃ pavisati. Yadā pana parājayati, tadā
atk-s0513a2:1552_7: domanassappatto kañci ajānāpetvāva pavisati. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:1552_8: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, ajātasattu mātulaṃ jinitvā tussati, parājito domanassappatto
atk-s0513a2:1552_9: hotī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:1552_10: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa jinitvā tussati, parājito
atk-s0513a2:1553_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto nīlamaṇḍūkayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a2:1553_1: Tadā manussā nadīkandarādīsu tattha tattha macche gahaṇatthāya kumīnāni oḍḍesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1553_2: Ekasmiṃ kumīne bahū macchā pavisiṃsu. Atheko udakāsīviso macche khādanto taṃ kumīnaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1553_3: pāvisi, bahū macchā ekato hutvā taṃ khādantā ekalohitaṃ akaṃsu. So paṭisaraṇaṃ apassanto
atk-s0513a2:1553_4: maraṇabhayatajjito kumīnamukhena nikkhamitvā vedanāppatto udakapariyante nipajji.
atk-s0513a2:1553_5: Nīlamaṇḍūkopi tasmiṃ khaṇe uppatitvā kumīnasūlamatthake nipanno hoti. Āsīviso vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1553_6: alabhanto tattha nipannaṃ taṃ disvā “samma nīlamaṇḍūka, imesaṃ macchānaṃ kiriyā ruccati
atk-s0513a2:1556: Ruccate haritāmātā, yaṃ maṃ khādanti macchakā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1557: Tattha āsīvisampi maṃ santanti maṃ āgatavisaṃ samānaṃ. Ruccate haritāmātā, yaṃ maṃ khādanti macchakāti etaṃ tava ruccati haritamaṇḍūkaputtāti vadati.
atk-s0513a2:1558_0: Atha naṃ haritamaṇḍūko “āma, samma, ruccatī”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Sace tvampi tava
atk-s0513a2:1558_1: padesaṃ āgate macche khādasi, macchāpi attano padesaṃ āgataṃ taṃ khādanti, attano
atk-s0513a2:1558_2: visaye padese gocarabhūmiyaṃ abalavā nāma natthī”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1561: Yadā caññe vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1562_0: Tattha vilumpateva puriso, yāvassa upakappatīti yāva assa purisassa issariyaṃ upakappati
atk-s0513a2:1562_1: ijjhati pavattati, tāva so aññaṃ vilumpatiyeva. “Yāva so upakappatī”tipi pāṭho, yattakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1562_2: kālaṃ so puriso sakkoti vilumpitunti attho. Yadā caññe vilumpantīti yadā ca aññe
atk-s0513a2:1562_3: issarā hutvā vilumpanti. So vilutto vilumpatīti atha so vilumpako aññehi vilumpati.
atk-s0513a2:1562_4: “Vilumpate”tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. “Vilumpana”ntipi paṭhanti, tassattho na sameti.
atk-s0513a2:1562_5: Evaṃ “vilumpako puna vilumpaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti bodhisattena aḍḍe vinicchite udakāsīvisassa
atk-s0513a2:1562_6: dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā “paccāmittaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti macchagaṇā kumīnamukhā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a2:1563: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā udakāsīviso ajātasattu ahosi, nīlamaṇḍūko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1567_0: Sabbo janoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Devadatte
atk-s0513a2:1567_1: satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā navamāsaccayena jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake pathaviyaṃ nimugge
atk-s0513a2:1567_2: jetavanavāsino ca sakalaraṭṭhavāsino ca “buddhapaṭikaṇṭako devadatto pathaviyā gilito,
atk-s0513a2:1567_3: nihatapaccāmitto dāni sammāsambuddho jāto”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a2:1567_4: paramparaghosena sakalajambudīpavāsino yakkhabhūtadevagaṇā ca tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1567_5: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, devadatte pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1567_6: nimugge ‘buddhapaṭikaṇṭako devadatto pathaviyā gilito’ti mahājano attamano jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1567_7: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0513a2:1567_8: nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatte mate mahājano tussati ceva hasati
atk-s0513a2:1567_9: ca, pubbepi tussi ceva hasi cā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1568_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāpiṅgalo nāma rājā adhammena visamena rajjaṃ kāresi, chandādivasena
atk-s0513a2:1568_1: pāpakammāni karonto daṇḍabalijaṅghakahāpaṇādiggahaṇena ucchuyante ucchuṃ viya mahājanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1568_2: pīḷesi kakkhaḷo pharuso sāhasiko, paresu anuddayāmattampi nāmassa natthi, gehe itthīnampi
atk-s0513a2:1568_3: puttadhītānampi amaccabrāhmaṇagahapatikādīnampi appiyo amanāpo, akkhimhi patitarajaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1568_4: viya, bhattapiṇḍe sakkharā viya, paṇhiṃ vijjhitvā paviṭṭhakaṇṭako viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:1568_5: Tadā bodhisatto mahāpiṅgalassa putto hutvā nibbatti. Mahāpiṅgalo dīgharattaṃ rajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1568_6: kāretvā kālamakāsi. Tasmiṃ kālakate sakalabārāṇasivāsino haṭṭhatuṭṭhā mahāhasitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1568_7: hasitvā dārūnaṃ sakaṭasahassena mahāpiṅgalaṃ jhāpetvā anekehi ghaṭasahassehi āḷāhanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1568_8: nibbāpetvā bodhisattaṃ rajje abhisiñcitvā “dhammiko no rājā laddho”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā
atk-s0513a2:1568_9: nagare ussavabheriṃ carāpetvā samussitadhajapaṭākaṃ nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dvāre dvāre
atk-s0513a2:1568_10: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vippakiṇṇalājakusumamaṇḍitatalesu alaṅkatamaṇḍapesu nisīditvā khādiṃsu ceva piviṃsu ca.
atk-s0513a2:1569_0: Bodhisattopi alaṅkate mahātale samussitasetacchattassa pallaṅkavarassa majjhe mahāyasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1569_1: anubhavanto nisīdi. Amaccā ca brāhmaṇagahapatiraṭṭhikadovārikādayo ca rājānaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0513a2:1569_2: aṭṭhaṃsu. Atheko dovāriko nātidūre ṭhatvā assasanto passasanto parodi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:1569_3: taṃ disvā “samma dovārika, mama pitari kālakate sabbe tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā ussavaṃ kīḷantā
atk-s0513a2:1569_4: vicaranti, tvaṃ pana rodamāno ṭhito, kiṃ nu kho mama pitā taveva piyo ahosi manāpo”ti
atk-s0513a2:1571: “Sabbo jano hiṃsito piṅgalena, tasmiṃ mate paccayā vedayanti;
atk-s0513a2:1572: Piyo nu te āsi akaṇhanetto, kasmā nu tvaṃ rodasi dvārapālā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1573_0: Tattha hiṃsitoti nānappakārehi daṇḍabaliādīhi pīḷito. Piṅgalenāti piṅgalakkhena.
atk-s0513a2:1573_1: Tassa kira dvepi akkhīni nibbiddhapiṅgalāni biḷārakkhivaṇṇāni ahesuṃ, tenevassa “piṅgalo”ti
atk-s0513a2:1573_2: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Paccayā vedayantīti pītiyo pavedayanti. Akaṇhanettoti piṅgalanetto.
atk-s0513a2:1573_3: Kasmā nu tvanti kena nu kāraṇena tvaṃ rodasi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “kasmā tuva”nti pāṭho.
atk-s0513a2:1574_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “nāhaṃ, mahārāja, ‘mahāpiṅgalo mato’ti sokena rodāmi, sīsassa
atk-s0513a2:1574_1: me sukhaṃ jātaṃ. Piṅgalarājā hi pāsādā otaranto ca ārohanto ca kammāramuṭṭhikāya
atk-s0513a2:1574_2: paharanto viya mayhaṃ sīse aṭṭhaṭṭha khaṭake deti, so paralokaṃ gantvāpi mama sīse
atk-s0513a2:1574_3: dadamāno viya nirayapālānampi yamassapi sīle khaṭake dassati, atha naṃ te ‘ativiya
atk-s0513a2:1574_4: ayaṃ amhe bādhatī’ti puna idheva ānetvā vissajjeyyuṃ, atha me so punapi sīse khaṭake
atk-s0513a2:1574_5: dadeyyāti bhayenāhaṃ rodāmī”ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1576: “Na me piyo āsi akaṇhanetto, bhāyāmi paccāgamanāya tassa;
atk-s0513a2:1577: Ito gato hiṃseyya maccurājaṃ, so hiṃsito āneyya puna idhā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1578_0: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “so rājā dārūnaṃ vāhasahassena daḍḍho udakaghaṭasatehi sitto,
atk-s0513a2:1578_1: sāpissa āḷāhanabhūmi samantato khatā, pakatiyāpi ca paralokaṃ gatā nāma aññattha
atk-s0513a2:1578_2: gativasā puna teneva sarīrena nāgacchanti, mā tvaṃ bhāyī”ti taṃ samassāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1581: Parikkhatā ca sā bhūmi, mā bhāyi nāgamissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1582: Tato paṭṭhāya dovāriko assāsaṃ paṭilabhi. Bodhisatto dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a2:1583: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahāpiṅgalo devadatto ahosi, putto pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1593_0: Siṅgālo mānatthaddhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1593_1: Devadatto ajātasattuṃ pasādetvā uppāditaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a2:1593_2: nāḷāgiripayojane pāṭihāriyassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya tassa so lābhasakkāro antaradhāyi.
atk-s0513a2:1593_3: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, devadatto lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1593_4: uppādetvā ciraṭṭhitikaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:1593_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, devadatto
atk-s0513a2:1593_6: idāneva attano uppannaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ antaradhāpeti, pubbepi antaradhāpesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1594_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1594_1: vedānaṃ aṭṭhārasannañca sippānaṃ pāraṃ gato. So pathavījayamantaṃ nāma jānāti. Pathavījayamantoti
atk-s0513a2:1594_2: āvaṭṭanamanto vuccati. Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto “taṃ mantaṃ sajjhāyissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:1594_3: aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisīditvā sajjhāyamakāsi. Taṃ kira mantaṃ aññavihitaṃ dhitivirahitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1594_4: sāvetuṃ na sakkā, tasmā naṃ so tathārūpe ṭhāne sajjhāyati. Athassa sajjhāyanakāle
atk-s0513a2:1594_5: eko siṅgālo ekasmiṃ bile nipanno taṃ mantaṃ sutvāva paguṇamakāsi. So kira anantarātīte
atk-s0513a2:1594_6: attabhāve paguṇapathavījayamanto eko brāhmaṇo ahosi. Bodhisatto sajjhāyaṃ katvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:1594_7: “paguṇo vata me ayaṃ manto”ti āha. Siṅgālo bilā nikkhamitvā “ambho brāhmaṇa, ayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1594_8: manto tayāpi mameva paguṇataro”ti vatvā palāyi. Bodhisatto “ayaṃ siṅgālo mahantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1594_9: akusalaṃ karissatī”ti “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti thokaṃ anubandhi. Siṅgālo palāyitvā araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a2:1595_0: So gantvā ekaṃ siṅgāliṃ thokaṃ sarīre ḍaṃsi, “kiṃ, sāmī”ti ca vutte “mayhaṃ jānāsi
atk-s0513a2:1595_1: na jānāsī”ti āha. Sā “āma, jānāmī”ti sampaṭicchi. So pathavījayamantaṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0513a2:1595_2: anekāni siṅgālasatāni āṇāpetvā sabbepi hatthiassasīhabyagghasūkaramigādayo catuppade
atk-s0513a2:1595_3: attano santike akāsi. Katvā ca pana sabbadāṭho nāma rājā hutvā ekaṃ siṅgāliṃ aggamahesiṃ
atk-s0513a2:1595_4: akāsi. Dvinnaṃ hatthīnaṃ piṭṭhe sīho tiṭṭhati, sīhapiṭṭhe sabbadāṭho siṅgālo rājā
atk-s0513a2:1595_5: siṅgāliyā aggamahesiyā saddhiṃ nisīdati, mahanto yaso ahosi. So yasamahantena pamajjitvā
atk-s0513a2:1595_6: mānaṃ uppādetvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti sabbacatuppadaparivuto bārāṇasiyā avidūraṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1595_7: sampāpuṇi, parisā dvādasayojanā ahosi. So avidūre ṭhitoyeva “rajjaṃ vā detu, yuddhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1595_8: vā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ pesesi. Bārāṇasivāsino bhītatasitā nagaradvārāni pidahitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1596_0: Bodhisatto rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, sabbadāṭhasiṅgālena saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a2:1596_1: yuddhaṃ mama bhāro, ṭhapetvā maṃ añño tena saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1596_2: rājānañca nāgare ca samassāsetvā “kinti katvā nu kho sabbadāṭho rajjaṃ gahessati,
atk-s0513a2:1596_3: pucchissāmi tāva na”nti dvāraṭṭālakaṃ abhiruhitvā “samma sabbadāṭha, kinti katvā
atk-s0513a2:1596_4: imaṃ rajjaṃ gaṇhissasī”ti pucchi. “Sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā mahājanaṃ saddena santāsetvā
atk-s0513a2:1596_6: kaṇṇacchiddāni māsapiṭṭhena lañjantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi. Mahājano bheriyā āṇaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a2:1596_7: antamaso biḷāle upādāya sabbacatuppadānañceva attano ca kaṇṇacchiddāni yathā parassa
atk-s0513a2:1596_8: saddaṃ sotuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ māsapiṭṭhena lañji.
atk-s0513a2:1597_0: Atha bodhisatto puna aṭṭālakaṃ abhiruhitvā “sabbadāṭhā”ti āha. “Kiṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti?
atk-s0513a2:1597_1: “Imaṃ rajjaṃ kinti katvā gaṇhissasī”ti? “Sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā manusse tāsetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1597_2: pāpetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti. “Sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ na sakkhissasi. Jātisampannā hi surattahatthapādā
atk-s0513a2:1597_3: kesarasīharājāno tādisassa jarasiṅgālassa āṇaṃ na karissantī”ti. Siṅgālo mānatthaddho
atk-s0513a2:1597_4: hutvā “aññe tāva sīhā tiṭṭhantu, yassāhaṃ piṭṭhe nisinno, taññeva nadāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1597_5: āha. “Tena hi nadāpehi, yadi sakkosī”ti. So yasmiṃ sīhe nisinno, tassa “nadāhī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1597_6: pādena saññaṃ adāsi. Sīho hatthikumbhe mukhaṃ uppīḷetvā tikkhattuṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1597_7: sīhanādaṃ nadi. Hatthī santāsappattā hutvā siṅgālaṃ pādamūle pātetvā pādenassa sīsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1597_8: akkamitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ akaṃsu, sabbadāṭho tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto. Tepi hatthī
atk-s0513a2:1597_9: sīhanādaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayatajjitā aññamaññaṃ ovijjhitvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a2:1597_10: ṭhapetvā sīhe sesāpi migasūkarādayo sasabiḷārapariyosānā sabbe catuppādā tattheva
atk-s0513a2:1597_11: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sīhā palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisiṃsu, dvādasayojaniko maṃsarāsi
atk-s0513a2:1597_12: ahosi. Bodhisatto aṭṭālakā otaritvā nagaradvārāni vivarāpetvā “sabbe attano kaṇṇesu
atk-s0513a2:1597_13: māsapiṭṭhaṃ apanetvā maṃsatthikā maṃsaṃ āharantū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi. Manussā
atk-s0513a2:1597_14: allamaṃsaṃ khāditvā sesaṃ sukkhāpetvā vallūramakaṃsu. Tasmiṃ kira kāle vallūrakaraṇaṃ udapādīti vadanti.
atk-s0513a2:1598: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā imā abhisambuddhagāthā vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a2:1604: So hi tattha mahā hoti, siṅgālo viya dāṭhina”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1605_0: Tattha mānatthaddhoti parivāraṃ nissāya uppannena mānena thaddho. Parivārena atthikoti
atk-s0513a2:1605_1: uttarimpi parivārena atthiko hutvā. Mahatiṃ bhūminti mahantaṃ sampattiṃ. Rājāsi sabbadāṭhinanti
atk-s0513a2:1605_2: sabbesaṃ dāṭhīnaṃ rājā āsi. So hi tattha mahā hotīti so parivārasampanno puriso tesu
atk-s0513a2:1605_3: parivāresu mahā nāma hoti. Siṅgālo viya dāṭhinanti yathā siṅgālo dāṭhīnaṃ mahā ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:1605_4: evaṃ mahā hoti, atha so siṅgālo viya pamādaṃ āpajjitvā taṃ parivāraṃ nissāya vināsaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0513a2:1606: “Tadā siṅgālo devadatto ahosi, rājā sāriputto, purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1610_0: Bālo vatāyaṃ sunakhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ambaṇakoṭṭhake āsanasālāya
atk-s0513a2:1610_1: bhattabhuñjanasunakhaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Taṃ kira jātakālato paṭṭhāya pānīyahārakā
atk-s0513a2:1610_2: gahetvā tattha posesuṃ. So aparabhāge tattha bhattaṃ bhuñjanto thūlasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:1610_3: Athekadivasaṃ eko gāmavāsī puriso taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto sunakhaṃ disvā pānīyahārakānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1610_4: uttarisāṭakañca kahāpaṇañca datvā gaddūlena bandhitvā taṃ ādāya pakkāmi. So gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:1610_5: nīyamāno na vassi, dinnaṃ dinnaṃ khādanto pacchato pacchato agamāsi. Atha so puriso
atk-s0513a2:1610_6: “ayaṃ idāni maṃ piyāyatī”ti gaddūlaṃ mocesi, so vissaṭṭhamatto ekavegena āsanasālameva
atk-s0513a2:1610_7: gato. Bhikkhū taṃ disvā tena gatakāraṇaṃ jānitvā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1610_9: puna āgato”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a2:1610_10: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, so sunakho idāneva bandhanamokkhakusalo,
atk-s0513a2:1611_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ mahābhogakule
atk-s0513a2:1611_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ aggahesi. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ ekassa manussassa sunakho
atk-s0513a2:1611_2: ahosi, so piṇḍibhattaṃ labhanto thūlasarīro jāto. Atheko gāmavāsī bārāṇasiṃ āgato
atk-s0513a2:1611_3: taṃ sunakhaṃ disvā tassa manussassa uttarisāṭakañca kahāpaṇañca datvā sunakhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:1611_4: cammayottena bandhitvā yottakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā gacchanto aṭavimukhe ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a2:1611_5: sunakhaṃ bandhitvā phalake nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami. Tasmiṃ kāle bodhisatto kenacideva
atk-s0513a2:1611_6: karaṇīyena aṭaviṃ paṭipanno taṃ sunakhaṃ yottena bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ disvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1613: “Bālo vatāyaṃ sunakho, yo varattaṃ na khādati;
atk-s0513a2:1614: Bandhanā ca pamuñceyya, asito ca gharaṃ vaje”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1615: Tattha pamuñceyyāti pamoceyya, ayameva vā pāṭho. Asito ca gharaṃ vajeti asito suhito hutvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0513a2:1618: “Aṭṭhitaṃ me manasmiṃ me, atho me hadaye kataṃ;
atk-s0513a2:1620_0: Tattha aṭṭhitaṃ me manasmiṃ meti yaṃ tumhe kathetha, taṃ mayā adhiṭṭhitameva, manasmiṃyeva
atk-s0513a2:1620_1: me etaṃ. Atho me hadaye katanti atha ca pana me tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ hadaye katameva.
atk-s0513a2:1620_2: Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmīti kālaṃ paṭimānemi. Yāva passupatū janoti yāvāyaṃ mahājano pasupatu
atk-s0513a2:1620_3: niddaṃ okkamatu, tāvāhaṃ kālaṃ paṭimānemi. Itarathā hi “ayaṃ sunakho palāyatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1620_4: ravo uppajjeyya, tasmā rattibhāge sabbesaṃ suttakāle cammayottaṃ khāditvā palāyissāmīti.
atk-s0513a2:1620_5: So evaṃ vatvā mahājane niddaṃ okkante yottaṃ khāditvā suhito hutvā palāyitvā attano
atk-s0513a2:1621: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā sunakhova etarahi sunakho, paṇḍitapuriso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1625_0: Sattatantiṃ sumadhuranti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1625_1: Tasmiñhi kāle bhikkhū devadattaṃ āhaṃsu – “āvuso devadatta, sammāsambuddho tuyhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1625_2: ācariyo, tvaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ nissāya tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhi, cattāri jhānāni uppādesi,
atk-s0513a2:1625_3: ācariyassa nāma paṭisattunā bhavituṃ na yutta”nti. Devadatto “kiṃ pana me, āvuso,
atk-s0513a2:1625_4: samaṇo gotamo ācariyo, nanu mayā attano baleneva tīṇi piṭakāni uggahitāni, cattāri
atk-s0513a2:1625_5: jhānāni uppāditānī”ti ācariyaṃ paccakkhāsi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a2:1625_6: “āvuso, devadatto ācariyaṃ paccakkhāya sammāsambuddhassa paṭisattu hutvā mahāvināsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1625_7: patto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:1625_8: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva ācariyaṃ paccakkhāya mama
atk-s0513a2:1625_9: paṭisattu hutvā vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti, pubbepi pattoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1626_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto gandhabbakule nibbatti, “guttilakumāro”tissa
atk-s0513a2:1626_1: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto gandhabbasippe nipphattiṃ patvā guttilagandhabbo nāma
atk-s0513a2:1626_2: sakalajambudīpe aggagandhabbo ahosi. So dārābharaṇaṃ akatvā andhe mātāpitaro posesi.
atk-s0513a2:1626_3: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino vāṇijā vaṇijjāya ujjeninagaraṃ gantvā ussave ghuṭṭhe chandakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1626_4: saṃharitvā bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañca khajjabhojjādīni ca ādāya kīḷanaṭṭhāne sannipatitvā
atk-s0513a2:1626_5: “vetanaṃ datvā ekaṃ gandhabbaṃ ānethā”ti āhaṃsu. Tena ca samayena ujjeniyaṃ mūsilo
atk-s0513a2:1626_6: nāma jeṭṭhagandhabbo hoti, te taṃ pakkosāpetvā attano gandhabbaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1627_0: Mūsilo vīṇaṃ vādanto vīṇaṃ uttamamucchanāya mucchitvā vādesi. Tesaṃ guttilagandhabbassa
atk-s0513a2:1627_1: gandhabbe jātaparicayānaṃ tassa gandhabbaṃ kilañjakaṇḍūvanaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a2:1627_2: ekopi pahaṭṭhākāraṃ na dassesi. Mūsilo tesu tuṭṭhākāraṃ adassentesu “atikharaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:1627_3: vādemi maññe”ti majjhimamucchanāya mucchitvā majjhimasarena vādesi, te tatthapi majjhattāva
atk-s0513a2:1627_4: ahesuṃ. Atha so “ime na kiñci jānanti maññe”ti sayampi ajānanako viya hutvā tantiyo
atk-s0513a2:1627_5: sithile vādesi, te tatthapi na kiñci āhaṃsu. Atha ne mūsilo “ambho vāṇijā, kiṃ nu
atk-s0513a2:1627_6: kho mayi vīṇaṃ vādente tumhe na tussathā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ vīṇaṃ vādesi, mayañhi
atk-s0513a2:1627_7: ‘ayaṃ vīṇaṃ mucchetī’ti saññaṃ akarimhā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tumhe mayā uttaritaraṃ ācariyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1627_8: jānātha, udāhu attano ajānanabhāvena na tussathā”ti. Vāṇijā “bārāṇasiyaṃ guttilagandhabbassa
atk-s0513a2:1627_9: vīṇāsaddaṃ sutapubbānaṃ tava vīṇāsaddo itthīnaṃ dārake tosāpanasaddo viya hotī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1627_10: āhaṃsu. “Tena hi, handa, tumhehi dinnaparibbayaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha, na mayhaṃ etenattho,
atk-s0513a2:1627_11: apica kho pana bārāṇasiṃ gacchantā maṃ gaṇhitvā gaccheyyāthā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0513a2:1627_12: gamanakāle taṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā tassa “etaṃ guttilassa vasanaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhitvā
atk-s0513a2:1628_0: Mūsilo bodhisattassa gehaṃ pavisitvā laggetvā ṭhapitaṃ bodhisattassa jātivīṇaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a2:1628_1: gahetvā vādesi, atha bodhisattassa mātāpitaro andhabhāvena taṃ apassantā “mūsikā
atk-s0513a2:1628_2: maññe vīṇaṃ khādantī”ti saññāya “susū”ti āhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ kāle mūsilo vīṇaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a2:1628_3: bodhisattassa mātāpitaro vanditvā “kuto āgatosī”ti vutte “ācariyassa santike sippaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1628_4: uggaṇhituṃ ujjenito āgatomhī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti vutte “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:1628_5: “vippavuttho, tāta, ajja āgamissatī”ti sutvā tattheva nisīditvā bodhisattaṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0513a2:1628_6: disvā tena katapaṭisanthāro attano āgatakāraṇaṃ ārocesi. Bodhisatto aṅgavijjāpāṭhako,
atk-s0513a2:1628_7: so tassa asappurisabhāvaṃ ñatvā “gaccha tāta, natthi tava sippa”nti paṭikkhipi. So
atk-s0513a2:1628_8: bodhisattassa mātāpitūnaṃ pāde gahetvā upakāraṃ karonto te ārādhetvā “sippaṃ me dāpethā”ti
atk-s0513a2:1628_9: yāci. Bodhisatto mātāpitūhi punappunaṃ vuccamāno te atikkamituṃ asakkonto sippaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1628_10: adāsi. So bodhisatteneva saddhiṃ rājanivesanaṃ gacchati. Rājā taṃ disvā “ko esa,
atk-s0513a2:1628_11: ācariyā”ti pucchi. “Mayhaṃ antevāsiko, mahārājā”ti. So anukkamena rañño vissāsiko
atk-s0513a2:1628_12: ahosi. Bodhisatto ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ akatvā attano jānananiyāmena sabbaṃ sippaṃ sikkhāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:1629_0: So cintesi – “mayhaṃ sippaṃ paguṇaṃ, idañca bārāṇasinagaraṃ sakalajambudīpe agganagaraṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1629_1: ācariyopi mahallako, idheva mayā vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So ācariyaṃ āha – “ācariya ahaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1629_2: rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti. Ācariyo “sādhu, tāta, rañño ārocessāmī”ti gantvā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1629_3: antevāsiko devaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ icchati, deyyadhammamassa jānāthā”ti rañño ārocetvā raññā
atk-s0513a2:1629_4: “tumhākaṃ deyyadhammato upaḍḍhaṃ labhissatī”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ mūsilassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a2:1629_5: Mūsilo “ahaṃ tumhehi samakaññeva labhanto upaṭṭhahissāmi, na alabhanto”ti āha. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti?
atk-s0513a2:1629_6: “Nanu ahaṃ tumhākaṃ jānanasippaṃ sabbaṃ jānāmī”ti? “Āma, jānāsī”ti. “Evaṃ sante kasmā
atk-s0513a2:1629_7: mayhaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ detī”ti? Bodhisatto rañño ārocesi. Rājā “yadi evaṃ tumhehi samakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1629_8: sippaṃ dassetuṃ sakkonto samakaṃ labhissatī”ti āha. Bodhisatto rañño vacanaṃ tassa
atk-s0513a2:1629_9: ārocetvā tena “sādhu dassessāmī”ti vutte rañño taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “sādhu dassetu,
atk-s0513a2:1629_10: kataradivasaṃ sākacchā hotū”ti vutte “ito sattame divase hotu, mahārājā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a2:1630_0: Rājā mūsilaṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ ācariyena saddhiṃ sākacchaṃ karissasī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1630_1: pucchitvā “saccaṃ, devā”ti vutte “ācariyena saddhiṃ viggaho nāma na vaṭṭati, mā karī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1630_2: vāriyamānopi “alaṃ, mahārāja, hotuyeva me ācariyena saddhiṃ sattame divase sākacchā,
atk-s0513a2:1630_3: katarassa jānibhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti āha. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “ito kira sattame
atk-s0513a2:1630_4: divase ācariyaguttilo ca antevāsikamūsilo ca rājadvāre aññamaññaṃ sākacchaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:1630_5: sippaṃ dassessanti, nāgarā sannipatitvā sippaṃ passantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:1631_0: Bodhisatto cintesi – “ayaṃ mūsilo daharo taruṇo, ahaṃ mahallako parihīnathāmo, mahallakassa
atk-s0513a2:1631_1: kiriyā nāma na sampajjati. Antevāsike nāma parājitepi viseso natthi, antevāsikassa
atk-s0513a2:1631_2: pana jaye sati pattabbalajjato araññaṃ pavisitvā maraṇaṃ varatara”nti. So araññaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1631_3: pavisitvā maraṇabhayena nivattati, lajjābhayena gacchati. Evamassa gamanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1631_4: karontasseva cha divasā atikkantā, tiṇāni matāni, jaṅghamaggo nibbatti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0513a2:1631_5: sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko āvajjamāno taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “guttilagandhabbo
atk-s0513a2:1631_6: antevāsikassa bhayena araññe mahādukkhaṃ anubhoti, etassa mayā avassayena bhavituṃ
atk-s0513a2:1631_7: vaṭṭatī”ti vegena gantvā bodhisattassa purato ṭhatvā “ācariya, kasmā araññaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1631_8: pucchitvā “kosi tva”nti vutte “sakkohamasmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “ahaṃ kho,
atk-s0513a2:1631_9: devarāja, antevāsikato parājayabhayena araññaṃ paviṭṭho”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1634: So maṃ raṅgamhi avheti, saraṇaṃ me hoti kosiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1635_0: Tassattho – ahaṃ, devarāja, mūsilaṃ nāma antevāsikaṃ sattatantiṃ sumadhuraṃ rāmaṇeyyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1635_1: vīṇaṃ attano jānananiyāmena sikkhāpesiṃ, so maṃ idāni raṅgamaṇḍale pakkosati, tassa
atk-s0513a2:1636: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “mā bhāyi, ahaṃ te tāṇañca leṇañcā”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1639: Na taṃ jayissati sisso, sissamācariya jessasī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1640_0: Tattha ahaṃ taṃ saraṇanti ahaṃ saraṇaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā hutvā taṃ tāyissāmi. Sammāti
atk-s0513a2:1640_1: piyavacanametaṃ. Sissamācariya, jessasīti, ācariya, tvaṃ vīṇaṃ vādayamāno sissaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1640_2: jinissasi. Apica tvaṃ vīṇaṃ vādento ekaṃ tantiṃ chinditvā cha vādeyyāsi, vīṇāya te
atk-s0513a2:1640_3: pakatisaddo bhavissati. Mūsilopi tantiṃ chindissati, athassa vīṇāya saddo na bhavissati.
atk-s0513a2:1640_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so parājayaṃ pāpuṇissati. Athassa parājayabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyampi tatiyampi
atk-s0513a2:1640_5: catutthampi pañcamampi sattamampi tantiṃ chinditvā suddhadaṇḍakameva vādeyyāsi, chinnatantikoṭīhi
atk-s0513a2:1640_6: saro nikkhamitvā sakalaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasinagaraṃ chādetvā ṭhassatīti.
atk-s0513a2:1641_0: Evaṃ vatvā sakko bodhisattassa tisso pāsakaghaṭikā datvā evamāha – “vīṇāsaddeneva
atk-s0513a2:1641_1: pana sakalanagare chādite ito ekaṃ pāsakaghaṭikaṃ ākāse khipeyyāsi, atha te purato
atk-s0513a2:1641_2: otaritvā tīṇi accharāsatāni naccissanti. Tāsaṃ naccanakāle ca dutiyaṃ khipeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a2:1641_3: athāparānipi tīṇi satāni otaritvā tava vīṇādhure naccissanti. Tato tatiyaṃ khipeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a2:1641_4: athāparāni tīṇi satāni otaritvā raṅgamaṇḍale naccissanti. Ahampi te santikaṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:1641_5: gaccha mā bhāyī”ti bodhisattaṃ assāsesi. Bodhisatto pubbaṇhasamaye gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:1641_6: Nāgarā rājadvārasamīpe maṇḍapaṃ katvā rañño āsanaṃ paññapesuṃ. Rājā pāsādā otaritvā
atk-s0513a2:1641_7: alaṅkatamaṇḍape pallaṅkamajjhe nisīdi, dvādasasahassā alaṅkatitthiyo amaccabrāhmaṇagahapatikādayo
atk-s0513a2:1641_8: ca rājānaṃ parivārayiṃsu, sabbe nāgarā sannipatiṃsu, rājaṅgaṇe cakkāticakke mañcātimañce bandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1642_0: Bodhisattopi nhātānulitto nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā vīṇaṃ gāhāpetvā attano paññattāsane
atk-s0513a2:1642_1: nisīdi. Sakko adissamānakāyena āgantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi, bodhisattoyeva naṃ passati.
atk-s0513a2:1642_2: Mūsilopi āgantvā attano āsane nisīdi. Mahājano parivāresi, āditova dvepi samasamaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1642_3: vādayiṃsu. Mahājano dvinnampi vāditena tuṭṭho ukkuṭṭhisahassāni pavattesi. Sakko
atk-s0513a2:1642_4: ākāse ṭhatvā bodhisattaññeva sāvento “ekaṃ tantiṃ chindā”ti āha. Bodhisatto tantiṃ
atk-s0513a2:1642_5: chindi, sā chinnāpi chinnakoṭiyā saraṃ muñcateva, devagandhabbaṃ viya vattati. Mūsilopi
atk-s0513a2:1642_6: tantiṃ chindi, tato saddo na nikkhami. Ācariyo dutiyampi chindi …pe… sattamampi chindi.
atk-s0513a2:1642_7: Suddhadaṇḍakaṃ vādentassa saddo nagaraṃ chādetvā aṭṭhāsi. Celukkhepasahassāni ceva
atk-s0513a2:1642_8: ukkuṭṭhisahassāni ca pavattayiṃsu. Bodhisatto ekaṃ pāsakaṃ ākāse khipi, tīṇi accharāsatāni
atk-s0513a2:1642_9: otaritvā nacciṃsu. Evaṃ dutiye ca tatiye ca khitte tīṇi tīṇi accharāsatāni otaritvā
atk-s0513a2:1643_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā mahājanassa iṅgitasaññaṃ adāsi, mahājano uṭṭhāya “tvaṃ ācariyena
atk-s0513a2:1643_1: saddhiṃ virujjhitvā ‘samakāraṃ karomī’ti vāyamasi, attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti mūsilaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1643_2: tajjetvā gahitagahiteheva pāsāṇadaṇḍādīhi saṃcuṇṇetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā pāde
atk-s0513a2:1643_3: gahetvā saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi. Rājā tuṭṭhacitto ghanavassaṃ vassāpento viya bodhisattassa
atk-s0513a2:1643_4: bahuṃ dhanaṃ adāsi, tathā nāgarā. Sakko bodhisattena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:1643_5: “ahaṃ te, paṇḍita, sahassayuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ gāhāpetvā pacchā mātaliṃ pesessāmi,
atk-s0513a2:1643_6: tvaṃ sahassayuttaṃ vejayantarathavaraṃ abhiruyha devalokaṃ āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a2:1644_0: Atha naṃ gantvā paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinnaṃ “kahaṃ gatāttha, mahārājā”ti devadhītaro
atk-s0513a2:1644_1: pucchiṃsu. Sakko tāsaṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ vitthārena kathetvā bodhisattassa sīlañca guṇañca
atk-s0513a2:1644_2: vaṇṇesi. Devadhītaro “mahārāja, mayampi ācariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmā, idha naṃ ānehī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1644_3: Sakko mātaliṃ āmantetvā “tāta, devaccharā guttilagandhabbaṃ daṭṭhukāmā, gaccha naṃ
atk-s0513a2:1644_4: vejayantarathe nisīdāpetvā ānehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti gantvā bodhisattaṃ ānesi. Sakko
atk-s0513a2:1644_5: bodhisattena saddhiṃ sammoditvā “devakaññā kira te, ācariya, gandhabbaṃ sotukāmā”ti
atk-s0513a2:1644_6: āha. “Mayaṃ mahārāja, gandhabbā nāma sippaṃ nissāya jīvāma, mūlaṃ labhantā vādeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1644_7: “Vādehi, ahaṃ te mūlaṃ dassāmī”ti. “Na mayhaṃ aññena mūlenattho, imā pana devadhītaro
atk-s0513a2:1644_8: attano attano kalyāṇakammaṃ kathentu, evāhaṃ vādessāmī”ti. Atha naṃ devadhītaro āhaṃsu
atk-s0513a2:1644_9: – “amhehi kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ pacchā tumhākaṃ kathessāma, gandhabbaṃ karohi ācariyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1644_10: Bodhisatto sattāhaṃ devatānaṃ gandhabbaṃ akāsi, taṃ dibbagandhabbaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0513a2:1644_11: pavatti. Sattame divase ādito paṭṭhāya devadhītānaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ pucchi. Ekaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0513a2:1644_12: ekassa bhikkhuno uttamavatthaṃ datvā sakkassa paricārikā hutvā nibbattaṃ accharāsahassaparivāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1644_13: uttamavatthadevakaññaṃ “tvaṃ purimabhave kiṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbattā”ti pucchi. Tassa
atk-s0513a2:1644_14: pucchanākāro ca vissajjanā ca vimānavatthumhi āgatameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-s0513a2:1646: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0513a2:1647: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0513a2:1648: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0513a2:1649: “Pucchāmi taṃ devi mahānubhāve, manussabhūtā kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0513a2:1650: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvā, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1652: Evaṃ piyarūpadāyikā manāpaṃ, dibbaṃ sā labhate upecca ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1655: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
atk-s0513a2:1656: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0513a2:1659_0: Aparā piṇḍāya caramānassa bhikkhuno pūjanatthāya pupphāni adāsi, aparā “cetiye gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1659_1: dethā”ti gandhe adāsi, aparā madhurāni phalāphalāni adāsi, aparā ucchurasaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a2:1659_2: aparā kassapadasabalassa cetiye gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ adāsi, aparā maggapaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1659_3: bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca kulagehe vāsaṃ upagatānaṃ santike dhammaṃ assosi, aparā
atk-s0513a2:1659_4: nāvāya upakaṭṭhāya velāya bhuttassa bhikkhuno udake ṭhatvā udakaṃ adāsi, aparā agāramajjhe
atk-s0513a2:1659_5: vasamānā akkodhanā hutvā sassusasuravattaṃ akāsi, aparā attano laddhakoṭṭhāsatopi
atk-s0513a2:1659_6: saṃvibhāgaṃ katvāva paribhuñji, sīlavatī ca ahosi, aparā paragehe dāsī hutvā nikkodhanā
atk-s0513a2:1659_7: nimmānā attano laddhakoṭṭhāsato saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā devarañño paricārikā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0513a2:1659_8: Evaṃ sabbāpi guttilavimānavatthusmiṃ āgatā chattiṃsa devadhītā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:1659_9: tattha nibbattā, sabbaṃ bodhisatto pucchi. Tāpissa attano katakammaṃ gāthāhiyeva
atk-s0513a2:1659_10: kathesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, svāhaṃ idhāgantvā
atk-s0513a2:1659_11: appamattakenapi kammena paṭiladdhadibbasampattiyo assosiṃ. Ito dāni paṭṭhāya manussalokaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1659_12: gantvā dānādīni kusalakammāneva karissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0513a2:1664: Svāhaṃ tattha gamissāmi, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. ;
atk-s0513a2:1665_0: Atha naṃ sattāhaccayena devarājā mātalisaṅgāhakaṃ āṇāpetvā rathe nisīdāpetvā bārāṇasimeva
atk-s0513a2:1665_1: pesesi. So bārāṇasiṃ gantvā devaloke attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ manussānaṃ ācikkhi. Tato
atk-s0513a2:1665_2: paṭṭhāya manussā saussāhā puññāni kātuṃ maññiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1666: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mūsilo devadatto ahosi, sakko anuruddho, rājā ānando, guttilagandhabbo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1670_0: Yaṃ passati na taṃ icchatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ palāyikaṃ paribbājakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1670_1: ārabbha kathesi. So kira sakalajambudīpe paṭivādaṃ alabhitvā sāvatthiṃ āgantvā “ko
atk-s0513a2:1670_2: mayā saddhiṃ vādaṃ kātuṃ samattho”ti pucchitvā “sammāsambuddho”ti sutvā mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a2:1670_3: jetavanaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Athassa
atk-s0513a2:1670_4: satthā taṃ vissajjetvā “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti pañhaṃ pucchi, so taṃ kathetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a2:1670_5: uṭṭhāya palāyi. Nisinnaparisā “ekapadeneva vo, bhante, paribbājako niggahito”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1670_6: Satthā “nāhaṃ, upāsakā, idānevetaṃ ekapadeneva niggaṇhāmi, pubbepi niggaṇhiṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1671_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:1671_1: vayappatto kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dīgharattaṃ himavante vasi. So pabbatā
atk-s0513a2:1671_2: oruyha ekaṃ nigamagāmaṃ nissāya gaṅgānivattane paṇṇasālāyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesi. Atheko
atk-s0513a2:1671_3: paribbājako sakalajambudīpe paṭivādaṃ alabhitvā taṃ nigamaṃ patvā “atthi nu kho koci
atk-s0513a2:1671_4: mayā saddhiṃ vādaṃ kātuṃ samattho”ti pucchitvā “atthī”ti bodhisattassa ānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1671_5: sutvā mahājanaparivuto tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisīdi. Atha
atk-s0513a2:1671_6: naṃ bodhisatto “vaṇṇagandhaparibhāvitaṃ gaṅgāpānīyaṃ pivissatī”ti pucchi. Paribbājako
atk-s0513a2:1671_7: vādena ottharanto “kā gaṅgā, vālukā gaṅgā, udakaṃ gaṅgā, orimatīraṃ gaṅgā, pārimatīraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1671_8: gaṅgā”ti āha. Bodhisatto “tvaṃ pana, paribbājaka, ṭhapetvā udakaṃ vālukaṃ orimatīraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1671_9: pārimatīrañca kahaṃ gaṅgaṃ labhissasī”ti āha. Paribbājako appaṭibhāno hutvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:1671_10: palāyi. Tasmiṃ palāte bodhisatto nisinnaparisāya dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:1673: “Yaṃ passati na taṃ icchati, yañca na passati taṃ kiricchati;
atk-s0513a2:1674: Maññāmi ciraṃ carissati, na hi taṃ lacchati yaṃ sa icchati.
atk-s0513a2:1676: “Yaṃ labhati na tena tussati, yañca pattheti laddhaṃ hīḷeti;
atk-s0513a2:1677: Icchā hi anantagocarā, vigaticchāna namo karomase”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1678_0: Tattha yaṃ passatīti yaṃ udakādiṃ passati, taṃ gaṅgāti na icchati. Yañca na passatīti
atk-s0513a2:1678_1: yañca udakādivinimuttaṃ gaṅgaṃ na passati, taṃ kiricchati. Maññāmi ciraṃ carissatīti
atk-s0513a2:1678_2: ahaṃ evaṃ maññāmi – ayaṃ paribbājako evarūpaṃ gaṅgaṃ pariyesanto ciraṃ carissati.
atk-s0513a2:1678_3: Yathā vā udakādivinimuttaṃ gaṅgaṃ, evaṃ rūpādivinimuttaṃ attānampi pariyesanto saṃsāre
atk-s0513a2:1678_4: ciraṃ carissati. Na hi taṃ lacchatīti ciraṃ carantopi yaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ gaṅgaṃ vā
atk-s0513a2:1678_5: attānaṃ vā icchati, taṃ na lacchati. Yaṃ labhatīti yaṃ udakaṃ vā rūpādiṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0513a2:1678_6: tena na tussati. Yañca pattheti laddhaṃ hīḷetīti evaṃ laddhena atussanto yaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1678_7: sampattiṃ pattheti, taṃ taṃ labhitvā “kiṃ etāyā”ti hīḷeti avamaññati. Icchā hi anantagocarāti
atk-s0513a2:1678_8: laddhaṃ hīḷetvā aññamaññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ icchanato ayaṃ icchā nāma taṇhā anantagocarā.
atk-s0513a2:1678_9: Vigaticchāna namo karomaseti tasmā ye vigaticchā buddhādayo, tesaṃ mayaṃ namakkāraṃ karomāti.
atk-s0513a2:1679: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā paribbājako etarahi paribbājako ahosi, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1683_0: Kālo ghasati bhūtānīti idaṃ satthā ukkaṭṭhaṃ nissāya subhagavane viharanto mūlapariyāyasuttantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1683_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tadā kira pañcasatā brāhmaṇā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:1683_2: tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhitvā mānamadamattā hutvā “sammāsambuddhopi tīṇeva piṭakāni jānāti,
atk-s0513a2:1683_3: mayampi tāni jānāma, evaṃ sante kiṃ tassa amhehi nānākaraṇa”nti buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ na
atk-s0513a2:1684_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā tesu āgantvā attano santike nisinnesu aṭṭhahi bhūmīhi paṭimaṇḍetvā
atk-s0513a2:1684_1: mūlapariyāyasuttantaṃ kathesi, te na kiñci sallakkhesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi – “mayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1684_2: amhehi sadisā paṇḍitā natthī’ti mānaṃ karoma, idāni pana na kiñci jānāma, buddhehi
atk-s0513a2:1684_3: sadiso paṇḍito nāma natthi, aho buddhaguṇā nāmā”ti. Te tato paṭṭhāya nihatamānā hutvā
atk-s0513a2:1684_4: uddhaṭadāṭhā viya sappā nibbisevanā jātā. Satthā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā
atk-s0513a2:1684_5: vesāliṃ gantvā gotamakacetiye gotamakasuttantaṃ nāma kathesi, dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0513a2:1684_6: kampi, taṃ sutvā te bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Mūlapariyāyasuttantapariyosāne pana
atk-s0513a2:1684_7: satthari ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharanteyeva bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ –
atk-s0513a2:1684_8: “āvuso, aho buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, te nāma brāhmaṇapabbajitā tathā mānamadamattā bhagavatā
atk-s0513a2:1684_9: mūlapariyāyadesanāya nihatamānā katā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:1684_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0513a2:1684_11: pubbepāhaṃ ime evaṃ mānapaggahitasire vicarante nihatamāne akāsiṃyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1685_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:1685_1: vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0513a2:1685_2: mante vācesi. Te pañcasatāpi niṭṭhitasippā sippe anuyogaṃ datvā “yattakaṃ mayaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0513a2:1685_3: ācariyopi tattakameva, viseso natthī”ti mānatthaddhā hutvā ācariyassa santikaṃ na
atk-s0513a2:1685_4: gacchanti, vattapaṭivattaṃ na karonti. Te ekadivasaṃ ācariye badarirukkhamūle nisinne
atk-s0513a2:1685_5: taṃ vambhetukāmā badarirukkhaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā “nissārovāyaṃ rukkho”ti āhaṃsu. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:1685_6: attano vambhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā antevāsike “ekaṃ vo pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti āha. Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhā
atk-s0513a2:1685_7: “vadetha, kathessāmā”ti. Ācariyo pañhaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1688: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1689_0: Tattha kāloti purebhattakālopi pacchābhattakālopīti evamādi. Bhūtānīti sattādhivacanametaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1689_1: na kālo bhūtānaṃ cammamaṃsādīni luñcitvā khādati, apica kho nesaṃ āyuvaṇṇabalāni
atk-s0513a2:1689_2: khepento yobbaññaṃ maddanto ārogyaṃ vināsento ghasati khādatīti vuccati. Evaṃ ghasanto
atk-s0513a2:1689_3: ca na kiñci vajjeti, sabbāneva ghasati. Na kevalañca bhūtāneva, apica kho sahattanā
atk-s0513a2:1689_4: attānampi ghasati, purebhattakālo pacchābhattakālaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Esa nayo pacchābhattakālādīsu.
atk-s0513a2:1689_5: Yo ca kālaghaso bhūtoti khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. So hi ariyamaggena āyatiṃ paṭisandhikālaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1689_6: khepetvā khāditvā ṭhitattā “kālaghaso bhūto”ti vuccati. Sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacīti so
atk-s0513a2:1689_7: yāyaṃ taṇhā apāyesu bhūte pacati, taṃ ñāṇagginā paci dahi bhasmamakāsi, tena “bhūtapacaniṃ
atk-s0513a2:1689_8: pacī”ti vuccati. “Pajani”ntipi pāṭho, janikaṃ nibbattakinti attho.
atk-s0513a2:1690_0: Imaṃ pañhaṃ sutvā māṇavesu ekopi jānituṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. Atha ne bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:1690_1: “mā kho tumhe ‘ayaṃ pañho tīsu vedesu atthī’ti saññaṃ akattha, tumhe ‘yamahaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0513a2:1690_2: taṃ sabbaṃ jānāmā’ti maññamānā maṃ badarirukkhasadisaṃ karotha, mama tumhehi aññātassa
atk-s0513a2:1690_3: bahuno jānanabhāvaṃ na jānātha, gacchatha sattame divase kālaṃ dammi, ettakena kālena
atk-s0513a2:1690_4: imaṃ pañhaṃ cintethā”ti. Te bodhisattaṃ vanditvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:1690_5: sattāhaṃ cintetvāpi pañhassa neva antaṃ, na koṭiṃ passiṃsu. Te sattamadivase ācariyassa
atk-s0513a2:1690_6: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīditvā “kiṃ, bhadramukhā, jānittha pañha”nti vutte “na
atk-s0513a2:1690_7: jānāmā”ti vadiṃsu. Atha bodhisatto te garahamāno dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1694_0: Tassattho – bahūni narānaṃ sīsāni dissanti, sabbāni ca tāni lomasāni, sabbāni mahantāni
atk-s0513a2:1694_1: gīvāsuyeva ṭhapitāni, na tālaphalaṃ viya hatthena gahitāni, natthi tesaṃ imehi dhammehi
atk-s0513a2:1694_2: nānākaraṇaṃ. Ettha pana kocideva kaṇṇavāti attānaṃ sandhāyāha. Kaṇṇavāti paññavā,
atk-s0513a2:1694_3: kaṇṇachiddaṃ pana na kassaci natthi. Iti te māṇavake “kaṇṇachiddamattameva tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1694_4: bālānaṃ atthi, na paññā”ti garahitvā pañhaṃ vissajjesi. Te sutvā – “aho ācariyā nāma
atk-s0513a2:1695: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pañcasatā māṇavakā ime bhikkhū ahesuṃ, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1699_0: Hantvā chetvā vadhitvā cāti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto
atk-s0513a2:1699_1: sīhasenāpatiṃ ārabbha kathesi. So hi bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gantvā nimantetvā punadivase
atk-s0513a2:1699_2: samaṃsakabhattaṃ adāsi. Nigaṇṭhā taṃ sutvā kupitā anattamanā tathāgataṃ viheṭhetukāmā
atk-s0513a2:1699_3: “samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissakataṃ maṃsaṃ bhuñjatī”ti akkosiṃsu. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1699_4: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto ‘samaṇo gotamo jānaṃ uddissakataṃ
atk-s0513a2:1699_5: maṃsaṃ bhuñjatī’ti saddhiṃ parisāya akkosanto āhiṇḍatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā satthā “na,
atk-s0513a2:1699_6: bhikkhave, nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto idāneva maṃ uddissakatamaṃsakhādanena garahati, pubbepi
atk-s0513a2:1700_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:1700_1: vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya himavantato bārāṇasiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:1700_2: punadivase nagaraṃ bhikkhāya pāvisi. Atheko kuṭumbiko “tāpasaṃ viheṭhessāmī”ti gharaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1700_3: pavesetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā macchamaṃsena parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1700_4: nisīditvā “imaṃ maṃsaṃ tumheyeva uddissa pāṇe māretvā kataṃ, idaṃ akusalaṃ mā amhākameva,
atk-s0513a2:1702: “Hantvā chetvā vadhitvā ca, deti dānaṃ asaññato;
atk-s0513a2:1703: Edisaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjamāno, sa pāpena upalippatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1704_0: Tattha hantvāti paharitvā. Chetvāti kilametvā. Vadhitvāti māretvā. Deti dānaṃ asaññatoti
atk-s0513a2:1704_1: asaññato dussīlo evaṃ katvā dānaṃ deti. Edisaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjamāno, sa pāpena upalippatīti
atk-s0513a2:1704_2: edisaṃ uddissakatabhattaṃ bhuñjamāno so samaṇopi pāpena upalippati saṃyujjatiyevāti.
atk-s0513a2:1709_0: Tattha bhuñjamānopi sappaññoti tiṭṭhatu aññaṃ maṃsaṃ, puttadāraṃ vadhitvāpi dussīlena
atk-s0513a2:1709_1: dinnaṃ sappañño khantimettādiguṇasampanno taṃ bhuñjamānopi pāpena na upalippatīti.
atk-s0513a2:1709_2: Evamassa bodhisatto dhammaṃ kathetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a2:1710: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā kuṭumbiko nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto ahosi, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1714_0: Addhā pādañjalī sabbeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyītheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1714_1: Ekasmiñhi divase dve aggasāvakā pañhaṃ vinicchinanti, bhikkhū pañhaṃ suṇantā there
atk-s0513a2:1714_2: pasaṃsanti. Lāḷudāyīthero pana parisantare nisinno “ete amhehi samaṃ kiṃ jānantī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1714_3: oṭṭhaṃ bhañji. Taṃ disvā therā uṭṭhāya pakkamiṃsu, parisā bhijji. Dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1714_4: bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso lāḷudāyī, dve aggasāvake garahitvā oṭṭhaṃ bhañjī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1714_5: Taṃ sutvā satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi lāḷudāyī ṭhapetvā oṭṭhabhañjanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1714_6: tato uttari aññaṃ na jānātī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1715_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammānusāsako
atk-s0513a2:1715_1: amacco ahosi. Rañño pādañjalī nāma putto lālo dandhaparisakkano ahosi. Aparabhāge
atk-s0513a2:1715_2: rājā kālamakāsi. Amaccā rañño matakiccāni katvā “taṃ rajje abhisiñcissāmā”ti mantayamānā
atk-s0513a2:1715_3: rājaputtaṃ pādañjaliṃ āhaṃsu. Bodhisatto pana “ayaṃ kumāro lālo dandhaparisakkano,
atk-s0513a2:1715_4: pariggahetvā naṃ abhisiñcissāmā”ti āha. Amaccā vinicchayaṃ sajjetvā kumāraṃ samīpe
atk-s0513a2:1715_5: nisīdāpetvā aḍḍaṃ vinicchinantā na sammā vinicchiniṃsu. Te assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:1715_6: kumāraṃ pucchiṃsu – “kīdisaṃ, kumāra, suṭṭhu aḍḍaṃ vinicchinimhā”ti. So oṭṭhaṃ bhañji.
atk-s0513a2:1715_7: Bodhisatto “paṇḍito vata maññe kumāro, asammāvinicchitabhāvo tena ñāto bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1718: Tathā hi oṭṭhaṃ bhañjati, uttariṃ nūna passatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1719: Tassattho – ekaṃsena pādañjalikumāro sabbe amhe paññāya atirocati. Tathā hi oṭṭhaṃ bhañjati, nūna uttariṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ passatīti.
atk-s0513a2:1720_0: Te aparasmimpi divase vinicchayaṃ sajjetvā aññaṃ aḍḍaṃ suṭṭhu vinicchinitvā “kīdisaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1720_1: deva, suṭṭhu vinicchinita”nti pucchiṃsu. So punapi oṭṭhameva bhañji. Athassa andhabālabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1724: Amaccā pādañjalikumārassa lālabhāvaṃ ñatvā bodhisattaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1725: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā pādañjalī lāḷudāyī ahosi, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1729_0: Sabbehi kiṃsuko diṭṭhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kiṃsukopamasuttantaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:1729_1: kathesi. Cattāro hi bhikkhū tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ yāciṃsu, satthā
atk-s0513a2:1729_2: tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0513a2:1729_3: agamiṃsu. Tesu eko cha phassāyatanāni pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, eko pañcakkhandhe,
atk-s0513a2:1729_4: eko cattāro mahābhūte, eko aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo. Te attano attano adhigatavisesaṃ satthu
atk-s0513a2:1729_5: ārocesuṃ. Athekassa bhikkhuno parivitakko udapādi – “imesaṃ kammaṭṭhānāni nānā, nibbānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1729_6: ekaṃ, kathaṃ sabbehi arahattaṃ patta”nti. So satthāraṃ pucchi. Satthā “kiṃ te, bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a2:1729_7: kiṃsukadiṭṭhabhātikehi nānatta”nti vatvā “idaṃ no, bhante, kāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti bhikkhūhi
atk-s0513a2:1730_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa cattāro puttā ahesuṃ. Te ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1730_1: sārathiṃ pakkosetvā “mayaṃ, samma, kiṃsukaṃ daṭṭhukāmā, kiṃsukarukkhaṃ no dassehī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1730_2: āhaṃsu. Sārathi “sādhu, dassessāmī”ti vatvā catunnampi ekato adassetvā jeṭṭharājaputtaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1730_3: tāva rathe nisīdāpetvā araññaṃ netvā “ayaṃ kiṃsuko”ti khāṇukakāle kiṃsukaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a2:1730_4: Aparassa bahalapalāsakāle, aparassa pupphitakāle, aparassa phalitakāle. Aparabhāge
atk-s0513a2:1730_5: cattāropi bhātaro ekato nisinnā “kiṃsuko nāma kīdiso”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Tato
atk-s0513a2:1730_6: eko “seyyāthāpi jhāmathūṇo”ti āha. Dutiyo “seyyathāpi nigrodharukkho”ti, tatiyo “seyyathāpi
atk-s0513a2:1730_7: maṃsapesī”ti, catuttho “seyyathāpi sirīso”ti. Te aññamaññassa kathāya aparituṭṭhā
atk-s0513a2:1730_8: pitu santikaṃ gantvā “deva, kiṃsuko nāma kīdiso”ti pucchitvā “tumhehi kiṃ kathita”nti
atk-s0513a2:1730_9: vutte attanā kathitanīhāraṃ rañño kathesuṃ. Rājā “catūhipi tumhehi kiṃsuko diṭṭho,
atk-s0513a2:1730_10: kevalaṃ vo kiṃsukassa dassento sārathi ‘imasmiṃ kāle kiṃsuko kīdiso, imasmiṃ kīdiso’ti
atk-s0513a2:1730_11: vibhajitvā na pucchito, tena vo kaṅkhā uppannā”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1733: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, sārathī paripucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1734_0: Tattha na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, sārathī paripucchitoti sabbehi vo kiṃsuko diṭṭho, kiṃ
atk-s0513a2:1734_1: nu tumhe ettha vicikicchatha, sabbesu ṭhānesu kiṃsukoveso, tumhehi pana na hi sabbesu
atk-s0513a2:1734_2: ṭhānesu sārathi paripucchito, tena vo kaṅkhā uppannāti.
atk-s0513a2:1735_0: Satthā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetvā “yathā, bhikkhu, te cattāro bhātikā vibhāgaṃ katvā apucchitattā
atk-s0513a2:1735_1: kiṃsuke kaṅkhaṃ uppādesuṃ, evaṃ tvampi imasmiṃ dhamme kaṅkhaṃ uppādesī”ti vatvā abhisambuddho
atk-s0513a2:1738: Te ve dhammesu kaṅkhanti, kiṃsukasmiṃva bhātaro”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1739_0: Tassattho – yathā te bhātaro sabbesu ṭhānesu kiṃsukassa adiṭṭhattā kaṅkhiṃsu, evaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1739_1: sabbehi vipassanāñāṇehi yesaṃ sabbe chaphassāyatanakhandhabhūtadhātubhedā dhammā
atk-s0513a2:1739_2: ajānitā, sotāpattimaggassa anadhigatattā appaṭividdhā, te ve tesu phassāyatanādidhammesu
atk-s0513a2:1739_3: kaṅkhanti yathā ekasmiṃyeva kiṃsukasmiṃ cattāro bhātaroti.
atk-s0513a2:1740: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā bārāṇasirājā ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1744_0: Ekaputtako bhavissasīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:1744_1: kathesi. So kirekaṃ kumārakaṃ pabbājetvā pīḷento tattha viharati. Sāmaṇero pīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1744_2: sahituṃ asakkonto uppabbaji. Thero gantvā taṃ upalāpeti “kumāra, tava cīvaraṃ taveva
atk-s0513a2:1744_3: bhavissati pattopi, mama santakaṃ pattacīvarampi taveva bhavissati, ehi pabbajāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1744_4: So “nāhaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vatvāpi punappunaṃ vuccamāno pabbaji. Atha naṃ pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0513a2:1744_5: paṭṭhāya puna thero viheṭhesi. So pīḷaṃ asahanto puna uppabbajitvā anekavāraṃ yācantepi
atk-s0513a2:1744_6: tasmiṃ “tvaṃ neva maṃ sahasi, na vinā vattituṃ sakkosi, gaccha na pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:1744_7: na pabbaji. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, suhadayo vata so
atk-s0513a2:1744_8: dārako mahātherassa āsayaṃ ñatvā na pabbajī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:1744_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa
atk-s0513a2:1744_10: suhadayo, pubbepi suhadayova, ekavāraṃ etassa dosaṃ disvā na puna upagacchī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1745_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kuṭumbikakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:1745_1: vayappatto dhaññavikkayena jīvikaṃ kappesi. Aññataropi ahituṇḍiko ekaṃ makkaṭaṃ sikkhāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:1745_2: osadhaṃ gāhāpetvā tena sappaṃ kīḷāpento jīvikaṃ kappesi. So bārāṇasiyaṃ ussave ghuṭṭhe
atk-s0513a2:1745_3: ussavaṃ kīḷitukāmo “imaṃ mā pamajjī”ti taṃ makkaṭaṃ tassa dhaññavāṇijassa hatthe
atk-s0513a2:1745_4: ṭhapetvā ussavaṃ kīḷitvā sattame divase tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ makkaṭo”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a2:1745_5: Makkaṭo sāmikassa saddaṃ sutvāva dhaññāpaṇato vegena nikkhami. Atha naṃ so veḷupesikāya
atk-s0513a2:1745_6: piṭṭhiyaṃ pothetvā ādāya uyyānaṃ gantvā ekamante bandhitvā niddaṃ okkami. Makkaṭo
atk-s0513a2:1745_7: tassa niddāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano bandhanaṃ mocetvā palāyitvā ambarukkhaṃ āruyha
atk-s0513a2:1745_8: ambapakkaṃ khāditvā aṭṭhiṃ ahituṇḍikassa sarīre pātesi. So pabujjhitvā ullokento
atk-s0513a2:1745_9: taṃ disvā “madhuravacanena naṃ vañcetvā rukkhā otāretvā gaṇhissāmī”ti taṃ upalāpento
atk-s0513a2:1747: “Ekaputtako bhavissasi, tvañca no hessasi issaro kule;
atk-s0513a2:1748: Oroha dumasmā sālaka, ehi dāni gharakaṃ vajemase”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1749: Tassattho – tvaṃ mayhaṃ ekaputtako bhavissasi, kule ca me bhogānaṃ issaro, etamhā rukkhā otara, ehi amhākaṃ gharaṃ gamissāma. Sālakāti nāmena ālapanto āha.
atk-s0513a2:1752: “Nanu maṃ suhadayoti maññasi, yañca maṃ hanasi veḷuyaṭṭhiyā;
atk-s0513a2:1753: Pakkambavane ramāmase, gaccha tvaṃ gharakaṃ yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1754_0: Tattha nanu maṃ suhadayoti maññasīti nanu tvaṃ maṃ “suhadayo”ti maññasi, “suhadayo
atk-s0513a2:1754_1: aya”nti maññasīti attho. Yañca maṃ hanasi veḷuyaṭṭhiyāti yaṃ maṃ evaṃ atimaññasi,
atk-s0513a2:1754_2: yañca veḷupesikāya hanasi, tenāhaṃ nāgacchāmīti dīpeti. Atha naṃ “mayaṃ imasmiṃ pakkambavane
atk-s0513a2:1754_3: ramāmase, gaccha tvaṃ gharakaṃ yathāsukha”nti vatvā uppatitvā vanaṃ pāvisi. Ahituṇḍikopi
atk-s0513a2:1755: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā makkaṭo sāmaṇero ahosi, ahituṇḍiko mahāthero, dhaññavāṇijo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1759_0: Ayaṃ isī upasamasaṃyame ratoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a2:1759_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tassa hi kuhakabhāvo bhikkhūsu pākaṭo jāto. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1759_2: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, asuko bhikkhu niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvā kuhakavattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1759_3: pūretī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a2:1759_4: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, esa bhikkhu idāneva, pubbepi kuhakoyeva,
atk-s0513a2:1759_5: aggimattassa kāraṇā makkaṭo hutvā kohaññamakāsī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1760_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:1760_1: vayappatto puttassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle brāhmaṇiyā matāya puttaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1760_2: aṅkenādāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tampi puttaṃ tāpasakumārakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1760_3: katvā paṇṇasālāya vāsaṃ kappesi. Vassārattasamaye acchinnadhāre deve vassante eko
atk-s0513a2:1760_4: makkaṭo sītapīḷito dante khādanto kampanto vicarati. Bodhisatto mahante dārukkhandhe
atk-s0513a2:1760_5: āharitvā aggiṃ katvā mañcake nipajji, puttakopissa pāde parimajjamāno nisīdi. So
atk-s0513a2:1760_6: makkaṭo ekassa matatāpasassa santakāni vakkalāni nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca ajinacammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1760_7: aṃse katvā kājakamaṇḍaluṃ ādāya isivesenāgantvā paṇṇasāladvāre aggissa kāraṇā kuhakakammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1760_8: katvā aṭṭhāsi. Tāpasakumārako taṃ disvā “tāta, tāpaso eko sītapīḷito kampamāno tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a2:1760_9: idha naṃ pakkosatha, visibbessatī”ti pitaraṃ āyācanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1762: “Ayaṃ isī upasamasaṃyame rato, sa tiṭṭhati sisirabhayena aṭṭito;
atk-s0513a2:1763: Handa ayaṃ pavisatumaṃ agārakaṃ, vinetu sītaṃ darathañca kevala”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1764_0: Tattha upasamasaṃyame ratoti rāgādikilesaupasame ca sīlasaṃyame ca rato. Sa tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0513a2:1764_1: so tiṭṭhati. Sisirabhayenāti vātavuṭṭhijanitassa sisirassa bhayena. Aṭṭitoti pīḷito.
atk-s0513a2:1764_2: Pavisatumanti pavisatu imaṃ. Kevalanti sakalaṃ anavasesaṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1765: Bodhisatto puttassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāya olokento makkaṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:1767: “Nāyaṃ isī upasamasaṃyame rato, kapī ayaṃ dumavarasākhagocaro;
atk-s0513a2:1768: So dūsako rosako cāpi jammo, sace vajemampi dūseyyagāra”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1769_0: Tattha dumavarasākhagocaroti dumavarānaṃ sākhagocaro. So dūsako rosako cāpi jammoti
atk-s0513a2:1769_1: so evaṃ gatagataṭṭhānassa dūsanato dūsako, ghaṭṭanatāya rosako, lāmakabhāvena jammo.
atk-s0513a2:1769_2: Sace vajeti yadi imaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ vaje paviseyya, sabbaṃ uccārapassāvakaraṇena ca
atk-s0513a2:1770_0: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto ummukaṃ gahetvā taṃ santāsetvā palāpesi. So uppatitvā
atk-s0513a2:1770_1: vanaṃ pakkhanto tathā pakkhantova ahosi, na puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisatto abhiññā
atk-s0513a2:1770_2: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā tāpasakumārassa kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi, sopi abhiññā
atk-s0513a2:1770_3: ca samāpattiyo ca uppādesi. Te ubhopi aparihīnajjhānā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1771_0: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, porāṇato paṭṭhāyapesa kuhakoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1771_1: āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. Saccapariyosāne keci sotāpannā, keci
atk-s0513a2:1771_2: sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino keci arahanto ahesuṃ. “Tadā makkaṭo kuhakabhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:1771_3: putto rāhulo, pitā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1775: Sabbadāṭhī ca sunakho, guttilo vigaticchā ca;
atk-s0513a2:1781: Upāhano siṅgālo ca, dasavaggā duke siyuṃ.
atk-s0513a2:1787_0: Saṅkapparāgadhotenāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:1787_1: Sāvatthinagaravāsī kireko kulaputto sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1787_2: piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ itthiṃ disvā uppannakāmarāgo anabhirato vicari.
atk-s0513a2:1787_3: Tamenaṃ ācariyupajjhāyādayo disvā anabhiratikāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vibbhamitukāmabhāvamassa
atk-s0513a2:1787_4: ñatvā “āvuso, satthā nāma kāmarāgādikilesapīḷitānaṃ kilese hāretvā saccāni pakāsetvā
atk-s0513a2:1787_5: sotāpattiphalādīni deti, ehi taṃ satthu santikaṃ nessāmā”ti ādāya agamaṃsu. Satthārā
atk-s0513a2:1787_6: ca “kiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, anicchamānakaññeva bhikkhuṃ gahetvā āgatatthā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a2:1787_7: tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ukkaṇṭhito”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1787_8: bhante”ti vutte “kiṃkāraṇā”ti pucchi. So tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ satthā “itthiyo
atk-s0513a2:1787_9: nāmetā, bhikkhu, pubbe jhānabalena vikkhambhitakilesānaṃ visuddhasattānampi saṃkilesaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1787_10: uppādesuṃ, tādisaṃ tucchapuggalaṃ kiṃkāraṇā na saṃkilesissanti, visuddhāpi sattā
atk-s0513a2:1787_11: saṃkilissanti, uttamayasasamaṅginopi āyasakyaṃ pāpuṇanti, pageva aparisuddhā. Sinerukampanakavāto
atk-s0513a2:1787_12: purāṇapaṇṇakasaṭaṃ kiṃ na kampessati, bodhitale nisīditvā abhisambujjhanakasattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1787_13: ayaṃ kileso āloḷesi, tādisaṃ kiṃ na āloḷessatī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:1788_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhave brāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0513a2:1788_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā
atk-s0513a2:1788_2: katadārapariggaho mātāpitūnaṃ accayena tesaṃ matakiccāni katvā hiraññolokanakammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1788_3: karonto “idaṃ dhanaṃ paññāyati, yehi panetaṃ sambhataṃ, te na paññāyantī”ti āvajjento
atk-s0513a2:1788_4: saṃvegappatto ahosi, sarīrā sedā mucciṃsu. So gharāvāse ciraṃ vasanto mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a2:1788_5: kāme pahāya assumukhaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ pariccajitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1788_6: pabbajitvā ramaṇīye padese paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalādīhi yāpento
atk-s0513a2:1788_7: nacirasseva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto ciraṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a2:1788_8: cintesi – “manussapathaṃ gantvā loṇambilaṃ upasevissāmi, evaṃ me sarīrañceva thiraṃ
atk-s0513a2:1788_9: bhavissati, jaṅghavihāro ca kato bhavissati, ye ca mādisassa sīlasampannassa bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1788_10: vā dassanti, abhivādanādīni vā karissanti, te saggapuraṃ pūressantī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1789_0: So himavantā otaritvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno bārāṇasiṃ patvā sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya
atk-s0513a2:1789_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokento rājuyyānaṃ disvā “idaṃ paṭisallānasāruppaṃ, ettha vasissāme”ti
atk-s0513a2:1789_2: uyyānaṃ pavisitvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinno jhānasukhena rattiṃ khepetvā punadivase
atk-s0513a2:1789_4: ādāya santindriyo santamānaso iriyāpathasampanno yugamattadassano hutvā sabbākārasampannāya
atk-s0513a2:1789_5: attano rūpasiriyā lokassa locanāni ākaḍḍhento nagaraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhāya caranto
atk-s0513a2:1789_6: rañño nivesanadvāraṃ pāpuṇi. Rājā mahātale caṅkamanto vātapānantarena bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1789_7: disvā iriyāpathasmiññeva pasīditvā “sace santadhammo nāma atthi, imassa tena abbhantare
atk-s0513a2:1789_8: bhavitabba”nti cintetvā “gaccha, taṃ tāpasaṃ ānehī”ti ekaṃ amaccaṃ āṇāpesi. So gantvā
atk-s0513a2:1789_9: vanditvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā “rājā, bhante, taṃ pakkosatī”ti āha. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:1789_10: “mahāpuñña, amhe rājā na jānātī”ti āha. “Tena hi, bhante, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, tāva
atk-s0513a2:1789_11: idheva hothā”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā “amhākaṃ kulūpakatāpaso natthi, gaccha,
atk-s0513a2:1789_12: naṃ ānehī”ti sayampi vātapānena hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanto “ito etha, bhante”ti āha.
atk-s0513a2:1789_13: Bodhisatto amaccassa hatthe bhikkhābhājanaṃ datvā mahātalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a2:1790_0: Atha naṃ rājā vanditvā rājapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano sampāditehi yāgukhajjakabhattehi
atk-s0513a2:1790_1: parivisitvā katabhattakiccaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Pañhabyākaraṇena bhiyyosomattāya pasīditvā
atk-s0513a2:1790_2: vanditvā “bhante, tumhe katthavāsikā, kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā “himavantavāsikā
atk-s0513a2:1790_3: mayaṃ, mahārāja, himavantato āgatā”ti vutte puna “kiṃkāraṇā”ti pucchitvā “vassārattakāle,
atk-s0513a2:1790_4: mahārāja, nibaddhavāso nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tena hi, bhante, rājuyyāne
atk-s0513a2:1790_5: vasatha, tumhe ca catūhi paccayehi na kilamissatha, ahañca saggasaṃvattanikaṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1790_6: pāpuṇissāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā bhuttapātarāso bodhisattena saddhiṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:1790_7: paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā caṅkamaṃ māpetvā sesānipi rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0513a2:1790_8: pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā “sukhena vasatha, bhante”ti uyyānapālaṃ sampaṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:1790_9: Bodhisatto tato paṭṭhāya dvādasa saṃvaccharāni tattheva vasi.
atk-s0513a2:1791_0: Athekadivasaṃ rañño paccanto kupito. So tassa vūpasamanatthāya gantukāmo deviṃ āmantetvā
atk-s0513a2:1791_1: “bhadde, tayā nagare ohīyituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Kiṃ nissāya kathetha, devā”ti. “Sīlavantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1791_2: tāpasaṃ, bhadde”ti. “Deva, nāhaṃ tasmiṃ pamajjissāmi, amhākaṃ ayyassa paṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1791_3: mama bhāro, tumhe nirāsaṅkā gacchathā”ti. Rājā nikkhamitvā gato, devīpi bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1791_4: tatheva sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Bodhisatto pana rañño gatakāle nibaddhavelāyaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a2:1791_5: attano rucitāya velāya rājanivesanaṃ gantvā bhattakiccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a2:1792_0: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatte aticirāyante devī sabbaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0513a2:1792_1: nhatvā alaṅkaritvā nīcamañcakaṃ paññāpetvā bodhisattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā maṭṭhasāṭakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1792_2: sithilaṃ katvā nivāsetvā nipajji. Bodhisattopi velaṃ sallakkhetvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1792_3: ādāya ākāsenāgantvā mahāvātapānadvāraṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa vakkalasaddaṃ sutvā sahasā uṭṭhahamānāya
atk-s0513a2:1792_4: deviyā sarīrā maṭṭhasāṭako bhassittha, bodhisatto visabhāgārammaṇaṃ disvā indriyāni
atk-s0513a2:1792_5: bhinditvā subhavasena olokesi. Athassa jhānabalena sannisinnopi kileso karaṇḍake
atk-s0513a2:1792_6: pakkhittaāsīviso viya phaṇaṃ katvā uṭṭhahi, khīrarukkhassa vāsiyā ākoṭitakālo viya
atk-s0513a2:1792_7: ahosi. Kilesuppādanena saheva jhānaṅgāni parihāyiṃsu, indriyāni aparipuṇṇāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1792_8: sayaṃ pakkhacchinnakāko viya ahosi. So pubbe viya nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a2:1792_9: nisīdāpiyamānopi na nisīdi. Athassa devī sabbaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ bhikkhābhājaneyeva
atk-s0513a2:1792_10: pakkhipi. Yathā ca pubbe bhattakiccaṃ katvā sīhapañjarena nikkhamitvā ākāseneva gacchati,
atk-s0513a2:1792_11: evaṃ taṃ divasaṃ gantuṃ nāsakkhi. Bhattaṃ pana gahetvā mahānisseṇiyā otaritvā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1792_12: agamāsi. Devīpi assa attani paṭibaddhacittataṃ aññāsi. So uyyānaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1792_13: abhuñjitvāva heṭṭhāmañcake nikkhipitvā “deviyā evarūpā hatthasobhā pādasobhā, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1792_14: kaṭipariyosānaṃ, evarūpaṃ ūrulakkhaṇa”ntiādīni vippalapanto sattāhaṃ nipajji, bhattaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1793_0: Atha rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā paccāgato alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1793_1: katvā rājanivesanaṃ agantvāva “bodhisattaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā uklāpaṃ assamapadaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1793_2: disvā “pakkanto bhavissatī”ti paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā antopaviṭṭho taṃ nipannakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1793_3: disvā “kenaci aphāsukena bhavitabba”nti pūtibhattaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā paṇṇasālaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:1793_4: “bhante, kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti pucchi. “Viddhosmi, mahārājā”ti. Rājā “mama paccāmittehi
atk-s0513a2:1793_5: mayi okāsaṃ alabhantehi ‘mamāyanaṭṭhānamassa dubbalaṃ karissāmā’ti āgantvā esa viddho
atk-s0513a2:1793_6: bhavissati maññe”ti sarīraṃ parivattetvā viddhaṭṭhānaṃ olokento viddhaṭṭhānaṃ adisvā
atk-s0513a2:1793_7: “kattha viddhosi, bhante”ti pucchi. Bodhisatto “nāhaṃ, mahārāja, aññena viddho, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1793_8: pana attanāva attānaṃ hadaye vijjhi”nti vatvā uṭṭhāya nisīditvā imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:1802: Yāva ayoniso cittaṃ, sayaṃ me dukkhamābhata”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1803_1: teneva rāgodakena vitakkapāsāṇe nisitena. Nālaṅkatena bhadrenāti neva alaṅkatena
atk-s0513a2:1803_2: bhadrena, analaṅkatena bībhacchenāti attho. Usukārākatena cāti usukārehipi akatena.
atk-s0513a2:1803_3: Na kaṇṇāyatamuttenāti yāva dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷakaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā amuttakena. Nāpi morūpasevināti
atk-s0513a2:1803_4: morapattagijjhapattādīhi akatūpasevanena. Tenamhi hadaye viddhoti tena kilesakaṇḍenāhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1803_5: hadaye viddho amhi. Sabbaṅgaparidāhināti sabbāni aṅgāni paridahanasamatthena. Mahārāja,
atk-s0513a2:1803_6: tena hi kilesakaṇḍena hadaye viddhakālato paṭṭhāya mama aggi padittāniva sabbāni
atk-s0513a2:1804_0: Āvedhañca na passāmīti viddhaṭṭhāne vaṇañca na passāmi. Yato ruhiramassaveti yato
atk-s0513a2:1804_1: me āvedhato lohitaṃ pagghareyya, taṃ na passāmīti attho. Yāva ayoniso cittanti ettha
atk-s0513a2:1804_2: yāvāti daḷhatthe nipāto, ativiya daḷhaṃ katvā ayoniso cittaṃ vaḍḍhitanti attho. Sayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1804_3: me dukkhamābhatanti attanāva mayā attano dukkhaṃ ānītanti.
atk-s0513a2:1805_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāhi tīhi gāthāhi rañño dhammaṃ desetvā rājānaṃ paṇṇasālato bahi
atk-s0513a2:1805_1: katvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā naṭṭhaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā paṇṇasālāya nikkhamitvā ākāse
atk-s0513a2:1805_2: nisinno rājānaṃ ovaditvā “mahārāja, ahaṃ himavantameva gamissāmī”ti vatvā “na sakkā,
atk-s0513a2:1805_3: bhante, gantu”nti vuccamānopi “mahārāja, mayā idha vasantena evarūpo vippakāro patto,
atk-s0513a2:1805_4: idāni na sakkā idha vasitu”nti rañño yācantasseva ākāse uppatitvā himavantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:1806_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:1806_1: ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi. Keci sotāpannā, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino,
atk-s0513a2:1806_2: keci arahanto ahesuṃ. “Tadā rājā ānando ahosi, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:1810_0: Ajjāpi me taṃ manasīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kodhanaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a2:1810_1: ārabbha kathesi. Aññataro kira, bhikkhu, kodhano ahosi upāyāsabahulo, appampi vutto
atk-s0513a2:1810_2: samāno kuppi abhisajji, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātvākāsi. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:1810_3: dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, asuko nāma bhikkhu kodhano upāyāsabahulo
atk-s0513a2:1810_4: uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyanto vicarati, evarūpe nikkodhane buddhasāsane
atk-s0513a2:1810_5: pabbajito samāno kodhamattampi niggaṇhituṃ na sakkotī”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a2:1810_6: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, kodhano”ti
atk-s0513a2:1810_7: pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi ayaṃ kodhano
atk-s0513a2:1811_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa putto brahmadattakumāro nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:1811_1: Porāṇakarājāno ca attano putte “evaṃ ete nihatamānadappā sītuṇhakkhamā lokacārittaññū
atk-s0513a2:1811_2: ca bhavissantī”ti attano nagare disāpāmokkhaācariye vijjamānepi sippuggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0513a2:1811_3: dūre tiroraṭṭhaṃ pesenti, tasmā sopi rājā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ puttaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:1811_4: ekapaṭalikaupāhanā ca paṇṇacchattañca kahāpaṇasahassañca datvā “tāta, takkasilaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1811_5: gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhā”ti pesesi. So “sādhū”ti mātāpitaro vanditvā nikkhamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0513a2:1811_6: takkasilaṃ patvā ācariyassa gehaṃ pucchitvā ācariye māṇavakānaṃ sippaṃ vācetvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:1811_7: gharadvāre caṅkamante gehaṃ gantvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito ācariyaṃ addasa, tattheva upāhanā
atk-s0513a2:1811_8: omuñcitvā chattañca apanetvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. So tassa kilantabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a2:1811_9: āgantukasaṅgahaṃ kāresi. Kumāro bhuttabhojano thokaṃ vissamitvā ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a2:1811_10: vanditvā aṭṭhāsi, “kuto āgatosi, tātā”ti ca vutte “bārāṇasito”ti āha. “Kassa puttosī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:1811_12: ābhato, udāhu dhammantevāsiko hotukāmosī”ti? So “ācariyabhāgo me ābhato”ti vatvā
atk-s0513a2:1812_0: Dhammantevāsikā divā ācariyassa kammaṃ katvā rattiṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhanti, ācariyabhāgadāyakā
atk-s0513a2:1812_1: gehe jeṭṭhaputtā viya hutvā sippameva uggaṇhanti. Tasmā sopi ācariyo sallahukena
atk-s0513a2:1812_2: subhanakkhattena kumārassa sippaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Kumāropi sippaṃ uggaṇhanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1812_3: ācariyena saddhiṃ nhāyituṃ agamāsi. Athekā mahallikā itthī tilāni sete katvā pattharitvā
atk-s0513a2:1812_4: rakkhamānā nisīdi. Kumāro setatile disvā khāditukāmo hutvā ekaṃ tilamuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:1812_5: khādi, mahallikā “taṇhāluko eso”ti kiñci avatvā tuṇhī ahosi. So punadivasepi tāya
atk-s0513a2:1812_6: velāya tatheva akāsi, sāpi naṃ na kiñci āha. Itaro tatiyadivasepi tathevākāsi, tadā
atk-s0513a2:1812_7: mahallikā “disāpāmokkho ācariyo attano antevāsikehi maṃ vilumpāpetī”ti bāhā paggayha
atk-s0513a2:1812_8: kandi. Ācariyo nivattitvā “kiṃ etaṃ, ammā”ti pucchi. “Sāmi, antevāsiko te mayā katānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1812_9: setatilānaṃ ajjekaṃ muṭṭhiṃ khādi, hiyyo ekaṃ, pare ekaṃ, nanu evaṃ khādanto mama
atk-s0513a2:1812_10: santakaṃ sabbaṃ nāsessatī”ti. “Amma, mā rodi, mūlaṃ te dāpessāmī”ti. “Na me, sāmi,
atk-s0513a2:1812_11: mūlenattho, yathā panesa kumāro puna evaṃ na karoti, tathā taṃ sikkhāpehī”ti. Ācariyo
atk-s0513a2:1812_12: “tena hi passa, ammā”ti dvīhi māṇavehi taṃ kumāraṃ dvīsu hatthesu gāhāpetvā veḷupesikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1812_13: gahetvā “puna evarūpaṃ mā akāsī”ti tikkhattuṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ pahari. Kumāro ācariyassa
atk-s0513a2:1812_14: kujjhitvā rattāni akkhīni katvā pādapiṭṭhito yāva kesamatthakā olokesi. Sopissa kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a2:1812_15: olokitabhāvaṃ aññāsi. Kumāro sippaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā “anuyogaṃ datvā mārāpetabbo esa mayā”ti
atk-s0513a2:1812_16: tena katadosaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā gamanakāle ācariyaṃ vanditvā “yadāhaṃ, ācariya, bārāṇasirajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1812_17: patvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesessāmi, tadā tumhe āgaccheyyāthā”ti sasineho viya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a2:1813_0: So bārāṇasiṃ patvā mātāpitaro vanditvā sippaṃ dassesi. Rājā “jīvamānena me putto
atk-s0513a2:1813_1: diṭṭho, jīvamānovassa rajjasiriṃ passāmī”ti puttaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpesi. So rajjasiriṃ
atk-s0513a2:1813_2: anubhavamāno ācariyena katadosaṃ saritvā uppannakodho “mārāpessāmi na”nti pakkosanatthāya
atk-s0513a2:1813_3: ācariyassa dūtaṃ pāhesi. Ācariyo “taruṇakāle naṃ saññāpetuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti agantvā
atk-s0513a2:1813_4: tassa rañño majjhimavayakāle “idāni naṃ saññāpetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti gantvā rājadvāre
atk-s0513a2:1813_5: ṭhatvā “takkasilācariyo āgato”ti ārocāpesi. Rājā tuṭṭho brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ
atk-s0513a2:1813_6: attano santikaṃ āgataṃ disvāva kodhaṃ uppādetvā rattāni akkhīni katvā amacce āmantetvā
atk-s0513a2:1813_7: “bho, ajjāpi me ācariyena pahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ rujjati, ācariyo nalāṭena maccuṃ ādāya ‘marissāmī’ti
atk-s0513a2:1813_8: āgato, ajjassa jīvitaṃ natthī”ti vatvā purimā dve gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:1815: “Ajjāpi me taṃ manasi, yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ tilamuṭṭhiyā;
atk-s0513a2:1819: Yaṃ maṃ bāhā gahetvāna, tikkhattuṃ anutāḷayī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1820_0: Tattha yaṃ maṃ bāhāya manti dvīsu padesu upayogavacanaṃ anutāḷanagahaṇāpekkhaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1820_1: maṃ tvaṃ tilamuṭṭhiyā kāraṇā anutāḷayi, anutāḷento ca maṃ bāhāya gahetvā anutāḷayi,
atk-s0513a2:1820_2: taṃ anutāḷanaṃ ajjāpi me manasīti ayañhettha attho. Nanu jīvite na ramasīti maññe
atk-s0513a2:1820_3: tvaṃ attano jīvitamhi nābhiramasi. Yenāsi brāhmaṇāgatoti yasmā brāhmaṇa idha mama
atk-s0513a2:1820_4: santikaṃ āgatosi. Yaṃ maṃ bāhā gahetvānāti yaṃ mama bāhā gahetvā, yaṃ maṃ bāhāya
atk-s0513a2:1820_5: gahetvātipi attho. Tikkhattuṃ anutāḷayīti tayo vāre veḷulaṭṭhiyā tāḷesi, ajja dāni
atk-s0513a2:1820_6: tassa phalaṃ vindāhīti naṃ maraṇena santajjento evamāha.
atk-s0513a2:1824: Sāsanaṃ taṃ na taṃ veraṃ, iti naṃ paṇḍitā vidū”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1825_0: Tattha ariyoti sundarādhivacanametaṃ. So pana ariyo catubbidho hoti ācāraariyo dassanaariyo
atk-s0513a2:1825_1: liṅgaariyo paṭivedhaariyoti. Tattha manusso vā hotu tiracchāno vā, ariyācāre ṭhito
atk-s0513a2:1827: Cajāmi te taṃ bhattāraṃ, gacchathūbho yathāsukha”nti. ;
atk-s0513a2:1828: Rūpena pana iriyāpathena ca pāsādikena dassanīyena samannāgato dassanaariyo nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0513a2:1830: Kathaṃ nu cittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapaññā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a2:1831: Nivāsanapārupanaliṅgaggahaṇena pana samaṇasadiso hutvā vicaranto dussīlopi liṅgaariyo nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0513a2:1833: Māyāvī asaññato palāpo, patirūpena caraṃ sa maggadūsī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:1834: Buddhādayo pana paṭivedhaariyā nāma. Tena vuttaṃ – “ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā cā”ti. Tesu idha ācāraariyova adhippeto.
atk-s0513a2:1835_0: Anariyanti dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ. Kubbantanti pāṇātipātādikaṃ pañcavidhadussīlyakammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1835_1: karontaṃ, ekameva vā etaṃ atthapadaṃ, anariyaṃ hīnaṃ lāmakaṃ pañcaverabhayakammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1835_2: karontaṃ puggalaṃ. Yoti khattiyādīsu yo koci. Daṇḍenāti yena kenaci paharaṇakena.
atk-s0513a2:1835_3: Nisedhatīti “mā puna evarūpaṃ karī”ti paharanto nivāreti. Sāsanaṃ taṃ na taṃ veranti
atk-s0513a2:1835_4: taṃ, mahārāja, akattabbaṃ karonte puttadhītaro vā antevāsike vā evaṃ paharitvā nisedhanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1835_5: nāma imasmiṃ loke sāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādo, na veraṃ. Iti naṃ paṇḍitā vidūti evametaṃ
atk-s0513a2:1835_6: paṇḍitā jānanti. Tasmā, mahārāja, tvampi evaṃ jāna, na evarūpe ṭhāne veraṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0513a2:1835_7: arahasi. Sace hi tvaṃ, mahārāja, mayā evaṃ sikkhāpito nābhavissa, atha gacchante
atk-s0513a2:1835_8: kāle pūvasakkhaliādīni ceva phalāphalādīni ca haranto corakammesu paluddho anupubbena
atk-s0513a2:1835_10: gahetvā rañño dassito “gacchathassa dosānurūpaṃ daṇḍaṃ upanethā”ti daṇḍabhayaṃ pāpuṇissa,
atk-s0513a2:1835_11: kuto te evarūpā sampatti abhavissa, nanu maṃ nissāya idaṃ issariyaṃ tayā laddhanti
atk-s0513a2:1835_12: evaṃ ācariyo rājānaṃ saññāpesi. Parivāretvā ṭhitā amaccāpissa kathaṃ sutvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:1835_13: deva, idaṃ issariyaṃ tumhākaṃ ācariyasseva santaka”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:1836_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā ācariyassa guṇaṃ sallakkhetvā “sabbissariyaṃ te, ācariya, dammi,
atk-s0513a2:1836_1: rajjaṃ paṭicchā”ti āha. Ācariyo “na me, mahārāja, rajjenattho”ti paṭikkhipi. Rājā
