atk-s0513a2:2451_11: laddhavinicchayāya vinicchayato nikkhamamānāya eva eko puriso sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0513a2:2452_0: Tassa gahaṇatthāya hatthaṃ pasāraṇakāle sakko attānaṃ dassesi. Sā disvāva “mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2452_1: saṃvaccharattayamatthake sahassadāyako puriso āgato, tāta, natthi me tava kahāpaṇehi
atk-s0513a2:2452_2: attho”ti hatthaṃ samiñjesi. Sakko attano sarīraññeva abhinimminitvā taruṇasūriyo
atk-s0513a2:2452_3: viya jalanto ākāse aṭṭhāsi, sakalanagaraṃ sannipati. Sakko mahājanamajjhe “ahaṃ etissā
atk-s0513a2:2452_4: vīmaṃsanavasena saṃvaccharattayamatthake sahassaṃ adāsiṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhantā nāma evarūpā
atk-s0513a2:2452_5: hutvā rakkhathā”ti ovādaṃ datvā tassā nivesanaṃ sattaratanehi pūretvā “ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:2452_6: appamattā hohī”ti taṃ anusāsitvā devalokameva agamāsi. Iminā kāraṇena sā “ahaṃ gahitabhatiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2452_7: ajīrāpetvāva aññena dīyamānāya bhatiyā hatthaṃ pasāresiṃ, iminā kāraṇena maṃ sīlaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2452_8: nārādheti, tena vo dātuṃ na sakkā”ti paṭikkhipi. Atha naṃ dūtā “hatthappasāraṇamattena
atk-s0513a2:2452_9: sīlabhedo natthi, sīlaṃ nāma etaṃ paramavisuddhi hotī”ti vatvā tassāpi santike sīlaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2453_0: Iti imesaṃ ekādasannaṃ janānaṃ rakkhaṇasīlaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā dantapuraṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:2453_1: kāliṅgarañño suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā tasmiṃ kurudhamme vattamāno
atk-s0513a2:2453_2: pañca sīlāni pūresi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakalakāliṅgaraṭṭhe devo vassi, tīṇi bhayāni vūpasantāni,
atk-s0513a2:2453_3: raṭṭhaṃ khemaṃ subhikkhaṃ ahosi. Bodhisatto yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā saparivāro saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a2:2454_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. “Saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:2454_1: keci sotāpannā ahesuṃ, keci sakadāgāmino, keci anāgāmino, keci arahanto”ti. Jātakasamodhāne pana –
atk-s0513a2:2464: Vassāni paññāsa samādhikānīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto bhagavato vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu uttānameva.
atk-s0513a2:2465_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvato hutvā bahupārāvataparivuto
atk-s0513a2:2465_1: araññe pabbataguhāyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesi. Aññataropi kho tāpaso sīlasampanno tesaṃ pārāvatānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2465_2: vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ upanissāya assamapadaṃ māpetvā pabbataguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2465_3: vāsaṃ kappesi. Bodhisatto antarantarā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā sotabbayuttakaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0513a2:2465_4: Tāpaso tattha ciraṃ vasitvā pakkāmi, athañño kūṭajaṭilo āgantvā tattha vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a2:2465_5: Bodhisatto pārāvataparivuto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā assamapade
atk-s0513a2:2465_6: vicaritvā girikandarasamīpe gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyaṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a2:2466_0: Athassa ekadivasaṃ paccantagāmavāsino manussā pārāvatamaṃsaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2466_1: So tattha rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā “kiṃ maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “pārāvatamaṃsa”nti
atk-s0513a2:2466_2: sutvā cintesi – “mayhaṃ assamapadaṃ bahū pārāvatā āgacchanti, te māretvā maṃsaṃ khādituṃ
atk-s0513a2:2466_3: vaṭṭatī”ti. So taṇḍulasappidadhikhīramaricādīni āharitvā ekamante ṭhapetvā muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2466_4: cīvarakaṇṇena paṭicchādetvā pārāvatānaṃ āgamanaṃ olokento paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi.
atk-s0513a2:2466_5: Bodhisatto pārāvataparivuto āgantvā tassa kūṭajaṭilassa duṭṭhakiriyaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2466_6: duṭṭhatāpaso aññenākārena nisinno, kacci nu kho amhākaṃ samānajātīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khādi,
atk-s0513a2:2466_7: parigaṇhissāmi na”nti anuvāte ṭhatvā tassa sarīragandhaṃ ghāyitvā “ayaṃ amhe māretvā
atk-s0513a2:2466_8: maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo, na tassa santikaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pārāvate ādāya paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0513a2:2466_9: cari. Tāpaso taṃ anāgacchantaṃ disvā “madhurakathaṃ tehi saddhiṃ kathetvā vissāsena
atk-s0513a2:2466_10: upagate māretvā maṃsaṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā purimā dve gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:2468: “Vassāni paññāsa samādhikāni, vasimha selassa guhāya romaka;
atk-s0513a2:2471: “Tedāni vakkaṅga kimatthamussukā, bhajanti aññaṃ girikandaraṃ dijā;
atk-s0513a2:2472: Na nūna maññanti mamaṃ yathā pure, cirappavutthā atha vā na te ime”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2473_0: Tattha samādhikānīti samaadhikāni. Romakāti rumāya uppanna, sudhotapavāḷena samānavaṇṇanettapādatāya
atk-s0513a2:2473_1: bodhisattaṃ pārāvataṃ ālapati. Asaṅkamānāti evaṃ atirekapaññāsavassāni imissā pabbataguhāya
atk-s0513a2:2473_2: vasantesu amhesu ete aṇḍajā ekadivasampi mayi āsaṅkaṃ akatvā abhinibbutacittāva hutvā
atk-s0513a2:2473_3: pubbe mama hatthattaṃ hatthappasāraṇokāsaṃ āgacchantīti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2474_0: Tedānīti te idāni. Vakkaṅgāti bodhisattaṃ ālapati, sabbepi pana pakkhino uppatanakāle
atk-s0513a2:2474_1: gīvaṃ vakkaṃ katvā uppatanato “vakkaṅgā”ti vuccanti. Kimatthanti kiṃkāraṇaṃ sampassamānā?
atk-s0513a2:2474_2: Ussukāti ukkaṇṭhitarūpā hutvā. Girikandaranti girito aññaṃ pabbatakandaraṃ. Yathā
atk-s0513a2:2474_3: pureti yathā pubbe ete pakkhino maṃ garuṃ katvā piyaṃ katvā maññanti, tathā idāni
atk-s0513a2:2474_4: na nūna maññanti, pubbe idha nivutthatāpaso añño, ayaṃ añño, evaṃ maññe ete maṃ maññantīti
atk-s0513a2:2474_5: dīpeti. Cirappavutthā atha vā na te imeti kiṃ nu kho ime ciraṃ vippavasitvā dīghassa
atk-s0513a2:2474_6: addhuno accayena āgatattā maṃ “soyeva aya”nti na sañjānanti, udāhu ye amhesu abhinibbutacittā,
atk-s0513a2:2474_7: na te ime, aññeva āgantukapakkhino, ime kena maṃ na upasaṅkamantīti pucchati.
atk-s0513a2:2475: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto pakkamitvā ṭhitova tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2477: “Jānāma taṃ na mayaṃ sampamūḷhā, soyeva tvaṃ te mayamasma nāññe;
atk-s0513a2:2478: Cittañca te asmiṃ jane paduṭṭhaṃ, ājīvikā tena tamuttasāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2479_0: Tattha na mayaṃ sampamūḷhāti mayaṃ mūḷhā pamattā na homa. Cittañca te asmiṃ jane
atk-s0513a2:2479_1: paduṭṭhanti tvaṃ, soyeva mayampi teyeva, na taṃ sañjānāma, apica kho pana tava cittaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2479_2: asmiṃ jane paduṭṭhaṃ amhe māretuṃ uppannaṃ. Ājīvikāti ājīvahetu pabbajita paduṭṭhatāpasa.
atk-s0513a2:2479_3: Tena tamuttasāmāti tena kāraṇena taṃ uttasāma bhāyāma na upasaṅkamāma.
atk-s0513a2:2480_0: Kūṭatāpaso “ñāto ahaṃ imehī”ti muggaraṃ khipitvā virajjhitvā “gaccha tāva tvaṃ viraddhomhī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2480_1: āha. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “maṃ tāva viraddhosi, cattāro pana apāye na virajjhasi.
atk-s0513a2:2480_2: Sace idha vasissasi, gāmavāsīnaṃ ‘coro aya’nti ācikkhitvā taṃ gāhāpessāmi sīghaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2480_3: palāyassū”ti taṃ tajjetvā pakkāmi. Kūṭajaṭilo tattha vasituṃ nāsakkhi, aññattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2481_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a2:2481_1: kūṭatāpaso devadatto ahosi, purimo sīlavantatāpaso sāriputto, pārāvatajeṭṭhako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2485_0: Kimatthamabhisandhāyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ lolamakkaṭaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2485_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ kule eko posāvaniyalolamakkaṭo hatthisālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:2485_2: ekassa sīlavantassa hatthissa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvā uccārapassāvaṃ karoti, piṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2485_3: caṅkamati. Hatthī attano sīlavantatāya khantisampadāya na kiñci karoti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2485_4: tassa hatthissa ṭhāne añño duṭṭhahatthipoto aṭṭhāsi. Makkaṭo “soyeva aya”nti saññāya
atk-s0513a2:2485_5: duṭṭhahatthissa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ so soṇḍāya gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā pādena
atk-s0513a2:2485_6: akkamitvā sañcuṇṇesi. Sā pavatti bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭā jātā. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:2485_7: dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, lolamakkaṭo kira sīlavantahatthisaññāya
atk-s0513a2:2485_8: duṭṭhahatthipiṭṭhiṃ abhiruhi, atha naṃ so jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a2:2485_9: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a2:2485_10: “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa, lolamakkaṭo evaṃsīlo, porāṇato paṭṭhāya evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2486_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavantapadese mahiṃsayoniyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2486_2: vicaranto ekaṃ phāsukaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ disvā gocaraṃ gahetvā divā tasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0513a2:2486_3: aṭṭhāsi. Atheko lolamakkaṭo rukkhā otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā uccārapassāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2486_4: katvā siṅge gaṇhitvā olambanto naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā dolāyantova kīḷi. Bodhisatto khantimettānuddayasampadāya
atk-s0513a2:2486_5: taṃ tassa anācāraṃ na manasākāsi, makkaṭo punappunaṃ tatheva kari. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2486_6: tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā rukkhakkhandhe ṭhatvā naṃ “mahiṃsarāja kasmā imassa
atk-s0513a2:2486_7: duṭṭhamakkaṭassa avamānaṃ sahasi, nisedhehi na”nti vatvā etamatthaṃ pakāsentī purimā dve gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:2492: Bhiyyo bālā pakujjheyyuṃ, no cassa paṭisedhako”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2493_0: Tattha kimatthamabhisandhāyāti kiṃ nu kho kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kiṃ sampassamāno. Dubbhinoti
atk-s0513a2:2493_1: mittadubbhissa. Sabbakāmadadassevāti sabbakāmadadassa sāmikassa iva. Titikkhasīti
atk-s0513a2:2493_2: adhivāsesi. Padasā ca adhiṭṭhahāti pādena ca naṃ tiṇhakhuraggena yathā ettheva marati,
atk-s0513a2:2493_3: evaṃ akkama. Bhiyyo bālāti sace hi paṭisedhako na bhaveyya, bālā aññāṇasattā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2494_0: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “rukkhadevate, sacāhaṃ iminā jātigottabalādīhi adhiko samāno
atk-s0513a2:2494_1: imassa dosaṃ na sahissāmi, kathaṃ me manoratho nipphattiṃ gamissati. Ayaṃ pana maṃ
atk-s0513a2:2494_2: viya aññampi maññamāno evaṃ anācāraṃ karissati, tato yesaṃ caṇḍamahiṃsānaṃ esa evaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2494_3: karissati, eteyeva etaṃ vadhissanti. Sā tassa aññehi māraṇā mayhaṃ dukkhato ca pāṇātipātato
atk-s0513a2:2494_4: ca vimutti bhavissatī”ti vatvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2497: Te naṃ tattha vadhissanti, sā me mutti bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2498_0: Katipāhaccayena pana bodhisatto aññattha gato. Añño caṇḍamahiṃso tattha āgantvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2498_1: Duṭṭhamakkaṭo “soyeva aya”nti saññāya tassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā tatheva anācāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2498_2: cari. Atha naṃ so vidhunanto bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā siṅgena hadaye vijjhitvā pādehi madditvā sañcuṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a2:2499_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā
atk-s0513a2:2499_1: duṭṭhamahiṃso ayaṃ duṭṭhahatthī ahosi, duṭṭhamakkaṭo etarahi ayaṃ makkaṭo, sīlavā
atk-s0513a2:2503_0: Yathā māṇavako pantheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṇḍukalohitake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2503_1: Chabbaggiyānañhi dve janā mettiyabhūmajakā rājagahaṃ upanissāya vihariṃsu, dve assajipunabbasukā
atk-s0513a2:2503_2: kīṭāgiriṃ upanissāya vihariṃsu, paṇḍukalohitakā ime pana dve sāvatthiṃ upanissāya
atk-s0513a2:2503_3: jetavane vihariṃsu. Te dhammena nīhaṭaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭenti. Yepi tesaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattā
atk-s0513a2:2503_4: honti, tesaṃ upatthambhā hutvā “na, āvuso, tumhe etehi jātiyā vā gottena vā sīlena
atk-s0513a2:2503_5: vā nihīnatarā. Sace tumhe attano gāhaṃ vissajjetha, suṭṭhutaraṃ vo ete adhibhavissantī”tiādīni
atk-s0513a2:2503_6: vatvā gāhaṃ vissajjetuṃ na denti. Tena bhaṇḍanāni ceva kalahaviggahavivādā ca pavattanti.
atk-s0513a2:2503_7: Bhikkhū etamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Atha bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe
atk-s0513a2:2503_8: bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā paṇḍukalohitake pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a2:2503_9: attanāpi adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭetha, aññesampi gāhaṃ vissajjetuṃ na dethā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a2:2503_10: “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte “evaṃ sante, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ kiriyā satapattamāṇavassa
atk-s0513a2:2503_11: kiriyā viya hotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2504_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ kāsigāmake ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2504_1: kule nibbattitvā vayappatto kasivaṇijjādīhi jīvikaṃ akappetvā pañcasatamatte core
atk-s0513a2:2504_2: gahetvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā panthadūhanasandhicchedādīni karonto jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a2:2504_3: Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kuṭumbiko ekassa jānapadassa kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā puna aggahetvāva
atk-s0513a2:2504_4: kālamakāsi. Athassa bhariyā aparabhāge gilānā maraṇamañce nipannā puttaṃ āmantetvā
atk-s0513a2:2504_5: “tāta, pitā te ekassa sahassaṃ datvā anāharāpetvāva mato, sace ahampi marissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:2504_6: na so tuyhaṃ dassati, gaccha naṃ mayi jīvantiyā āharāpetvā gaṇhā”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0513a2:2504_7: sampaṭicchitvā tattha gantvā kahāpaṇe labhi. Athassa mātā kālakiriyaṃ katvā puttasinehena
atk-s0513a2:2505_0: Tadā so corajeṭṭhako maggapaṭipanne vilumpamāno sapariso tasmiṃ magge aṭṭhāsi. Atha
atk-s0513a2:2505_1: sā siṅgālī putte aṭavīmukhaṃ sampatte “tāta, mā aṭaviṃ abhiruhi, corā ettha ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a2:2505_2: te taṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhissantī”ti punappunaṃ maggaṃ occhindamānā nivāreti. So
atk-s0513a2:2505_3: taṃ kāraṇaṃ ajānanto “ayaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī siṅgālī mayhaṃ maggaṃ occhindatī”ti leḍḍudaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2505_4: gahetvā mātaraṃ palāpetvā aṭaviṃ paṭipajji. Atheko satapattasakuṇo “imassa purisassa
atk-s0513a2:2505_5: hatthe kahāpaṇasahassaṃ atthi, imaṃ māretvā taṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gaṇhathā”ti viravanto corābhimukho
atk-s0513a2:2505_6: pakkhandi. Māṇavo tena katakāraṇaṃ ajānanto “ayaṃ maṅgalasakuṇo, idāni me sotthi
atk-s0513a2:2505_7: bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “vassa, sāmi, vassa, sāmī”ti vatvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0513a2:2506_0: Bodhisatto sabbarutaññū tesaṃ dvinnaṃ kiriyaṃ disvā cintesi – imāya siṅgāliyā etassa
atk-s0513a2:2506_1: mātarā bhavitabbaṃ, tena sā “imaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhantī”ti bhayena vāreti. Iminā
atk-s0513a2:2506_2: pana satapattena paccāmittena bhavitabbaṃ, tena so “imaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2506_3: amhākaṃ ārocesi. Ayaṃ pana etamatthaṃ ajānanto atthakāmaṃ mātaraṃ tajjetvā palāpesi,
atk-s0513a2:2506_4: anatthakāmassa satapattassa “atthakāmo me”ti saññāya añjaliṃ paggaṇhāti, aho vatāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2506_5: bāloti. Bodhisattānañhi evaṃ mahāpurisānampi sataṃ parasantakaggahaṇaṃ visamapaṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
atk-s0513a2:2507_0: Māṇavo āgantvā corānaṃ sīmantaraṃ pāpuṇi. Bodhisatto taṃ gāhāpetvā “kattha vāsikosī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2507_2: atthi, tattha agamāsi”nti. “Laddhaṃ pana te”ti? “Āma, laddha”nti. “Kena tvaṃ pesitosī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2507_3: “Sāmi, pitā me mato, mātāpi me gilānā, sā ‘mayi matāya esa na labhissatī’ti maññamānā
atk-s0513a2:2507_4: maṃ pesesī”ti. “Idāni tava mātu pavattiṃ jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi, sāmī”ti. “Mātā te
atk-s0513a2:2507_5: tayi nikkhante kālaṃ katvā puttasinehena siṅgālī hutvā tava maraṇabhayabhītā maggaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2507_6: te occhinditvā taṃ vāresi, taṃ tvaṃ tajjetvā palāpesi, satapattasakuṇo pana te paccāmitto.
atk-s0513a2:2507_7: So ‘imaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhathā’ti amhākaṃ ācikkhi, tvaṃ attano bālatāya atthakāmaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2507_8: mātaraṃ ‘anatthakāmā me’ti maññasi, anatthakāmaṃ satapattaṃ ‘atthakāmo me’ti. Tassa
atk-s0513a2:2507_9: tumhākaṃ kataguṇo nāma natthi, mātā pana te mahāguṇā, kahāpaṇe gahetvā gacchā”ti vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a2:2508: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imā gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:2517: “Ye ca kho naṃ pasaṃsanti, bhayā ukkaṃsayanti vā;
atk-s0513a2:2518: Tañhi so maññate mittaṃ, satapattaṃva māṇavo”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2519_0: Tattha hitehīti hitaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ icchamānehi. Vacanaṃ vuttoti hitasukhāvahaṃ ovādānusāsanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2519_1: vutto. Paṭiggaṇhāti vāmatoti ovādaṃ agaṇhanto “ayaṃ me na atthāvaho hoti, anatthāvaho
atk-s0513a2:2519_2: me aya”nti gaṇhanto vāmato paṭiggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0513a2:2520_0: Ye ca kho nanti ye ca kho taṃ attano gāhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitapuggalaṃ “adhikaraṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:2520_1: ṭhitehi nāma tumhādisehi bhavitabba”nti vaṇṇenti. Bhayā ukkaṃsayanti vāti imassa
atk-s0513a2:2520_2: gāhassa vissaṭṭhapaccayā tumhākaṃ idañcidañca bhayaṃ uppajjissati, mā vissajjayittha,
atk-s0513a2:2520_3: na ete bāhusaccakulaparivārādīhi tumhe sampāpuṇantīti evaṃ vissajjanapaccayā bhayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2520_4: dassetvā ukkhipanti. Tañhi so maññate mittanti ye evarūpā honti, tesu yaṃkiñci so
atk-s0513a2:2520_5: ekacco bālapuggalo attano bālatāya mittaṃ maññati, “ayaṃ me atthakāmo mitto”ti maññati.
atk-s0513a2:2520_6: Satapattaṃva māṇavoti yathā anatthakāmaññeva satapattaṃ so māṇavo attano bālatāya
atk-s0513a2:2520_7: “atthakāmo me”ti maññati, paṇḍito pana evarūpaṃ “anuppiyabhāṇī mitto”ti agahetvā
atk-s0513a2:2522: Anuppiyañca yo āha, apāyesu ca yo sakhā.
atk-s0513a2:2525: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā corajeṭṭhako ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2529_0: Addhā hi nūna migarājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ puṭadūsakaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2529_1: kathesi. Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko amacco buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā uyyāne
atk-s0513a2:2529_2: nisīdāpetvā dānaṃ dadamāno “antarābhatte uyyāne caritukāmā carantū”ti āha. Bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:2529_3: uyyānacārikaṃ cariṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe uyyānapālo pattasampannaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a2:2529_4: mahantamahantāni paṇṇāni gahetvā “ayaṃ pupphānaṃ bhavissati, ayaṃ phalāna”nti puṭe
atk-s0513a2:2529_5: katvā rukkhamūle pāteti. Tassa putto dārako pātitapātitaṃ puṭaṃ viddhaṃseti. Bhikkhū
atk-s0513a2:2529_6: tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa puṭadūsakoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2530_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:2530_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena uyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2530_2: agamāsi. Tattha bahū vānarā vasanti. Uyyānapālo imināva niyāmena pattapuṭe pāteti,
atk-s0513a2:2530_3: jeṭṭhavānaro pātitapātite viddhaṃseti. Bodhisatto taṃ āmantetvā “uyyānapālena pātitapātitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2530_4: puṭaṃ viddhaṃsetvā manāpataraṃ kātukāmo maññe”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2533: Tathā hi puṭaṃ dūseti, aññaṃ nūna karissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2534_0: Tattha migarājāti makkaṭaṃ vaṇṇento vadati. Puṭakammassāti mālāpuṭakaraṇassa. Kovidoti
atk-s0513a2:2534_1: cheko. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – ayaṃ migarājā ekaṃsena puṭakammassa kovido maññe,
atk-s0513a2:2534_2: tathā hi pātitapātitaṃ puṭaṃ dūseti, aññaṃ nūna tato manāpataraṃ karissatīti.
atk-s0513a2:2537: “Na me mātā vā pitā vā, puṭakammassa kovido;
atk-s0513a2:2538: Kataṃ kataṃ kho dūsema, evaṃ dhammamidaṃ kula”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2541: “Yesaṃ vo ediso dhammo, adhammo pana kīdiso;
atk-s0513a2:2542: Mā vo dhammaṃ adhammaṃ vā, addasāma kudācana”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2543: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana vānaragaṇaṃ garahitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a2:2544: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā vānaro puṭadūsakadārako ahosi, paṇḍitapuriso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2548: Udapānavaraṃ vanabyaggha kapi, sikhinī ca balāka ruciravaro;
atk-s0513a2:2549: Sujanādhipa romaka dūsa puna, satapattavaro puṭakamma dasāti.
atk-s0513a2:2553_0: Abbhantaro nāma dumoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa bimbādevītheriyā
atk-s0513a2:2553_1: ambarasadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Sammāsambuddhe hi pavattitavaradhammacakke vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2553_2: kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharante mahāpajāpatī gotamī pañca sākiyasatāni ādāya gantvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2553_3: yācitvā pabbajjañceva upasampadañca labhi. Aparabhāge tā pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo nandakovādaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2553_4: sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthari pana sāvatthiṃ upanissāya viharante rāhulamātā
atk-s0513a2:2553_5: bimbādevī “sāmiko me pabbajitvā sabbaññutaṃ patto, puttopi me pabbajitvā tasseva
atk-s0513a2:2553_6: santike vasati, ahaṃ agāramajjhe kiṃkarissāmi, ahampi pabbajitvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a2:2553_7: sammāsambuddhañca puttañca nibaddhaṃ passamānā viharissāmī”ti cintetvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2553_8: gantvā pabbajitvā ācariyupajjhāyāhi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthārañca piyaputtañca
atk-s0513a2:2553_9: passamānā ekasmiṃ bhikkhunupassaye vāsaṃ kappesi. Rāhulasāmaṇero āgantvā mātaraṃ passati.
atk-s0513a2:2554_0: Athekadivasaṃ theriyā udaravāto kuppi. Sā putte daṭṭhuṃ āgate tassa dassanatthāya
atk-s0513a2:2554_1: nikkhamituṃ nāsakkhi, aññāva āgantvā aphāsukabhāvaṃ kathayiṃsu. So mātu santikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2554_2: gantvā “kiṃ te laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pucchi. “Tāta, agāramajjhe me sakkharayojite ambarase
atk-s0513a2:2554_3: pīte udaravāto vūpasammati, idāni piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappema, kuto taṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2554_4: Sāmaṇero “labhanto āharissāmī”ti vatvā nikkhami. Tassa panāyasmato upajjhāyo dhammasenāpati,
atk-s0513a2:2554_5: ācariyo mahāmoggallāno, cūḷapitā ānandatthero, pitā sammāsambuddhoti mahāsampatti.
atk-s0513a2:2554_6: Evaṃ santepi aññassa santikaṃ agantvā upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā dummukhākāro
atk-s0513a2:2554_7: hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ thero “kiṃ nu kho, rāhula, dummukho viyāsī”ti āha. “Mātu
atk-s0513a2:2554_8: me, bhante, theriyā udaravāto kupito”ti. “Kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Sakkharayojitena
atk-s0513a2:2554_9: kira ambarasena phāsu hotī”ti. “Hotu labhissāmi, mā cintayī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2555_0: So punadivase taṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā sāmaṇeraṃ āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā rājadvāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_1: agamāsi. Kosalarājā theraṃ disvā nisīdāpesi, taṅkhaṇaññeva uyyānapālo piṇḍipakkānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_2: madhuraambānaṃ ekaṃ puṭaṃ āhari. Rājā ambānaṃ tacaṃ apanetvā sakkharaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a2:2555_3: sayameva madditvā therassa pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi. Thero rājanivesanā nikkhamitvā āsanasālaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_4: gantvā sāmaṇerassa adāsi “haritvā mātu te dehī”ti. So haritvā adāsi, theriyā paribhuttamatteva
atk-s0513a2:2555_5: udaravāto vūpasami. Rājāpi manussaṃ pesesi – “thero idha nisīditvā ambarasaṃ na paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a2:2555_6: gaccha kassaci dinnabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti. So therena saddhiṃyeva gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_7: ñatvā āgantvā rañño kathesi. Rājā cintesi – “sace satthā agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, cakkavattirājā
atk-s0513a2:2555_8: abhavissa, rāhulasāmaṇero pariṇāyakaratanaṃ, therī itthiratanaṃ, sakalacakkavāḷarajjaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_9: etesaññeva abhavissa. Amhehi ete upaṭṭhahantehi caritabbaṃ assa, idāni pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a2:2555_10: amhe upanissāya vasantesu etesu na yuttaṃ amhākaṃ pamajjitu”nti. So tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:2555_11: theriyā nibaddhaṃ ambarasaṃ dāpesi. Therena bimbādevītheriyā ambarasassa dinnabhāvo
atk-s0513a2:2555_12: bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a2:2555_13: – “āvuso, sāriputtatthero kira bimbādevītheriṃ ambarasena santappesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0513a2:2555_14: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a2:2555_15: “na, bhikkhave, idāneva rāhulamātā sāriputtena ambarasena santappitā, pubbepesa etaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2556_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsigāmake brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2556_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā saṇṭhapitagharāvāso mātāpitūnaṃ accayena
atk-s0513a2:2556_2: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapadese abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā isigaṇaparivuto
atk-s0513a2:2556_3: gaṇasatthā hutvā dīghassa addhuno accayena loṇambilasevanatthāya pabbatapādā otaritvā
atk-s0513a2:2556_4: cārikaṃ caramāno bārāṇasiṃ patvā uyyāne vāsaṃ kappesi. Athassa isigaṇassa sīlatejena
atk-s0513a2:2556_5: sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampi. Sakko āvajjamāno taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “imesaṃ tāpasānaṃ avāsāya
atk-s0513a2:2556_6: parisakkissāmi, atha te bhinnāvāsā upaddutā caramānā cittekaggataṃ na labhissanti,
atk-s0513a2:2556_7: evaṃ me phāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “ko nu kho upāyo”ti vīmaṃsanto imaṃ upāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2556_8: addasa – majjhimayāmasamanantare rañño aggamahesiyā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ākāse ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a2:2556_9: “bhadde, sace tvaṃ abbhantaraambapakkaṃ khādeyyāsi, puttaṃ labhissasi, so cakkavattirājā
atk-s0513a2:2556_10: bhavissatī”ti ācikkhissāmi. Rājā deviyā kathaṃ sutvā ambapakkatthāya uyyānaṃ pesessati,
atk-s0513a2:2556_11: athāhaṃ ambāni antaradhāpessāmi, rañño uyyāne ambānaṃ abhāvaṃ ārocessanti, “ke te
atk-s0513a2:2556_12: khādantī”ti vutte “tāpasā khādantī”ti vakkhanti, taṃ sutvā rājā tāpase pothetvā nīharāpessati,
atk-s0513a2:2557: So majjhimayāmasamanantare sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ākāse ṭhito attano devarājabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tāya saddhiṃ sallapanto purimā dve gāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:2562: “Tvampi bhadde mahesīsi, sā cāpi patino piyā;
atk-s0513a2:2563: Āharissati te rājā, idaṃ abbhantaraṃ phala”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2564_0: Tattha abbhantaro nāma dumoti iminā tāva gāmanigamajanapadapabbatādīnaṃ asukassa
atk-s0513a2:2564_1: abbhantaroti avatvā kevalaṃ ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ ambarukkhaṃ kathesi. Yassa dibyamidaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2564_2: phalanti yassa ambarukkhassa devatānaṃ paribhogārahaṃ dibyaṃ phalaṃ. Idanti pana
atk-s0513a2:2564_3: nipātamattameva. Dohaḷinīti sañjātadohaḷā. Tvampi, bhadde, mahesīsīti tvaṃ, sobhane
atk-s0513a2:2564_4: mahesī, asi. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mahesī cā”tipi pāṭho. Sā cāpi patino piyāti soḷasannaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2564_5: devīsahassānaṃ abbhantare aggamahesī cāpi patino cāpi piyāti attho. Āharissati te
atk-s0513a2:2564_6: rājā, idaṃ abbhantaraṃ phalanti tassā te piyāya aggamahesiyā idaṃ mayā vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2564_7: phalaṃ rājā āharāpessati, sā tvaṃ taṃ paribhuñjitvā cakkavattigabbhaṃ labhissasīti.
atk-s0513a2:2565_0: Evaṃ sakko deviyā imā dve gāthā vatvā “tvaṃ appamattā hohi, mā papañcaṃ akāsi, sve
atk-s0513a2:2565_1: rañño āroceyyāsī”ti taṃ anusāsitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato. Sā punadivase gilānālayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2565_2: dassetvā paricārikānaṃ saññaṃ datvā nipajji. Rājā samussitasetacchatte sīhāsane nisinno
atk-s0513a2:2565_3: nāṭakāni passanto deviṃ adisvā “kahaṃ, devī”ti paricārike pucchi. “Gilānā, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2565_4: So tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanapasse nisīditvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto “kiṃ te, bhadde,
atk-s0513a2:2565_5: aphāsuka”nti pucchi. “Mahārāja aññaṃ aphāsukaṃ nāma natthi, dohaḷo me uppanno”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2565_7: atthī”ti? “Nāhaṃ, deva, abbhantaraambaṃ jānāmi, tassa pana me phalaṃ labhamānāya
atk-s0513a2:2565_8: jīvitaṃ atthi, alabhamānāya natthī”ti. “Tena hi āharāpessāmi, mā cintayī”ti rājā
atk-s0513a2:2565_9: deviṃ assāsetvā uṭṭhāya gantvā rājapallaṅke nisinno amacce pakkosāpetvā “deviyā abbhantaraambe
atk-s0513a2:2565_10: nāma dohaḷo uppanno, kiṃ kātabba”nti pucchi. “Deva dvinnaṃ ambānaṃ antare ṭhito ambo
atk-s0513a2:2565_11: abbhantaraambo nāma, uyyānaṃ pesetvā abbhantare ṭhitaambato phalaṃ āharāpetvā deviyā dāpethā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2566_0: Rājā “sādhu, evarūpaṃ ambaṃ āharathā”ti uyyānaṃ pesesi. Sakko attano ānubhāvena uyyāne
atk-s0513a2:2566_1: ambāni khāditasadisāni katvā antaradhāpesi. Ambatthāya gatā manussā sakalauyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2566_2: vicarantā ekaṃ ambampi alabhitvā gantvā uyyāne ambānaṃ abhāvaṃ rañño kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2566_3: “Ke ambāni khādantī”ti? “Tāpasā, devā”ti. “Tāpase uyyānato pothetvā nīharathā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2566_4: Manussā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā nīhariṃsu. Sakkassa manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. Devī
atk-s0513a2:2566_5: ambaphalatthāya nibaddhaṃ katvā nipajjiyeva. Rājā kattabbakiccaṃ apassanto amacce
atk-s0513a2:2566_6: ca brāhmaṇe ca sannipātāpetvā “abbhantaraambassa atthibhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti pucchi. Brāhmaṇā
atk-s0513a2:2566_7: āhaṃsu – “deva, abbhantaraambo nāma devatānaṃ paribhogo, ‘himavante kañcanaguhāya
atk-s0513a2:2566_8: anto atthī’ti ayaṃ no paramparāgato anussavo”ti. “Ko pana tato ambaṃ āharituṃ sakkhissatī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2566_9: “Na sakkā tattha manussabhūtena gantuṃ, ekaṃ suvapotakaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2567_0: Tena ca samayena rājakule eko suvapotako mahāsarīro kumārakānaṃ yānakacakkanābhimatto
atk-s0513a2:2567_1: thāmasampanno paññavā upāyakusalo. Rājā taṃ āharāpetvā “tāta suvapotaka, ahaṃ tava
atk-s0513a2:2567_2: bahūpakāro, kañcanapañjare vasasi, suvaṇṇataṭṭake madhulāje khādasi, sakkharapānakaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2567_3: pivasi, tayāpi amhākaṃ ekaṃ kiccaṃ nittharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Kiṃ, devā”ti. “Tāta
atk-s0513a2:2567_4: deviyā abbhantaraambe dohaḷo uppanno, so ca ambo himavante kañcanapabbatantare atthi
atk-s0513a2:2567_5: devatānaṃ paribhogo, na sakkā manussabhūtena tattha gantuṃ, tayā tato ambaphalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2567_6: āharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Sādhu, deva, āharissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ rājā suvaṇṇataṭṭake madhulāje
atk-s0513a2:2567_7: khādāpetvā sakkharapānakaṃ pāyetvā satapākatelena tassa pakkhantarāni makkhetvā ubhohi
atk-s0513a2:2567_8: hatthehi gahetvā sīhapañjare ṭhatvā ākāse vissajjesi. Sopi rañño nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā
atk-s0513a2:2567_9: ākāse pakkhandanto manussapathaṃ atikkamma himavante paṭhame pabbatantare vasantānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2567_10: sukānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā abbhantaraambo nāma kattha atthi, kathetha me taṃ ṭhāna”nti
atk-s0513a2:2567_11: pucchi. “Mayaṃ na jānāma, dutiye pabbatantare sukā jānissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2568_0: So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tato uppatitvā dutiyaṃ pabbatantaraṃ agamāsi, tathā tatiyaṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2568_1: catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. Tatthapi naṃ sukā “na mayaṃ jānāma, sattamapabbatantare
atk-s0513a2:2568_2: sukā jānissantī”ti āhaṃsu. So tatthapi gantvā “abbhantaraambo nāma kattha atthī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2568_3: pucchi. “Asukaṭṭhāne nāma kañcanapabbatantare”ti āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ tassa phalatthāya
atk-s0513a2:2568_4: āgato, maṃ tattha netvā tato me phalaṃ dāpethā”ti. Sukagaṇā āhaṃsu – “samma, so vessavaṇamahārājassa
atk-s0513a2:2568_5: paribhogo, na sakkā upasaṅkamituṃ, sakalarukkho mūlato paṭṭhāya sattahi lohajālehi
atk-s0513a2:2568_6: parikkhitto, sahassakumbhaṇḍarakkhasā rakkhanti, tehi diṭṭhassa jīvitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a2:2568_8: na gacchatha, mayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ ācikkhathā”ti. “Tena hi asukena ca asukena ca ṭhānena
atk-s0513a2:2568_9: yāhī”ti. So tehi ācikkhitavaseneva suṭṭhu maggaṃ upadhāretvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā divā
atk-s0513a2:2568_10: attānaṃ adassetvā majjhimayāmasamanantare rakkhasānaṃ niddokkamanasamaye abbhantaraambassa
atk-s0513a2:2568_11: santikaṃ gantvā ekena mūlantarena saṇikaṃ abhiruhituṃ ārabhi. Lohajālaṃ “kirī”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2569_0: Rakkhasā pabujjhitvā sukapotakaṃ disvā “ambacoroya”nti gahetvā kammakaraṇaṃ saṃvidahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2569_1: Eko “mukhe pakkhipitvā gilissāmi na”nti āha, aparo “hatthehi madditvā puñjitvā vippakirissāmi
atk-s0513a2:2569_2: na”nti, aparo “dvedhā phāletvā aṅgāresu pacitvā khādissāmī”ti. So tesaṃ kammakaraṇasaṃvidhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2569_3: sutvāpi asantasitvāva te rakkhase āmantetvā “ambho rakkhasā, tumhe kassa manussā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2569_4: āha. “Vessavaṇamahārājassā”ti. “Ambho, tumhepi ekassa raññova manussā, ahampi raññova
atk-s0513a2:2569_5: manusso, bārāṇasirājā maṃ abbhantaraambaphalatthāya pesesi, svāhaṃ tattheva attano
atk-s0513a2:2569_6: rañño jīvitaṃ datvā āgato. Yo hi attano mātāpitūnañceva sāmikassa ca atthāya jīvitaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2569_7: pariccajati, so devalokeyeva nibbattati, tasmā ahampi imamhā tiracchānayoniyā cavitvā
atk-s0513a2:2573_0: Tattha bhatturattheti bhattā vuccanti bhattādīhi bharaṇaposakā pitā mātā sāmiko ca,
atk-s0513a2:2573_1: iti tividhassapetassa bhattu atthāya. Parakkantoti parakkamaṃ karonto vāyamanto.
atk-s0513a2:2573_2: Yaṃ ṭhānamadhigacchatīti yaṃ sukhakāraṇaṃ yasaṃ vā lābhaṃ vā saggaṃ vā adhigacchati.
atk-s0513a2:2573_3: Sūroti abhīru vikkamasampanno. Attapariccāgīti kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkho hutvā
atk-s0513a2:2573_4: tassa tividhassapi bhattu atthāya attānaṃ pariccajanto. Labhamāno bhavāmahanti yaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2573_5: so evarūpo sūro devasampattiṃ vā manussasampattiṃ vā labhati, ahampi taṃ labhamāno
atk-s0513a2:2573_6: bhavāmi, tasmā hāsova me ettha, na tāso, kiṃ maṃ tumhe tāsethāti.
atk-s0513a2:2574_0: Evaṃ so imāya gāthāya tesaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Te tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacittā
atk-s0513a2:2574_1: “dhammiko esa, na sakkā māretuṃ, vissajjema na”nti vatvā sukapotakaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0513a2:2574_2: ‘ambho sukapotaka, muttosi, amhākaṃ hatthato sotthinā gacchā”ti āhaṃsu. “Mayhaṃ āgamanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2574_3: mā tucchaṃ karotha, detha me ekaṃ ambaphala”nti. “Sukapotaka, tuyhaṃ ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2574_4: dātuṃ nāma na bhāro, imasmiṃ pana rukkhe ambāni aṅketvā gahitāni, ekasmiṃ phale asamente
atk-s0513a2:2574_5: amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi. Vessavaṇena hi kujjhitvā sakiṃ olokite tattakapāle pakkhittatilā
atk-s0513a2:2574_6: viya kumbhaṇḍasahassaṃ bhijjitvā vippakirīyati, tena te dātuṃ na sakkoma, labhanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2574_7: pana ācikkhissāmā”ti. “Yo koci detu, phaleneva me attho, labhanaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhathā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2574_8: “Etassa kañcanapabbatassa antare jotiraso nāma tāpaso aggiṃ juhamāno kañcanapattiyā
atk-s0513a2:2574_9: nāma paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati vessavaṇassa kulūpako, vessavaṇo tassa nibaddhaṃ cattāri
atk-s0513a2:2575_0: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tāpasassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a2:2575_1: Atha naṃ tāpaso “kuto āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Bārāṇasirañño santikā”ti. “Kimatthāya āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2575_2: “Sāmi, amhākaṃ rañño deviyā abbhantaraambapakke dohaḷo uppanno, tadatthaṃ āgatomhi,
atk-s0513a2:2575_3: rakkhasā pana me sayaṃ ambapakkaṃ adatvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesesu”nti. “Tena hi nisīda,
atk-s0513a2:2575_4: labhissasī”ti. Athassa vessavaṇo cattāri phalāni pesesi. Tāpaso tato dve paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a2:2575_5: ekaṃ suvapotakassa khādanatthāya adāsi. Tena tasmiṃ khādite ekaṃ phalaṃ sikkāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a2:2575_6: suvapotakassa gīvāya paṭimuñcitvā “idāni gacchā”ti sukapotakaṃ vissajjesi. So taṃ
atk-s0513a2:2575_7: āharitvā deviyā adāsi. Sā taṃ khāditvā dohaḷaṃ paṭippassambhesi, tatonidānaṃ panassā putto nāhosi.
atk-s0513a2:2576: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā devī rāhulamātā ahosi, suko ānando, ambapakkadāyako tāpaso sāriputto, uyyāne nivutthatāpaso pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2580_0: Seyyaṃso seyyaso hotīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kosalarañño amaccaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2580_1: kathesi. So kira rañño bahūpakāro sabbakiccanipphādako ahosi. Rājā “bahūpakāro me
atk-s0513a2:2580_2: aya”nti tassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi. Taṃ asahamānā aññe rañño pesuññaṃ upasaṃharitvā
atk-s0513a2:2580_3: taṃ paribhindiṃsu. Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ saddahitvā dosaṃ anupaparikkhitvāva taṃ sīlavantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2580_4: niddosaṃ saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhāpetvā bandhanāgāre pakkhipāpesi. So tattha ekako
atk-s0513a2:2580_5: vasanto sīlasampattiṃ nissāya cittekaggataṃ labhitvā ekaggacitto saṅkhāre sammasitvā
atk-s0513a2:2580_6: sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa rājā aparabhāge niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2580_7: bhindāpetvā purimayasato mahantataraṃ yasaṃ adāsi. So “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti bahūni
atk-s0513a2:2580_8: mālāgandhādīni ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā tathāgataṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a2:2580_9: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto “anattho kira te uppannoti assumhā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a2:2580_10: “Āma, bhante, uppanno, ahaṃ pana tena anatthena atthaṃ akāsiṃ, bandhanāgāre nisīditvā
atk-s0513a2:2580_11: sotāpattiphalaṃ nibbattesi”nti. Satthā “na kho, upāsaka, tvaññeva anatthena atthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2580_12: āhari, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi attano anatthena atthaṃ āhariṃ suyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2581_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi
atk-s0513a2:2581_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:2581_2: dasa rājadhamme akopetvā dānaṃ deti, pañca sīlāni rakkhati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0513a2:2581_3: Athasseko amacco antepure padussi. Pādamūlikādayo ñatvā “asukaamacco antepure paduṭṭho”ti
atk-s0513a2:2581_4: rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā pariggaṇhanto yathāsabhāvato ñatvā pakkosāpetvā “mā maṃ ito
atk-s0513a2:2581_5: paṭṭhāya upaṭṭhāhī”ti nibbisayaṃ akāsi. So gantvā aññataraṃ sāmantarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahīti
atk-s0513a2:2581_6: sabbaṃ vatthu heṭṭhā mahāsīlavajātake kathitasadisameva. Idhāpi so rājā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0513a2:2581_7: vīmaṃsitvā tassa amaccassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā “bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti mahantena
atk-s0513a2:2581_8: parivārena rajjasīmaṃ pāpuṇi. Bārāṇasirañño sattasatamattā mahāyodhā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2581_9: sutvā “deva, asuko nāma kira rājā bārāṇasirajjaṃ gaṇhissāmī’ti janapadaṃ bhindanto
atk-s0513a2:2581_10: āgacchati, ettheva naṃ gantvā gaṇhissāmā”ti āhaṃsu. “Mayhaṃ paravihiṃsāya laddhena
atk-s0513a2:2581_11: rajjena kiccaṃ natthi, mā kiñci karitthā”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2582_0: Corarājā āgantvā nagaraṃ parikkhipi, puna amaccā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, mā
atk-s0513a2:2582_1: evaṃ karittha, gaṇhissāma na”nti āhaṃsu. Rājā “na labbhā kiñci kātuṃ, nagaradvārāni
atk-s0513a2:2582_2: vivarathā”ti vatvā sayaṃ amaccagaṇaparivuto mahātale rājapallaṅke nisīdi. Corarājā
atk-s0513a2:2582_3: catūsu dvāresu manusse pothento nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha amaccaparivutaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2582_4: rājānaṃ gāhāpetvā saṅkhalikāhi bandhāpetvā bandhanāgāre pakkhipāpesi. Rājā bandhanāgāre
atk-s0513a2:2582_5: nisinnova corarājānaṃ mettāyanto mettajjhānaṃ uppādesi. Tassa mettānubhāvena corarañño
atk-s0513a2:2582_6: kāye ḍāho uppajji, sakalasarīraṃ yamakaukkāhi jhāpiyamānaṃ viya jātaṃ. So mahādukkhābhitunno
atk-s0513a2:2582_7: “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchi. “Tumhe sīlavantaṃ rājānaṃ bandhanāgāre pakkhipetha,
atk-s0513a2:2582_8: tena vo idaṃ dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ bhavissatī”ti. So gantvā bodhisattaṃ khamāpetvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2582_9: rajjaṃ tumhākameva hotū”ti rajjaṃ tasseva niyyādetvā “ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ paccatthiko
atk-s0513a2:2582_10: me bhāro hotū”ti vatvā paduṭṭhāmaccassa rājāṇaṃ kāretvā attano nagarameva gato.
atk-s0513a2:2583: Bodhisatto alaṅkatamahātale samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinno amaccehi saddhiṃ sallapanto purimā dvegāthā avoca –
atk-s0513a2:2586: Ekena sandhiṃ katvāna, sataṃ vajjhe amocayiṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2589: Pecca saggaṃ nigaccheyya, idaṃ suṇātha kāsiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2590_0: Tattha seyyaṃso seyyaso hoti, yo seyyamupasevatīti anavajjauttamadhammasaṅkhāto seyyo
atk-s0513a2:2590_1: aṃso koṭṭhāso assāti seyyaṃso, kusaladhammanissitapuggalo. Yo punappunaṃ taṃ seyyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2590_2: kusaladhammabhāvanaṃ kusalābhirataṃ vā uttamapuggalamupasevati, so seyyaso hoti pāsaṃsataro
atk-s0513a2:2590_3: ceva uttaritaro ca hoti. Ekena sandhiṃ katvāna, sataṃ vajjhe amocayinti tadamināpi
atk-s0513a2:2590_4: cetaṃ veditabbaṃ – ahañhi seyyaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ upasevanto tāya mettābhāvanāya ekena
atk-s0513a2:2590_5: coraraññā sandhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā mettābhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā tumhe satajane vajjhe amocayiṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2591_0: Dutiyagāthāya attho – yasmā ahaṃ ekena saddhiṃ ekato mettābhāvanāya sandhiṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:2591_1: tumhe vajjhappatte satajane mocayiṃ, tasmā veditabbamevetaṃ, tasmā sabbena lokena
atk-s0513a2:2591_2: saddhiṃ mettābhāvanāya sandhiṃ katvā ekato puggalo pecca paraloke saggaṃ nigaccheyya.
atk-s0513a2:2591_3: Mettāya hi upacāraṃ kāmāvacare paṭisandhiṃ deti, appanā brahmaloke. Idaṃ mama vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2592_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahājanassa mettābhāvanāya guṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare
atk-s0513a2:2592_1: setacchattaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Satthā sammāsambuddho
atk-s0513a2:2596_0: Tattha mahanto rājāti mahārājā. Kaṃsoti tassa nāmaṃ. Bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā ajjhāvasanato
atk-s0513a2:2596_1: bārāṇasiggaho. So rājā idaṃ vacanaṃ vatvā dhanuñca sarasaṅkhātaṃ kaṇḍañca nikkhippa
atk-s0513a2:2596_2: ohāya chaḍḍetvā sīlasaṃyamaṃ upagato pabbajito, pabbajitvā ca pana jhānaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0513a2:2597: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā corarājā ānando ahosi, bārāṇasirājā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2601_0: Varaṃ varaṃ tvanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhanuggahatissattheraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2601_1: kathesi. Pasenadirañño pitā mahākosalo bimbisārarañño dhītaraṃ vedehiṃ nāma kosaladeviṃ
atk-s0513a2:2601_2: dadamāno tassā nhānacuṇṇamūlaṃ satasahassuṭṭhānaṃ kāsigāmaṃ adāsi. Ajātasattunā pana
atk-s0513a2:2601_3: pitari mārite kosaladevīpi sokābhibhūtā kālamakāsi. Tato pasenadi kosalarājā cintesi
atk-s0513a2:2601_4: – “ajātasattunā pitā mārito, bhaginīpi me sāmike kālakate tena sokena kālakatā, pitughātakassa
atk-s0513a2:2601_5: corassa kāsigāmaṃ na dassāmī”ti. So taṃ ajātasattussa na adāsi. Taṃ gāmaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a2:2601_6: tesaṃ dvinnampi kālena kālaṃ yuddhaṃ hoti, ajātasattu taruṇo samattho, pasenadi mahallakoyeva.
atk-s0513a2:2601_7: So abhikkhaṇaṃ parajjati, mahākosalassāpi manussā yebhuyyena parājitā. Atha rājā
atk-s0513a2:2601_8: “mayaṃ abhiṇhaṃ parajjāma, kiṃ nu kho kātabba”nti amacce pucchi. “Deva, ayyā nāma
atk-s0513a2:2601_9: mantacchekā honti, jetavanavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Rājā “tena
atk-s0513a2:2601_10: hi tāyaṃ velāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti carapurise āṇāpesi. Te tato
atk-s0513a2:2602_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle dve mahallakattherā vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasanti dattatthero
atk-s0513a2:2602_1: ca dhanuggahatissatthero ca. Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero paṭhamayāmepi majjhimayāmepi
atk-s0513a2:2602_2: niddāyitvā pacchimayāme pabujjhitvā ummukkāni sodhetvā aggiṃ jāletvā nisinnako āha
atk-s0513a2:2602_3: – “bhante, dattattherā”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante, tissattherā”ti? “Kiṃ niddāyasi no tva”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2602_4: “Aniddāyantā kiṃ karissāmā”ti? “Uṭṭhāya tāva nisīdathā”ti. So uṭṭhāya nisinno taṃ
atk-s0513a2:2602_5: dattattheraṃ āha – “bhante dattatthera, ayaṃ te lolo mahodarakosalo cāṭimattaṃ bhattameva
atk-s0513a2:2602_6: pūtiṃ karoti, yuddhavicāraṇaṃ pana kiñci na jānāti, parājito parājitotveva vadāpetī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2602_7: “Kiṃ pana kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? Tasmiṃ khaṇe te carapurisā tesaṃ kathaṃ suṇantā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2603_0: Dhanuggahatissatthero yuddhaṃ vicāresi – “bhante, yuddho nāma tividho – padumabyūho,
atk-s0513a2:2603_1: cakkabyūho, sakaṭabyūhoti. Ajātasattuṃ gaṇhitukāmena asuke nāma pabbatakucchismiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2603_2: dvīsu pabbatabhittīsu manusse ṭhapetvā purato dubbalabalaṃ dassetvā pabbatantaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2603_3: paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ jānitvā paviṭṭhamaggaṃ occhinditvā purato ca pacchato ca ubhosu pabbatabhittīsu
atk-s0513a2:2603_4: vaggitvā unnaditvā khipe patitamacchaṃ viya antomuṭṭhiyaṃ vaṭṭapotakaṃ viya ca katvā
atk-s0513a2:2603_5: sakkā assa taṃ gahetu”nti. Carapurisā taṃ sāsanaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā rājā
atk-s0513a2:2603_6: saṅgāmabheriṃ carāpetvā gantvā sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā ajātasattuṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:2603_7: attano dhītaraṃ vajirakumāriṃ bhāgineyyassa datvā kāsigāmaṃ tassā nhānamūlaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:2603_8: datvā uyyojesi. Sā pavatti bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭā jātā. Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2603_9: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, kosalarājā kira dhanuggahatissattherassa vicāraṇāya
atk-s0513a2:2603_10: ajātasattuṃ jinī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2603_11: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi dhanuggahatisso yuddhavicāraṇāya
atk-s0513a2:2604_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe rukkhadevatā hutvā
atk-s0513a2:2604_1: nibbatti. Tadā bārāṇasiṃ nissāya nivutthavaḍḍhakigāmakā eko vaḍḍhakī thambhatthāya
atk-s0513a2:2604_2: araññaṃ gantvā āvāṭe patitaṃ sūkarapotakaṃ disvā taṃ gharaṃ netvā paṭijaggi. So vuḍḍhippatto
atk-s0513a2:2604_3: mahāsarīro vaṅkadāṭho ācārasampanno ahosi, vaḍḍhakinā positattā pana “vaḍḍhakīsūkaro”tveva
atk-s0513a2:2604_4: paññāyi. Vaḍḍhakissa rukkhatacchanakāle tuṇḍena rukkhaṃ parivatteti, mukhena ḍaṃsitvā
atk-s0513a2:2604_5: vāsipharasunikhādanamuggare āharati, kālasuttakoṭiyaṃ gaṇhāti. Atha so vaḍḍhakī “kocideva,
atk-s0513a2:2604_6: naṃ khādeyyā”ti bhayena netvā araññe vissajjesi. Sopi araññaṃ pavisitvā khemaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2604_7: olokento ekaṃ pabbatantare mahantaṃ girikandaraṃ addasa sampannakandamūlaphalaṃ phāsukaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2604_8: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ anekasatasūkarasamākiṇṇaṃ. Te sūkarā taṃ disvā tassa santikaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2604_9: Sopi te āha – “ahaṃ tumheva olokento vicarāmi, apica vo mayā diṭṭhā, idañca ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2604_10: ramaṇīyaṃ, ahampi idāni idheva vasissāmī”ti. “Saccaṃ idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, parissayo
atk-s0513a2:2604_11: panettha atthī”ti. “Ahampi tumhe disvā etaṃ aññāsiṃ, evaṃ gocarasampanne ṭhāne vasantānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2604_12: vo sarīresu maṃsalohitaṃ natthi, kiṃ pana vo ettha bhaya”nti? “Eko byaggho pātova
atk-s0513a2:2604_13: āgantvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṃyeva gahetvā gacchatī”ti. “Kiṃ pana so nibaddhaṃ gaṇhāti, udāhu
atk-s0513a2:2604_15: tumhe ekassa yujjhituṃ na sakkothā”ti? “Āma, na sakkomā”ti. “Ahaṃ taṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a2:2604_16: kevalaṃ tumhe mama vacanaṃ karotha, so byaggho kahaṃ vasatī”ti? “Etasmiṃ pabbate”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2605_0: So rattiññeva sūkare carāpetvā yuddhaṃ vicārento “yuddhaṃ nāma padumabyūhacakkabyūhasakaṭabyūhavasena
atk-s0513a2:2605_1: tividhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā padumabyūhavasena vicāresi. So hi bhūmisīsaṃ jānāti. Tasmā
atk-s0513a2:2605_2: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne yuddhaṃ vicāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sūkarapillake mātaro ca tesaṃ majjhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:2605_3: ṭhapesi. So tā āvijjhitvā majjhimasūkariyo, tā āvijjhitvā potakasūkare, te āvijjhitvā
atk-s0513a2:2605_4: jarasūkare, te āvijjhitvā dīghadāṭhasūkare, te āvijjhitvā yuddhasamatthe balavatarasūkare
atk-s0513a2:2605_5: dasa vīsa tiṃsa jane tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne balagumbaṃ katvā ṭhapesi. Attano ṭhitaṭṭhānassa
atk-s0513a2:2605_6: purato ekaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpesi, pacchato ekaṃ suppasaṇṭhānaṃ anupubbaninnaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2605_7: pabbhārasadisaṃ. Tassa saṭṭhisattatimatte yodhasūkare ādāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne “mā
atk-s0513a2:2606_0: Byaggho uṭṭhāya “kālo”ti ñatvā gantvā tesaṃ sammukhā ṭhite pabbatatale ṭhatvā akkhīni
atk-s0513a2:2606_1: ummīletvā sūkare olokesi. Vaḍḍhakīsūkaro “paṭioloketha na”nti sūkarānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a2:2606_2: te paṭiolokesuṃ. Byaggho mukhaṃ ugghāṭetvā assosi, sūkarāpi tathā kariṃsu. Byaggho
atk-s0513a2:2606_3: muttaṃ chaḍḍesi, sūkarāpi chaḍḍayiṃsu. Iti yaṃ yaṃ so karoti, taṃ taṃ te paṭikariṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2606_4: So cintesi – “pubbe sūkarā mayā olokitakāle palāyantā palāyitumpi na sakkonti, ajja
atk-s0513a2:2606_5: apalāyitvā mama paṭisattu hutvā mayā katameva paṭikaronti. Etasmiṃ bhūmisīse ṭhito
atk-s0513a2:2606_6: eko tesaṃ saṃvidhāyakopi atthi, ajja mayhaṃ gatassa jayo na paññāyatī”ti. So nivattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2606_7: attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Tena pana gahitamaṃsakhādako eko kūṭajaṭilo atthi,
atk-s0513a2:2606_8: so taṃ tucchahatthameva āgacchantaṃ disvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2611: Balaṃ nu te byaggha na cajja vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2612_0: Tattha varaṃ varaṃ tvaṃ nihanaṃ pure cari, asmiṃ padese abhibhuyya sūkareti ambho
atk-s0513a2:2612_1: byaggha, tvaṃ pubbe imasmiṃ padese sabbasūkare abhibhavitvā imesu sūkaresu varaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2612_2: varaṃ tvaṃ uttamuttamaṃ sūkaraṃ nihananto vicari. Sodāni eko byapagamma jhāyasīti
atk-s0513a2:2612_3: so tvaṃ idāni aññataraṃ sūkaraṃ aggahetvā ekakova apagantvā jhāyasi pajjhāyasi. Balaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2612_4: nu te byaggha na cajja vijjatīti kiṃ nu te, ambho byaggha, ajja kāyabalaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0513a2:2615: “Ime sudaṃ yanti disodisaṃ pure, bhayaṭṭitā leṇagavesino puthū;
atk-s0513a2:2616: Te dāni saṅgamma vasanti ekato, yatthaṭṭhitā duppasahajjame mayā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2617_0: Tattha sudanti nipāto. Ayaṃ pana saṅkhepattho – ime sūkarā pubbe maṃ disvā bhayena
atk-s0513a2:2617_1: aṭṭitā pīḷitā attano leṇagavesino puthū visuṃ visuṃ hutvā disodisaṃ yanti, taṃ taṃ
atk-s0513a2:2617_2: disaṃ abhimukhā palāyanti, te dāni sabbepi samāgantvā ekato vasanti tiṭṭhanti, tañca
atk-s0513a2:2617_3: bhūmisīsaṃ upagatā, yattha ṭhitā duppasahā dummaddayā ajja ime mayāti.
atk-s0513a2:2618_0: Athassa ussāhaṃ janento kūṭajaṭilo “mā bhāyi, gaccha tayi naditvā pakkhandante sabbepi
atk-s0513a2:2618_1: bhītā bhijjitvā palāyissantī”ti āha. Byaggho tasmiṃ ussāhaṃ janente sūro hutvā puna
atk-s0513a2:2618_2: gantvā pabbatatale aṭṭhāsi. Vaḍḍhakīsūkaro dvinnaṃ āvāṭānaṃ antare aṭṭhāsi. Sūkarā
atk-s0513a2:2618_3: “sāmi, mahācoro punāgato”ti āhaṃsu. “Mā bhāyittha, idāni taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti. Byaggho
atk-s0513a2:2618_4: naditvā vaḍḍhakīsūkarassa upari patati, sūkaro tassa attano upari patanakāle parivattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2618_5: vegena ujukaṃ khataāvāṭe pati. Byaggho vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uparibhāgena gantvā
atk-s0513a2:2618_6: suppamukhassa tiriyaṃ khataāvāṭassa atisambādhe mukhaṭṭhāne patitvā puñjakato viya
atk-s0513a2:2618_7: ahosi. Sūkaro āvāṭā uttaritvā asanivegena gantvā byagghaṃ antarasatthimhi dāṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:2618_8: paharitvā yāva vakkapadesā phāletvā pañcamadhuramaṃsaṃ dāṭhāya paliveṭhetvā byagghassa
atk-s0513a2:2618_9: matthake āvijjhitvā “gaṇhatha tumhākaṃ paccāmitta”nti ukkhipitvā bahiāvāṭe chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0513a2:2618_10: Paṭhamaṃ āgatā byagghamaṃsaṃ labhiṃsu, pacchā āgatā “byagghamaṃsaṃ kīdisaṃ hotī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2619_0: Sūkarā na tāva tussanti. Vaḍḍhakīsūkaro tesaṃ iṅghitaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho tumhe na
atk-s0513a2:2619_1: tussathā”ti āha. “Sāmi, kiṃ etena byagghena ghātitena, añño pana byagghaāṇāpanasamattho
atk-s0513a2:2619_2: kūṭajaṭilo atthiyevā”ti. “Ko nāmeso”ti? “Eko dussīlatāpaso”ti. “Byagghopi mayā ghātito,
atk-s0513a2:2619_3: so me kiṃ pahoti, etha gaṇhissāma na”nti sūkaraghaṭāya saddhiṃ pāyāsi. Kūṭatāpasopi
atk-s0513a2:2619_4: byagghe cirāyante “kiṃ nu kho sūkarā byagghaṃ gaṇhiṃsū”ti paṭipathaṃ gacchanto te
atk-s0513a2:2619_5: sūkare āgacchante disvā attano parikkhāraṃ ādāya palāyanto tehi anubandhito parikkhāraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2619_6: chaḍḍetvā vegena udumbararukkhaṃ abhiruhi. Sūkarā “idānimha, sāmi, naṭṭhā, tāpaso
atk-s0513a2:2619_7: palāyitvā rukkhaṃ abhiruhī”ti āhaṃsu. “Kiṃ rukkhaṃ nāmā”ti? “Udumbararukkha”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2619_8: So “sūkariyo udakaṃ āharantu, sūkarapotakā pathaviṃ khaṇantu, dīghadāṭhā sūkarā mūlāni
atk-s0513a2:2619_9: chindantu, sesā parivāretvā ārakkhantū”ti saṃvidahitvā tesu tathā karontesu sayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2619_10: udumbarassa ujukaṃ thūlamūlaṃ pharasunā paharanto viya ekappahārameva katvā udumbararukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2619_11: pātesi. Parivāretvā ṭhitasūkarā kūṭajaṭilaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a2:2619_12: yāva aṭṭhito khāditvā vaḍḍhakīsūkaraṃ udumbarakhandheyeva nisīdāpetvā kūṭajaṭilassa
atk-s0513a2:2619_13: paribhogasaṅkhena udakaṃ āharitvā abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ kariṃsu, ekañca taruṇasūkariṃ
atk-s0513a2:2619_14: tassa aggamahesiṃ akaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya kira yāvajjatanā rājāno udumbarabhaddapīṭhe
atk-s0513a2:2620: Tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ viṭapantare sūkarānaṃ abhimukhā hutvā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2622: “Namatthu saṅghāna samāgatānaṃ, disvā sayaṃ sakhya vadāmi abbhutaṃ;
atk-s0513a2:2623: Byagghaṃ migā yattha jiniṃsu dāṭhino, sāmaggiyā dāṭhabalesu muccare”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2624_0: Tattha namatthu saṅghānanti ayaṃ mama namakkāro samāgatānaṃ sūkarasaṅghānaṃ atthu.
atk-s0513a2:2624_1: Disvā sayaṃ sakhya vadāmi abbhutanti idaṃ pubbe abhūtapubbaṃ abbhutaṃ sakhyaṃ mittabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2624_2: sayaṃ disvā vadāmi. Byagghaṃ migā yattha jiniṃsu dāṭhinoti yatra hi nāma dāṭhino
atk-s0513a2:2624_3: sūkaramigā byagghaṃ jiniṃsu, ayameva vā pāṭho. Sāmaggiyā dāṭhabalesu muccareti yā
atk-s0513a2:2624_4: sā dāṭhabalesu sūkaresu sāmaggī ekajjhāsayatā, tāya tesu sāmaggiyā te dāṭhabalā paccāmittaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2625: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā dhanuggahatisso vaḍḍhakīsūkaro ahosi, rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2629_0: Yaṃ ussukā saṅgharantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ siricorabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2629_1: kathesi. Imasmiṃ jātake paccuppannavatthu heṭṭhā khadiraṅgārajātake vitthāritameva.
atk-s0513a2:2629_2: Idhāpi pana sā anāthapiṇḍikassa ghare catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake vasanakā micchādiṭṭhidevatā
atk-s0513a2:2629_3: daṇḍakammaṃ karontī catupaññāsahiraññakoṭiyo āharitvā koṭṭhe pūretvā seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2629_4: sahāyikā ahosi. Atha naṃ so ādāya satthu santikaṃ nesi. Satthā tassā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0513a2:2629_5: sā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpannā ahosi. Tato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhino yaso yathāporāṇova jāto.
atk-s0513a2:2629_6: Atheko sāvatthivāsī sirilakkhaṇaññū brāhmaṇo cintesi – “anāthapiṇḍiko duggato hutvā
atk-s0513a2:2629_7: puna issaro jāto, yaṃnūnāhaṃ taṃ daṭṭhukāmo viya gatvā tassa gharato siriṃ thenetvā
atk-s0513a2:2629_8: āgaccheyya”nti. So tassa gharaṃ gantvā tena katasakkārasammāno sāraṇīyakathāya vattamānāya
atk-s0513a2:2629_9: “kimatthaṃ āgatosī”ti vutte “kattha nu kho sirī patiṭṭhitā”ti olokesi. Seṭṭhino ca
atk-s0513a2:2629_10: sabbaseto dhotasaṅkhapaṭibhāgo kukkuṭo suvaṇṇapañjare pakkhipitvā ṭhapito atthi,
atk-s0513a2:2629_11: tassa cūḷāya sirī patiṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇo olokayamāno siriyā tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2629_12: ñatvā āha – “ahaṃ, mahāseṭṭhi, pañcasate māṇave mante vācemi, akālaraviṃ ekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2629_13: nissāya te ca mayañca kilamāma, ayañca kira kukkuṭo kālaravī, imassatthāya āgatomhi,
atk-s0513a2:2629_14: dehi me etaṃ kukkuṭa”nti. “Gaṇha, brāhmaṇa, demi te kukkuṭa”nti. “Demī”ti ca vuttakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0513a2:2629_15: sirī tassa cūḷato apagantvā ussīsake ṭhapite maṇikkhandhe patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2630_0: Brāhmaṇo siriyā maṇimhi patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā maṇimpi yāci. “Maṇimpi demī”ti vuttakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0513a2:2630_1: sirī maṇito apagantvā ussīsake ṭhapitaārakkhayaṭṭhiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇo siriyā
atk-s0513a2:2630_2: tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā tampi yāci. “Gahetvā gacchāhī”ti vuttakkhaṇeyeva sirī
atk-s0513a2:2630_3: yaṭṭhito apagantvā puññalakkhaṇadeviyā nāma seṭṭhino aggamahesiyā sīse patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2630_4: Siricorabrāhmaṇo tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “avissajjiyabhaṇḍaṃ etaṃ, yācitumpi
atk-s0513a2:2630_5: na sakkā”ti cintetvā seṭṭhiṃ etadavoca – “mahāseṭṭhi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ gehe ‘siriṃ thenetvā
atk-s0513a2:2630_6: gamissāmī’ti āgacchiṃ, sirī pana te kukkuṭassa cūḷāyaṃ patiṭṭhitā ahosi, tasmiṃ mama
atk-s0513a2:2630_7: dinne tato apagantvā maṇimhi patiṭṭhahi, maṇimhi dinne ārakkhayaṭṭhiyaṃ patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0513a2:2630_8: ārakkhayaṭṭhiyā dinnāya tato apagantvā puññalakkhaṇadeviyā sīse patiṭṭhahi, ‘idaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2630_9: kho pana avissajjiyabhaṇḍa’nti imampi me na gahitaṃ, na sakkā tava siriṃ thenetuṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2630_10: tava santakaṃ taveva hotū”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Anāthapiṇḍiko “imaṃ kāraṇaṃ satthu
atk-s0513a2:2630_11: kathessāmī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2630_12: tathāgatassa ārocesi. Satthā taṃ sutvā “na kho, gahapati, idāneva aññesaṃ sirī aññattha
atk-s0513a2:2630_13: gacchati, pubbepi appapuññehi uppāditasirī pana puññavantānaṃyeva pādamūlaṃ gatā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2631_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2631_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto mātāpitūnaṃ kālakiriyāya
atk-s0513a2:2631_2: saṃviggo nikkhamitvā himavantapadese isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
atk-s0513a2:2631_3: ca uppādetvā dīghassa addhuno accayena loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ gantvā bārāṇasirañño
atk-s0513a2:2631_4: uyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhaṃ caramāno hatthācariyassa gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2631_5: So tassa ācāravihāre pasanno bhikkhaṃ datvā uyyāne vasāpetvā niccaṃ paṭijaggi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2631_6: kāle eko kaṭṭhahārako araññato dārūni āharanto velāya nagaradvāraṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a2:2631_7: Sāyaṃ ekasmiṃ devakule dārukalāpaṃ ussīsake katvā nipajji, devakule vissaṭṭhā bahū
atk-s0513a2:2631_8: kukkuṭā tassa avidūre ekasmiṃ rukkhe sayiṃsu. Tesu uparisayitakukkuṭo paccūsakāle
atk-s0513a2:2631_9: vaccaṃ pātento heṭṭhāsayitakukkuṭassa sarīre pātesi. “Kena me sarīre vaccaṃ pātita”nti
atk-s0513a2:2631_10: ca vutte “mayā”ti āha. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti ca vutte “anupadhāretvā”ti vatvā punapi pātesi.
atk-s0513a2:2631_11: Tato ubhopi aññamaññaṃ kuddhā “kiṃ te balaṃ, kiṃ te bala”nti kalahaṃ kariṃsu. Atha
atk-s0513a2:2631_12: heṭṭhāsayitakukkuṭo āha – “maṃ māretvā aṅgāre pakkamaṃsaṃ khādanto pātova kahāpaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2631_13: labhatī”ti. Uparisayitakukkuṭo āha – “ambho, mā tvaṃ ettakena gajji, mama thūlamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2631_14: khādanto rājā hoti, bahimaṃsaṃ khādanto puriso ce, senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ, itthī ce, aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2631_15: labhati. Aṭṭhimaṃsaṃ pana me khādanto gihī ce, bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānaṃ, pabbajito ce,
atk-s0513a2:2632_0: Kaṭṭhahārako tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “rajje patte sahassena kiccaṃ natthī”ti saṇikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2632_1: abhiruhitvā uparisayitakukkuṭaṃ gahetvā māretvā ucchaṅge katvā “rājā bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2632_2: gantvā vivaṭadvāreneva nagaraṃ pavisitvā kukkuṭaṃ nittacaṃ katvā udaraṃ sodhetvā
atk-s0513a2:2632_3: “idaṃ kukkuṭamaṃsaṃ sādhukaṃ sampādehī”ti pajāpatiyā adāsi. Sā kukkuṭamaṃsañca bhattañca
atk-s0513a2:2632_4: sampādetvā “bhuñja, sāmī”ti tassa upanāmesi. “Bhadde, etaṃ maṃsaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ, etaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2632_5: khāditvā ahaṃ rājā bhavissāmi, tvaṃ aggamahesī bhavissasi, taṃ bhattañca maṃsañca
atk-s0513a2:2632_6: ādāya gaṅgātīraṃ gantvā nhāyitvā bhuñjissāmā”ti bhattabhājanaṃ tīre ṭhapetvā nhānatthāya
atk-s0513a2:2632_7: otariṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe vātena khubhitaṃ udakaṃ āgantvā bhattabhājanaṃ ādāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a2:2632_8: Taṃ nadīsotena vuyhamānaṃ heṭṭhānadiyaṃ hatthiṃ nhāpento eko hatthācariyo mahāmatto
atk-s0513a2:2632_10: sāmī”ti. So taṃ pidahāpetvā lañchāpetvā “yāva mayaṃ āgacchāma, tāvimaṃ bhattaṃ mā
atk-s0513a2:2632_11: vivarā”ti bhariyāya pesesi. Sopi kho kaṭṭhahārako mukhato paviṭṭhena vālukodakena
atk-s0513a2:2633_0: Atheko tassa hatthācariyassa kulūpako dibbacakkhukatāpaso “mayhaṃ upaṭṭhāko hatthiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_1: na vijahati, kadā nu kho sampattiṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti dibbacakkhunā upadhārento taṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_2: disvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā puretaraṃ gantvā hatthācariyassa nivesane nisīdi. Hatthācariyo
atk-s0513a2:2633_3: āgantvā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno taṃ bhattabhājanaṃ āharāpetvā “tāpasaṃ maṃsodanena
atk-s0513a2:2633_4: parivisathā”ti āha. Tāpaso bhattaṃ gahetvā maṃse dīyamāne aggahetvā “imaṃ maṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_5: ahaṃ vicāremī”ti vatvā “vicāretha, bhante”ti vutte thūlamaṃsādīni ekekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_6: kāretvā thūlamaṃsaṃ hatthācariyassa dāpesi, bahimaṃsaṃ tassa bhariyāya, aṭṭhimaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_7: attanā paribhuñji. So bhattakiccāvasāne gacchanto “tvaṃ ito tatiyadivase rājā bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a2:2633_8: appamatto hohī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Tatiyadivase eko sāmantarājā āgantvā bārāṇasiṃ parivāresi.
atk-s0513a2:2633_9: Bārāṇasirājā hatthācariyaṃ rājavesaṃ gāhāpetvā “hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā yujjhā”ti āṇāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:2633_10: sayaṃ aññātakavesena senāya vicārento ekena mahāvegena sarena viddho taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0513a2:2633_11: mari. Tassa matabhāvaṃ ñatvā hatthācariyo bahū kahāpaṇe nīharāpetvā “dhanatthikā
atk-s0513a2:2633_12: purato hutvā yujjhantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi. Balakāyo muhutteneva sāmantarājānaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_13: pāpesi. Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā “kaṃ rājānaṃ karomā”ti mantayamānā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2633_14: rājā jīvamāno attano vesaṃ hatthācariyassa adāsi, ayameva yuddhaṃ katvā rajjaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a2:2633_15: etasseva rajjaṃ dassāmā”ti taṃ rajjena abhisiñciṃsu, bhariyampissa aggamahesiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a2:2634: Satthā atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a2:2637: Sippavanto asippā ca, lakkhivā tāni bhuñjati.
atk-s0513a2:2641_0: Tattha yaṃ ussukāti yaṃ dhanasaṅgharaṇe ussukkamāpannā chandajātā kicchena bahuṃ
atk-s0513a2:2641_1: dhanaṃ saṅgharanti.“Ye ussukā”tipi pāṭho, ye purisā dhanasaṃharaṇe ussukā hatthisippādivasena
atk-s0513a2:2641_2: sippavanto asippā ca antamaso vetanena kammaṃ katvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ saṅgharantīti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2641_3: Lakkhivā tāni bhuñjatīti tāni “bahuṃ dhana”nti vuttāni dhanāni puññavā puriso attano
atk-s0513a2:2641_4: puññaphalaṃ paribhuñjanto kiñci kammaṃ akatvāpi paribhuñjati.
atk-s0513a2:2642_0: Aticcaññeva pāṇinoti aticca aññe eva pāṇino. Eva-kāro purimapadena yojetabbo, sabbattheva
atk-s0513a2:2642_1: katapuññassa aññe akatapuññe satte atikkamitvāti attho. Appanāyatanesupīti api anāyatanesupi
atk-s0513a2:2642_2: aratanākaresu ratanāni asuvaṇṇāyatanādīsu suvaṇṇādīni ahatthāyatanādīsu hatthiādayoti
atk-s0513a2:2642_3: saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakā bahū bhogā uppajjanti. Tattha muttāmaṇiādīnaṃ anākare uppattiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2643: Satthā pana imā gāthā vatvā “gahapati, imesaṃ sattānaṃ puññasadisaṃ aññaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma natthi, puññavantānañhi anākaresu ratanāni uppajjantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammaṃ desesi –
atk-s0513a2:2650: “Mānussikā ca sampatti, devaloke ca yā rati;
atk-s0513a2:2658: Idāni yesu anāthapiṇḍikassa sirī patiṭṭhitā, tāni ratanāni dassetuṃ “kukkuṭo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0513a2:2662_0: Tattha daṇḍoti ārakkhayaṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, thiyoti seṭṭhibhariyaṃ puññalakkhaṇadeviṃ.
atk-s0513a2:2662_1: Sesamettha uttānameva. Gāthaṃ vatvā ca pana jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando
atk-s0513a2:2662_2: ahosi, kulūpakatāpaso pana ahameva sammāsambuddho ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2666_0: Dariyā satta vassānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundarīmāraṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a2:2666_1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukatoti vatthu udāne āgatameva. Ayaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2666_2: panettha saṅkhepo – bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ mahoghasadise
atk-s0513a2:2666_3: lābhasakkāre uppanne hatalābhasakkārā aññatitthiyā sūriyuggamanakāle khajjopanakā
atk-s0513a2:2666_4: viya nippabhā hutvā ekato sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu – “mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato
atk-s0513a2:2666_5: paṭṭhāya hatalābhasakkārā, na koci amhākaṃ atthibhāvampi jānāti, kena nu kho saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2666_6: ekato hutvā samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāramassa antaradhāpeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2666_7: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi – “sundariyā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sakkuṇissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2667_0: Te ekadivasaṃ sundariṃ titthiyārāmaṃ pavisitvā vanditvā ṭhitaṃ nālapiṃsu. Sā punappunaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2667_1: sallapantīpi paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā “api nu, ayyā, tumhe kenaci viheṭhitātthā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a2:2667_2: “Kiṃ, bhagini, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicarantaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2667_3: na passasī”ti. Sā evamāha – “mayā ettha kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? Tvaṃ khosi, bhagini,
atk-s0513a2:2667_4: abhirūpā sobhaggappattā, samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ tava kathaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2667_5: gāhāpetvā hatalābhasakkāraṃ karohī”ti? Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā vanditvā pakkantā.
atk-s0513a2:2667_6: Tato paṭṭhāya mālāgandhavilepanakappūrakaṭukaphalādīni gahetvā sāyaṃ mahājanassa
atk-s0513a2:2667_7: satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchati. “Kahaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2667_8: gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ, ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2667_9: vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ otaritvā
atk-s0513a2:2667_10: nagarābhimukhī gacchati. “Kiṃ, sundari, kahaṃ gatāsī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena
atk-s0513a2:2667_11: saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0513a2:2668_0: Atha naṃ katipāhaccayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa
atk-s0513a2:2668_1: gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā samīpe mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā”ti vadiṃsu, te tathā
atk-s0513a2:2668_2: akaṃsu. Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2668_3: vo āsaṅkā”ti vuttā “imesu divasesu jetavane vasati, tatrassā pavattiṃ na jānāmā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2668_4: vatvā “tena hi gacchatha, naṃ vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā
atk-s0513a2:2668_5: jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā mālākacavarantare disvā mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0513a2:2668_7: māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti rañño ārocesuṃ, rājā “tena hi gacchatha,
atk-s0513a2:2668_8: nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti āha. Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni
atk-s0513a2:2669_0: Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi. Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a2:2669_1: ariyasāvake sesā yebhuyyena “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā
atk-s0513a2:2669_2: antonagare ca bahinagare ca bhikkhū akkosantā paribhāsantā vicaranti. Bhikkhū taṃ
atk-s0513a2:2669_3: pavattiṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā “tena hi tumhepi te manusse evaṃ paṭicodethā”ti –
atk-s0513a2:2670: “Abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upeti, yo vāpi katvā na karomi cāha;
atk-s0513a2:2671: Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, nihīnakammā manujā paratthā”ti. –
atk-s0513a2:2673_0: Rājā “sundariyā aññehi māritabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti purise pesesi. Tepi kho dhuttā tehi
atk-s0513a2:2673_1: kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ karonti. Tattheko evamāha – “tvaṃ sundariṃ
atk-s0513a2:2673_2: ekappahāreneva māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2673_3: pivasi, hotu hotū”ti. Rājapurisā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Atha te rājā “tumhehi
atk-s0513a2:2673_4: māritā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Kehi mārāpitā”ti? “Aññatitthiyehi, devā”ti. Rājā
atk-s0513a2:2673_5: titthiye pakkosāpetvā sundariṃ ukkhipāpetvā “gacchatha tumhe, evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a2:2673_6: āhiṇḍatha ‘ayaṃ sundarī samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā,
atk-s0513a2:2673_7: neva samaṇassa gotamassa, na gotamasāvakānaṃ doso atthi, amhākaṃyeva doso”’ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a2:2673_8: Te tathā akaṃsu. Bālamahājano tadā saddahi, titthiyāpi purisavadhadaṇḍena palibuddhā.
atk-s0513a2:2673_9: Tato paṭṭhāya buddhānaṃ mahantataro lābhasakkāro ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:2674_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, titthiyā ‘buddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2674_1: kāḷakabhāvaṃ uppādessāmā’ti sayaṃ kāḷakā jātā, buddhānaṃ pana mahantataro lābhasakkāro
atk-s0513a2:2674_2: udapādī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2674_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, sakkā buddhānaṃ saṃkilesaṃ uppādetuṃ,
atk-s0513a2:2674_4: buddhānaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇaṃ nāma jātimaṇino kiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇasadisaṃ, pubbe
atk-s0513a2:2674_5: jātimaṇiṃ ‘kiliṭṭhaṃ karissāmā’ti vāyamantāpi nāsakkhiṃsu kiliṭṭhaṃ kātu”nti vatvā
atk-s0513a2:2675_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a2:2675_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā himavantapadese tisso pabbatarājiyo
atk-s0513a2:2675_2: atikkamitvā tāpaso hutvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasi. Tassā avidūre maṇiguhā ahosi, tattha
atk-s0513a2:2675_3: tiṃsamattā sūkarā vasanti, guhāya avidūre eko sīho carati, tassa maṇimhi chāyā paññāyati.
atk-s0513a2:2675_4: Sūkarā sīhacchāyaṃ disvā bhītā utrastā appamaṃsalohitā ahesuṃ. Te “imassa maṇino
atk-s0513a2:2675_5: vippasannattā ayaṃ chāyā paññāyati, imaṃ maṇiṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vivaṇṇaṃ karomā”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a2:2675_6: avidūre ekaṃ saraṃ gantvā kalale pavaṭṭetvā āgantvā taṃ maṇiṃ ghaṃsanti. So sūkaralomehi
atk-s0513a2:2675_7: ghaṃsiyamāno vippasannataro ahosi. Sūkarā upāyaṃ apassantā “imassa maṇino vivaṇṇakaraṇūpāyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2675_8: tāpasaṃ pucchissāmā”ti bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā purimā
atk-s0513a2:2678: Haññāma maṇino ābhaṃ, iti no mantaraṃ ahu.
atk-s0513a2:2681: Idañcadāni pucchāma, kiṃ kiccaṃ idha maññasī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2682_0: Tattha dariyāti maṇiguhāyaṃ. Vasāmaseti vasāma. Haññāmāti hanissāma, mayampi vivaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2682_1: karissāma. Idañcadāni pucchāmāti idāni mayaṃ “kena kāraṇena ayaṃ maṇi kilissamāno
atk-s0513a2:2682_2: vodāyate”ti idaṃ taṃ pucchāma. “Kiṃ kiccaṃ ‘idha maññasī’ti imasmiṃ atthe tvaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2683: Atha nesaṃ ācikkhanto bodhisatto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a2:2686: Nāssa sakkā siriṃ hantuṃ, apakkamatha sūkarā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2687: Tattha akācoti akakkaso. Subhoti sobhano. Sirinti pabhaṃ. Apakkamathāti imassa maṇissa pabhā nāsetuṃ na sakkā, tumhe pana imaṃ maṇiguhaṃ pahāya aññattha gacchathāti.
atk-s0513a2:2688: Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā tathā akaṃsu. Bodhisatto jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:2689: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā tāpaso ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2693_0: Mā sālūkassa pihayīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2693_1: kathesi. Taṃ cūḷanāradakassapajātake āvibhavissati. Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a2:2693_2: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. “Ko taṃ ukkaṇṭhāpetī”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2693_3: “Thullakumārikā, bhante”ti. Satthā “esā te bhikkhu anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ etissā
atk-s0513a2:2693_4: vivāhatthāya āgataparisāya uttaribhaṅgo ahosī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a2:2694_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahālohitagoṇo nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:2694_1: kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa cūḷalohito nāma. Ubhopi goṇā gāmake ekasmiṃ kule kammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a2:2694_2: Tassa kulassa ekā vayappattā kumārikā atthi, taṃ aññakulaṃ vāresi. Atha naṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2694_3: “vivāhakāle uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatī”ti sālūkaṃ nāma sūkaraṃ yāgubhattena paṭijaggi,
atk-s0513a2:2694_4: so heṭṭhāmañce sayati. Athekadivasaṃ cūḷalohito bhātaraṃ āha – “bhātika, mayaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0513a2:2694_5: kule kammaṃ karoma, amhe nissāya imaṃ kulaṃ jīvati, atha ca panime manussā amhākaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2694_6: tiṇapalālamattaṃ denti, imaṃ sūkaraṃ yāgubhattena posenti, heṭṭhāmañce sayāpenti,
atk-s0513a2:2694_7: kiṃ nāmesa etesaṃ karissatī”ti. Mahālohito “tāta, mā tvaṃ etassa yāgubhattaṃ patthaya,
atk-s0513a2:2694_8: etissā kumārikāya vivāhadivase etaṃ uttaribhaṅgaṃ kātukāmā ete maṃsassa thūlabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2694_9: posenti, katipāhaccayena taṃ passissasi heṭṭhāmañcato nikkhāmetvā vadhitvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2694_10: chinditvā āgantukabhattaṃ kariyamāna”nti vatvā purimā dve gāthā samuṭṭhāpesi –
atk-s0513a2:2701_0: Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – tāta, tvaṃ mā sālūkasūkarabhāvaṃ patthayi, ayañhi āturannāni
atk-s0513a2:2701_1: maraṇabhojanāni bhuñjati, yāni bhuñjitvā nacirasseva maraṇaṃ pāpuṇissati, tvaṃ pana
atk-s0513a2:2701_2: appossukko nirālayo hutvā attanā laddhaṃ imaṃ palālamissakaṃ bhusaṃ khāda, etaṃ dīghāyubhāvassa
atk-s0513a2:2701_3: lakkhaṇaṃ sañjānananimittaṃ. Idāni katipāhasseva so vevāhikapuriso mahatiyā parisāya
atk-s0513a2:2701_4: yutto yuttasevako idha atithi hutvā āgato bhavissati, athetaṃ sālūkaṃ musalasadisena
atk-s0513a2:2701_5: uttaroṭṭhena samannāgatattā musaluttaraṃ māritaṃ sayantaṃ dakkhasīti.
atk-s0513a2:2702_0: Tato katipāhasseva vevāhikesu āgatesu sālūkaṃ māretvā uttaribhaṅgamakaṃsu. Ubho goṇā
atk-s0513a2:2702_1: taṃ tassa vipattiṃ disvā “amhākaṃ bhusameva vara”nti cintayiṃsu. Satthā abhisambuddho
atk-s0513a2:2706: Tattha bhusāmivāti bhusameva amhākaṃ varaṃ uttamanti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2707_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a2:2707_1: so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. “Tadā kumārikā etarahi thullakumārikā ahosi,
atk-s0513a2:2707_2: sālūko ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, cūḷalohito ānando, mahālohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2711_0: Nānummattoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a2:2711_1: kathesi. Therassa kira saddhivihāriko theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno
atk-s0513a2:2711_2: “lābhuppattipaṭipadaṃ me, bhante, kathetha, kiṃ karonto cīvarādīnaṃ lābhī hotī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2711_3: pucchi. Athassa thero “āvuso, catūhaṅgehi samannāgatassa lābhasakkāro uppajjati,
atk-s0513a2:2711_4: attano abbhantare hirottappaṃ bhinditvā sāmaññaṃ pahāya anummatteneva ummattena viya
atk-s0513a2:2711_5: bhavitabbaṃ, pisuṇavācā vattabbā, naṭasadisena bhavitabbaṃ, vikiṇṇavācena kutūhalena
atk-s0513a2:2711_6: bhavitabba”nti imaṃ lābhuppattipaṭipadaṃ kathesi. So taṃ paṭipadaṃ garahitvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a2:2711_7: pakkanto. Thero satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Satthā “neso,
atk-s0513a2:2711_8: sāriputta, bhikkhu idāneva lābhaṃ garahati, pubbepesa garahiyevā”ti vatvā therena
atk-s0513a2:2712_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2712_1: vayappatto soḷasavassikakāleyeva tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ aṭṭhārasannañca sippānaṃ pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2712_2: patvā disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vācesi. Tatreko māṇavo
atk-s0513a2:2712_3: sīlācārasampanno ekadivasaṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kathaṃ imesaṃ sattānaṃ lābho
atk-s0513a2:2712_4: uppajjatī”ti lābhuppattipaṭipadaṃ pucchi. Ācariyo “tāta, imesaṃ sattānaṃ catūhi kāraṇehi
atk-s0513a2:2715: Mūḷhesu labhate lābhaṃ, esā te anusāsanī”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2716_0: Tattha nānummattoti na anummatto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ummattako nāma itthipurisadārikadārake
atk-s0513a2:2716_1: disvā tesaṃ vatthālaṅkārādīni vilumpati, tato tato macchamaṃsapūvādīni balakkārena
atk-s0513a2:2716_2: gahetvā khādati, evameva yo gihibhūto ajjhattabahiddhasamuṭṭhānaṃ hirottappaṃ pahāya
atk-s0513a2:2716_3: kusalākusalaṃ agaṇetvā nirayabhayaṃ abhāyanto lobhābhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto kāmesu
atk-s0513a2:2716_4: pamatto sandhicchedādīni sāhasikakammāni karoti, pabbajitopi hirottappaṃ pahāya kusalākusalaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2716_5: agaṇetvā nirayabhayaṃ abhāyanto satthārā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ maddanto lobhena abhibhūto
atk-s0513a2:2716_6: pariyādiṇṇacitto cīvarādimattaṃ nissāya attano sāmaññaṃ vijahitvā pamatto vejjakammadūtakammādīni
atk-s0513a2:2716_7: karoti, veḷudānādīni nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ anummattopi ummattasadisattā ummatto
atk-s0513a2:2716_8: nāma, evarūpassa khippaṃ lābho uppajjati. Yo pana evaṃ anummatto lajjī kukkuccako,
atk-s0513a2:2716_9: esa mūḷhesu apaṇḍitesu purisesu lābhaṃ na labhati, tasmā lābhatthikena ummattakena viya bhavitabbanti.
atk-s0513a2:2717_0: Nāpisuṇoti etthāpi yo pisuṇo hoti, “asukena idaṃ nāma kata”nti rājakule pesuññaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2717_1: upasaṃharati, so aññesaṃ yasaṃ acchinditvā attano gaṇhāti. Rājānopi naṃ “ayaṃ amhesu
atk-s0513a2:2717_2: sasasneho”ti ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti, amaccādayopissa “ayaṃ no rājakule paribhindeyyā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2717_3: bhayena dātabbaṃ maññanti, evaṃ etarahi pisuṇassa lābho uppajjati. Yo pana apisuṇo,
atk-s0513a2:2717_4: so mūḷhesu lābhaṃ na labhatīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0513a2:2718_0: Nānaṭoti lābhaṃ uppādentena naṭena viya bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā naṭo hirottappaṃ pahāya
atk-s0513a2:2718_1: naccagītavāditehi kīḷaṃ katvā dhanaṃ saṃharati, evameva lābhatthikena hirottappaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2718_2: bhinditvā itthipurisadārikadārakānaṃ soṇḍasahāyena viya nānappakāraṃ keḷiṃ karontena
atk-s0513a2:2718_3: vicaritabbaṃ. Yo evaṃ anaṭo, so mūḷhesu lābhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0513a2:2719_0: Nākutūhaloti kutūhalo nāma vippakiṇṇavāco. Rājāno hi amacce pucchanti – “asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a2:2719_1: kira ‘manusso mārito, gharaṃ viluttaṃ, paresaṃ dārā padhaṃsitā’ti suyyati, kesaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2719_2: nu kho idaṃ kamma”nti. Tattha sesesu akathentesuyeva yo uṭṭhahitvā “asuko ca asuko
atk-s0513a2:2719_3: ca nāmā”ti vadati, ayaṃ kutūhalo nāma. Rājāno tassa vacanena te purise pariyesitvā
atk-s0513a2:2719_4: nisedhetvā “imaṃ nissāya no nagaraṃ niccoraṃ jāta”nti tassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ denti,
atk-s0513a2:2719_5: sesāpi janā “ayaṃ no rājapurisehi puṭṭho suyuttaduyuttaṃ katheyyā”ti bhayena tasseva
atk-s0513a2:2719_6: dhanaṃ denti, evaṃ kutūhalassa lābho uppajjati. Yo pana akutūhalo, esa na mūḷhesu
atk-s0513a2:2719_7: labhati lābhaṃ. Esā te anusāsanīti esā amhākaṃ santikā tuyhaṃ lābhānusiṭṭhīti.
atk-s0513a2:2720: Antevāsiko ācariyassa kathaṃ sutvā lābhaṃ garahanto –
atk-s0513a2:2726: Esāva jīvikā seyyo, yā cādhammena esanā”ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0513a2:2727_0: Tattha yā vuttīti yā jīvitavutti. Vinipātenāti attano vinipātena. Adhammacaraṇenāti
atk-s0513a2:2727_1: adhammakiriyāya visamakiriyāya vadhabandhanagarahādīhi attānaṃ vinipātetvā adhammaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2727_2: caritvā yā vutti, tañca yasadhanalābhañca sabbaṃ dhiratthu nindāmi garahāmi, na me
atk-s0513a2:2727_3: etenatthoti adhippāyo. Pattamādāyāti bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā. Anagāro paribbajeti
atk-s0513a2:2727_4: ageho pabbajito hutvā careyya, na ca sappuriso kāyaduccaritādivasena adhammacariyaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2727_5: careyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Esāva jīvikā seyyo. Yā cādhammena esanāti, yā esā adhammena jīvikapariyesanā,
atk-s0513a2:2727_6: tato esā pattahatthassa parakulesu bhikkhācariyāva seyyo, sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a2:2728: Evaṃ māṇavo pabbajjāya guṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā nikkhamitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesanto abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a2:2729: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā māṇavo lābhagarahī bhikkhu ahosi, ācariyo pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2733: Agghanti macchāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kūṭavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu heṭṭhā kathitameva.
atk-s0513a2:2734_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kuṭumbikakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a2:2734_1: viññutaṃ patto kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapesi. Kaniṭṭhabhātāpissa atthi, tesaṃ aparabhāge pitā
atk-s0513a2:2734_2: kālakato. Te ekadivasaṃ “pitu santakaṃ vohāraṃ sādhessāmā”ti ekaṃ gāmaṃ gantvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2734_3: labhitvā āgacchantā nadītitthe nāvaṃ paṭimānentā puṭabhattaṃ bhuñjiṃsu. Bodhisatto
atk-s0513a2:2734_4: atirekabhattaṃ gaṅgāya macchānaṃ datvā nadīdevatāya pattiṃ adāsi. Devatā pattiṃ anumoditvāyeva
atk-s0513a2:2734_5: dibbena yasena vaḍḍhitvā attano yasavuḍḍhiṃ āvajjamānā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aññāsi. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a2:2734_6: vālikāyaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ pattharitvā nipanno niddaṃ okkami, kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa thokaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2734_7: corapakatiko. So te kahāpaṇe bodhisattassa adatvā sayameva gaṇhitukāmatāya kahāpaṇabhaṇḍikasadisaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2734_8: ekaṃ sakkharabhaṇḍikaṃ katvā dvepi bhaṇḍikā ekatova ṭhapesi. Tesaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a2:2734_9: gaṅgāmajjhagatānaṃ kaniṭṭho nāvaṃ khobhetvā “sakkharabhaṇḍikaṃ udake khipissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a2:2734_10: sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ khipitvā “bhātika, sahassabhaṇḍikā udake patitā, kinti karomā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2734_11: āha. “Udake patitāya kiṃ karissāma, mā cintayī”ti. Nadīdevatā cintesi – “ahaṃ iminā
atk-s0513a2:2734_12: dinnapattiṃ anumoditvā dibbayasena vaḍḍhitvā etassa santakaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti attano
atk-s0513a2:2734_13: ānubhāvena taṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ ekaṃ mahāmacchaṃ gilāpetvā sayaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi. Sopi coro
atk-s0513a2:2734_14: gehaṃ gantvā “bhātā me vañcito”ti bhaṇḍikaṃ mocento sakkharā passitvā hadayena sussantena
atk-s0513a2:2735_0: Tadā kevaṭṭā macchagahaṇatthāya jālaṃ khipiṃsu. So maccho devatānubhāvena jālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a2:2735_1: Kevaṭṭā taṃ gahetvā vikkiṇituṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭhā. Manussā mahāmacchaṃ disvā mūlaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2735_2: pucchanti. Kevaṭṭā “kahāpaṇasahassañca satta ca māsake datvā gaṇhathā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0513a2:2735_3: Manussā “sahassagghanakamacchopi no diṭṭho”ti parihāsaṃ karonti. Kevaṭṭā macchaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2735_4: gahetvā bodhisattassa gharadvāraṃ gantvā “imaṃ macchaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu. “Kimassa
atk-s0513a2:2735_5: mūla”nti? “Satta māsake datvā gaṇhathā”ti. “Aññesaṃ dadamānā kathaṃ dethā”ti? “Aññesaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2735_6: sahassena ca sattahi ca māsakehi dema, tumhe pana satta māsake datvā gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0513a2:2735_7: So tesaṃ satta māsake datvā macchaṃ bhariyāya pesesi. Sā macchassa kucchiṃ phālayamānā
atk-s0513a2:2735_8: sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ disvā bodhisattassa ārocesi. Bodhisatto taṃ oloketvā attano lañchaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2735_9: disvā sakasantakabhāvaṃ ñatvā “idāni ime kevaṭṭā imaṃ macchaṃ aññesaṃ dadamānā sahassena
atk-s0513a2:2735_10: ceva sattahi ca māsakehi denti, amhe pana patvā sahassassa amhākaṃ santakattā satteva
atk-s0513a2:2735_11: māsake gahetvā adaṃsu, idaṃ antaraṃ ajānantaṃ na sakkā kañci saddahāpetu”nti cintetvā
atk-s0513a2:2737: “Agghanti macchā adhikaṃ sahassaṃ, na so atthi yo imaṃ saddaheyya;
atk-s0513a2:2738: Mayhañca assu idha satta māsā, ahampi taṃ macchuddānaṃ kiṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a2:2739_0: Tattha adhikanti aññehi pucchitā kevaṭṭā “sattamāsādhikaṃ sahassaṃ agghantī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0513a2:2739_1: Na so atthi yo imaṃ saddaheyyāti so puriso na atthi, yo imaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhato
atk-s0513a2:2739_2: ajānanto mama vacanena saddaheyya, ettakaṃ vā macchā agghantīti yo imaṃ saddaheyya,
atk-s0513a2:2739_3: so natthi, tasmāyeva te aññehi na gahitātipi attho. Mayhañca assūti mayhaṃ pana satta
atk-s0513a2:2739_4: māsakā ahesuṃ. Macchuddānanti macchavaggaṃ. Tena hi macchena saddhiṃ aññepi macchā
atk-s0513a2:2739_5: ekato baddhā taṃ sakalampi macchuddānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiṇeyyanti kiṇiṃ, satteva
atk-s0513a2:2739_6: māsake datvā ettakaṃ macchavaggaṃ gaṇhinti attho.
atk-s0513a2:2740_0: Evañca pana vatvā idaṃ cintesi – “kiṃ nu kho nissāya mayā ete kahāpaṇā laddhā”ti?
atk-s0513a2:2740_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe nadīdevatā ākāse dissamānarūpena ṭhatvā “ahaṃ, gaṅgādevatā, tayā macchānaṃ
atk-s0513a2:2740_2: atirekabhattaṃ datvā mayhaṃ patti dinnā, tenāhaṃ tava santakaṃ rakkhantī āgatā”ti
atk-s0513a2:2743: Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ sarantiyā, kataṃ apacitiṃ tayā”ti.
